atk-abh01a:11_0: Karuṇā viya sattesu, paññā yassa mahesino;
atk-abh01a:19_0: Mātaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā, tassā paññāya tejasā;
atk-abh01a:27_0: Yaṃ devadevo devānaṃ, desetvā nayato puna;
atk-abh01a:30_0: Yañca sutvāna so thero, āharitvā mahītalaṃ.
atk-abh01a:36_0: Saṅgītā anusaṅgītā, pacchāpi ca isīhi yā.
atk-abh01a:50_0: Avikkhittā nisāmetha, dullabhā hi ayaṃ kathāti.
atk-abh01a:52_3: “Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti” “abhikkantavaṇṇā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-abh01a:52_4: Tasmā yathā samussitesu bahūsu chattesu ceva dhajesu ca yaṃ atirekappamāṇaṃ visesavaṇṇasaṇṭhānañca chattaṃ,
atk-abh01a:52_6: yo atirekappamāṇo nānāvirāgavaṇṇavisesasampanno ca dhajo so ‘atidhajo’ti vuccati,
atk-abh01a:52_7: yathā ca ekato sannipatitesu bahūsu rājakumāresu ceva devesu ca yo jātibhogayasaissariyādisampattīhi
atk-abh01a:52_8: atirekataro ceva visesavantataro ca rājakumāro so ‘atirājakumāro’ti vuccati,
atk-abh01a:52_9: yo āyuvaṇṇaissariyayasasampattiādīhi atirekataro ceva visesavantataro ca devo so ‘atidevo’ti vuccati,
atk-abh01a:53_2: abhidhammaṃ patvā pana suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhapucchakanayānaṃ vasena nippadesato vibhattā.
atk-abh01a:53_10: Suttantañca patvā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ekadeseneva vibhattā,
atk-abh01a:53_12: abhidhammaṃ patvā pana tiṇṇampi nayānaṃ vasena nippadesatova vibhattā.
atk-abh01a:53_22: Suttantaṃ patvā ca ñāṇaṃ ekadeseneva vibhattaṃ na nippadesena;
atk-abh01a:53_24: Abhidhammaṃ patvā pana “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā nippadesatova vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh01a:53_25: Tathā ekakato paṭṭhāya anekehi nayehi kilesā.
atk-abh01a:53_26: Suttantaṃ patvā ca bhūmantaraparicchedo ekadeseneva vibhatto,
atk-abh01a:53_28: abhidhammaṃ pana patvā tiṇṇampi nayānaṃ vasena bhūmantaraparicchedo nippadesatova vibhatto.
atk-abh01a:54_0: Pakaraṇaparicchedato panesa dhammasaṅgaṇīvibhaṅgadhātukathāpuggalapaññattikathāvatthuyamakapaṭṭhānānaṃ sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ vasena ṭhito.
atk-abh01a:54_4: Nanu sammāsambuddhassa parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikāni dve vassasatāni atikkamitvā moggaliputtatissattherenetaṃ ṭhapitaṃ?
atk-abh01a:55_0: Sammāsambuddho hi sattappakaraṇāni desento kathāvatthuṃ patvā yā esā puggalavāre tāva catūsu pañhesu
atk-abh01a:55_1: dvinnaṃ pañcakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhamukhā vādayutti taṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu asampuṇṇabhāṇavāramattāya
atk-abh01a:55_4: Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti.
atk-abh01a:55_8: Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti.
atk-abh01a:55_11: Sabbattha puggalo upalabbhati sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhati,
atk-abh01a:55_12: sabbadā puggalo upalabbhati sabbadā puggalo nupalabbhati,
atk-abh01a:55_13: sabbesu puggalo upalabbhati sabbesu puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ vādaṃ nissāya paṭhamaṃ niggahaṃ,
atk-abh01a:55_15: aṭṭhamaṃ nissāya aṭṭhamaṃ niggahaṃ dassentena satthārā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a:55_17: Taṃ panetaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapento imaṃ disvā ṭhapesi –
atk-abh01a:55_18: mama parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ matthake moggaliputtatissatthero nāma
atk-abh01a:55_19: bhikkhu bhikkhusahassamajjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā
atk-abh01a:56_0: Moggaliputtatissattheropi idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ desento na attano ñāṇena desesi,
atk-abh01a:56_2: Iti satthārā dinnanayena ṭhapitamātikāya desitattā sakalampetaṃ pakaraṇaṃ buddhabhāsitameva nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:56_5: Madhupiṇḍikasuttantasmiñhi bhagavā “yatonidānaṃ bhikkhu purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti,
atk-abh01a:56_6: ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṃ abhivaditabbaṃ ajjhositabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a:56_7: esevanto rāgānusayāna”nti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-abh01a:57_0: Dhammappaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū mahākaccānattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dasabalena ṭhapitamātikāya atthaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:57_1: Thero pucchitamattakeneva akathetvā dasabalassa apacitidassanatthaṃ “seyyathāpi āvuso puriso sāratthiko
atk-abh01a:57_2: sāragavesī”ti sāropamaṃ āharitvā sārarukkho viya bhagavā sākhāpalāsasadisā sāvakā,
atk-abh01a:57_4: passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa
atk-abh01a:57_5: dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti satthāraṃ thometvā punappunaṃ therehi yācito satthārā ṭhapitamātikāya atthaṃ
atk-abh01a:57_6: vibhajitvā “ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha
atk-abh01a:57_7: sace sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsandiyamānaṃ sameti gaṇheyyātha,
atk-abh01a:57_8: no ce mā gaṇhitthā”ti iminā adhippāyena “yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-abh01a:58_1: Satthā dukkathitaṃ kaccānenāti avatvā suvaṇṇāliṅgaṃ ussāpento viya gīvaṃ unnāmetvā supupphitasatapattasassirikaṃ
atk-abh01a:58_2: mahāmukhaṃ pūrento brahmassaraṃ nicchāretvā sādhu sādhūti therassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “paṇḍito,
atk-abh01a:58_9: ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyaṃ yathā taṃ mahākaccānena byākata”nti āha.
atk-abh01a:59_0: Evaṃ satthārā anumoditakālato paṭṭhāya ca pana sakalaṃ suttaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:59_2: Evameva sammāsambuddho sattappakaraṇāni desento kathāvatthuṃ patvā vuttanayena mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-abh01a:60_0: Mama parinibbānato aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ matthake moggaliputtatissatthero nāma
atk-abh01a:60_1: bhikkhu bhikkhusahassamajjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā
atk-abh01a:61_0: Moggaliputtatissattheropi imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ desento na attano ñāṇena desesi,
atk-abh01a:61_2: Iti satthārā dinnanayena ṭhapitamātikāya desitattā sakalampetaṃ pakaraṇaṃ buddhabhāsitameva jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:61_3: Evaṃ kathāvatthunāva saddhiṃ satta pakaraṇāni abhidhammo nāma.
atk-abh01a:62_14: vipākato cattārīti ekūnanavuti cittāni cittavibhatti nāma.
atk-abh01a:63_0: Tadanantaraṃ ekavidhena duvidhenātiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena vibhajitvā dassitā rūpavibhatti nāma.
atk-abh01a:64_0: Tadanantaraṃ mūlato khandhato dvārato bhūmito atthato dhammato nāmato liṅgatoti evaṃ mūlādīhi nikkhipitvā desito nikkheparāsi nāma. So –
atk-abh01a:65_0: Mūlato khandhato cāpi, dvārato cāpi bhūmito;
atk-abh01a:66_0: Atthato dhammato cāpi, nāmato cāpi liṅgato;
atk-abh01a:69_0: Tadanantaraṃ pana tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa atthuddhārabhūtaṃ yāva saraṇadukā nikkhittaṃ aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:69_1: Yato mahāpakaraṇiyā bhikkhū mahāpakaraṇe gaṇanacāraṃ asallakkhentā gaṇanacāraṃ samānenti.
atk-abh01a:72_0: Gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ, tampi buddhena desitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:73_1: Taṃ khandhavibhaṅgo āyatanavibhaṅgo dhātuvibhaṅgo saccavibhaṅgo idriyavibhaṅgo paccayākāravibhaṅgo satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgo
atk-abh01a:73_2: sammappadhānavibhaṅgo iddhipādavibhaṅgo bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgo maggaṅgavibhaṅgo jhānavibhaṅgo appamaññāvibhaṅgo
atk-abh01a:73_3: sikkhāpadavibhaṅgo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgo ñāṇavibhaṅgo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo dhammahadayavibhaṅgoti aṭṭhārasavidhena
atk-abh01a:74_3: Tato paraṃ āyatanavibhaṅgādayopi eteheva tīhi nayehi vibhattā.
atk-abh01a:76_1: Sā “khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññattī”ti chabbidhena vibhattā.
atk-abh01a:77_1: Taṃ sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh01a:77_2: Taṃ vācanāmaggato idāni potthake likhitaṃ aggahetvā saṅgītiāropitanayena dīghanikāyappamāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a:78_1: Taṃ mūlayamakaṃ khandhayamakaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ dhātuyamakaṃ saccayamakaṃ saṅkhārayamakaṃ anusayayamakaṃ
atk-abh01a:79_2: Taṃ hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo sahajātapaccayo aññamaññapaccayo
atk-abh01a:79_3: nissayapaccayo upanissayapaccayo purejātapaccayo pacchājātapaccayo āsevanapaccayo kammapaccayo vipākapaccayo
atk-abh01a:79_4: āhārapaccayo indriyapaccayo jhānapaccayo maggapaccayo sampayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayo atthipaccayo
atk-abh01a:80_3: saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammāti ime sataṃ dukā.
atk-abh01a:80_7: Tesu dvāvīsati tikā sataṃ dukāti ayaṃ āhaccabhāsitā jinavacanabhūtā sabbaññubuddhena desitā sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ mātikā nāma.
atk-abh01a:81_0: Athāpare dvācattālīsa suttantikadukā kutopabhavā kena ṭhapitā kena desitāti?
atk-abh01a:81_4: Ime ṭhapento pana thero na sāmukkaṃsikena attano ñāṇena ṭhapesi.
atk-abh01a:81_5: Ekuttariyaṃ pana ekanipātadukanipātasaṅgīti dasuttarasuttantehi samodhānetvā ābhidhammikattherānaṃ suttantaṃ patvā akilamatthaṃ ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a:81_6: Te panete ekasmiṃ nikkhepakaṇḍeyeva matthakaṃ pāpetvā vibhattā.
atk-abh01a:82_0: Sammāsambuddhena hi anulomapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsati tike nissāya tikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:82_1: Sataṃ duke nissāya dukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:82_2: Tato paraṃ dvāvīsati tike gahetvā dukasate pakkhipitvā dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:82_3: Tato paraṃ dukasataṃ gahetvā dvāvīsatiyā tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:82_4: Tike pana tikesuyeva pakkhipitvā tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:82_5: Duke ca dukesuyeva pakkhipitvā dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. Evaṃ –
atk-abh01a:87_3: Dukasataṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:87_5: Duke dukesuyeva pakkhipitvā dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti paccanīyepi chahi nayehi paṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:92_0: Tato paraṃ anulomapaccanīyepi eteneva upāyena cha nayā dassitā. Tenāha –
atk-abh01a:97_0: Tadanantaraṃ paccanīyānulomepi eteheva chahi nayehi niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-abh01a:102_3: paccanīyānulome cha paṭṭhānānīti idaṃ catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānasamodhānaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ mahāpakaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:103_0: Idāni imassa abhidhammassa gambhīrabhāvavijānanatthaṃ cattāro sāgarā veditabbā –
atk-abh01a:106_1: Svāyaṃ yasmā imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppattiyā purimā koṭi na paññāyati ettakānañhi vassasatānaṃ vā vassasahassānaṃ vā vassasatasahassānaṃ vā,
atk-abh01a:106_2: kappasatānaṃ vā kappasahassānaṃ vā kappasatasahassānaṃ vā matthake sattā uppannā,
atk-abh01a:106_5: asukassa buddhassa kāle uppannā tato pubbe nāhesunti vā,
atk-abh01a:106_9: ito pubbe avijjā nāhosi atha pacchā samabhavī”ti iminā pana nayena saṃsārasāgaro anamataggova.
atk-abh01a:107_2: Tattha udakassa āḷhakasatehi vā āḷhakasahassehi vā āḷhakasatasahassehi vā pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a:107_3: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a:108_2: Dvepi hi tantiyo paccavekkhantānaṃ saddhāsampannānaṃ pasādabahulānaṃ ñāṇuttarānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ anantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:108_5: Vinayadharabhikkhūnañhi vinayatantiṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ dosānurūpaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma –
atk-abh01a:108_6: imasmiṃ dose imasmiṃ vītikkame idaṃ nāma hotīti sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ –
atk-abh01a:108_9: Uttarimanussadhammapeyyālaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ nīlapeyyālaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ sañcarittapeyyālaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ anantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:108_10: Ābhidhammikabhikkhūnampi khandhantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ indriyantaraṃ balabojjhaṅgakammavipākantaraṃ
atk-abh01a:108_11: rūpārūpaparicchedaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ gaganatale tārakarūpāni gaṇhanto viya rūpārūpadhamme pabbaṃ pabbaṃ
atk-abh01a:108_12: koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā vibhajanto dassesi vata no satthāti abhidhammatantiṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ anantaṃ
atk-abh01a:109_0: Evaṃ uppattiyā panassa idaṃ vatthupi veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a:109_1: mahāgatigamiyatissadattatthero kira nāma mahābodhiṃ vandissāmīti paratīraṃ gacchanto nāvāya uparitale nisinno mahāsamuddaṃ olokesi.
atk-abh01a:109_2: Athassa tasmiṃ samaye neva paratīraṃ paññāyittha,
atk-abh01a:109_5: So kiṃ nu kho mahāsamuddassa ūmivego balavā udāhu catuvīsatippabhede samantapaṭṭhāne nayamukhaṃ balavanti cintesi.
atk-abh01a:109_11: samantapaṭṭhānassa pana paricchedo na paññāyatīti saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa balavapīti uppannā.
atk-abh01a:109_12: So pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yathānisinnova sabbakilese khepetvā aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāya udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-abh01a:115_4: ayaṃ nayasāgaro nāmāti hi aññena na sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-abh01a:115_5: sabbaññutaññāṇeneva sakkā jānitunti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ñāṇasāgaro nāma.
atk-abh01a:115_6: Imesu catūsu sāgaresu imasmiṃ ṭhāne nayasāgaro adhippeto.
atk-abh01a:116_0: Ayampi bhagavā bodhimūle nisinno ‘imaṃ paṭivijjhitvā imaṃ vata me dhammaṃ esantassa gavesantassa kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-abh01a:116_2: atha me imasmiṃ pallaṅke nisinnena diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ khepetvā ayaṃ dhammo paṭividdho’ti paṭividdhadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a:116_4: Tato tamhā pallaṅkā vuṭṭhāya ‘imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha’nti animisehi cakkhūhi sattāhaṃ pallaṅkaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a:116_5: Tato devatānaṃ ‘ajjāpi nūna siddhatthassa kattabbakiccaṃ atthi,
atk-abh01a:116_6: pallaṅkasmiñhi ālayaṃ na vijahatī’ti parivitakko udapādi.
atk-abh01a:117_0: Satthā devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ ñatvā tāvadeva tāsaṃ vitakkavūpasamanatthaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-abh01a:117_5: Evaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā pallaṅkassa ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antare ākāsato oruyha sattāhaṃ caṅkami.
atk-abh01a:117_6: Imesu ca ekavīsatiyā divasesu ekadivasepi satthu sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
atk-abh01a:118_0: Catutthe pana sattāhe pacchimuttarāya disāya ratanaghare nisīdi –
atk-abh01a:118_2: Sattannaṃ pana pakaraṇānaṃ sammasitaṭṭhānaṃ ratanagharanti veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a:118_3: tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ sammasantassāpi sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
atk-abh01a:118_4: Vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ dhātukathaṃ puggalapaññattiṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ yamakappakaraṇaṃ sammasantassāpi sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
atk-abh01a:118_7: athassa catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaṃ sammasantassa ekantato sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ mahāpakaraṇeyeva okāsaṃ labhi.
atk-abh01a:118_8: Yathā hi timirapiṅgalamahāmaccho caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre mahāsamuddeyeva okāsaṃ labhati,
atk-abh01a:118_9: evameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ekantato mahāpakaraṇeyeva okāsaṃ labhi.
atk-abh01a:119_0: Satthu evaṃ laddhokāsena sabbaññutaññāṇena yathāsukhaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ sammasantassa sarīrato nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhapabhassaravasena
atk-abh01a:119_2: Kesamassūhi ceva akkhīnañca nīlaṭṭhānehi nīlarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-abh01a:119_3: yāsaṃ vasena gaganatalaṃ añjanacuṇṇasamokiṇṇaṃ viya umāpupphanīluppaladalasañchannaṃ viya vītipatantamaṇitālavaṇṭaṃ
atk-abh01a:120_0: Chavito ceva akkhīnañca pītaṭṭhānehi pītarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu;
atk-abh01a:120_1: yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā suvaṇṇarasadhārābhisiñcamānā viya suvaṇṇapaṭapasāritā viya kuṅkumacuṇṇakaṇikārapupphasamparikiṇṇā viya ca virociṃsu.
atk-abh01a:121_0: Maṃsalohitehi ceva akkhīnañca rattaṭṭhānehi lohitarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā cīnapiṭṭhacuṇṇarañjitā
atk-abh01a:122_0: Aṭṭhīhi ceva dantehi ca akkhīnañca setaṭṭhānehi odātarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu;
atk-abh01a:122_1: yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā rajataghaṭehi āsiñcamānakhīradhārāsamparikiṇṇā viya sampasāritarajatapaṭṭavitānā viya,
atk-abh01a:123_0: Mañjiṭṭhapabhassarā pana tamhā tamhā sarīrappadesā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:123_1: Iti tā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā ghanamahāpathaviṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:124_1: Atha mahāpathaviṃ bhinditvā heṭṭhā udakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:124_2: Pathavisandhārakaṃ aṭṭhanahutādhikacatuyojanasatasahassabahalaṃ udakaṃ suvaṇṇakalasehi āsiñcamānavilīnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-abh01a:125_1: Te vinivijjhitvā tāvatiṃse tato yāme tato tusite tato nimmānaratī tato paranimmitavasavattī tato nava
atk-abh01a:125_2: brahmaloke tato vehapphale tato pañca suddhāvāse vinivijjhitvā cattāro āruppe gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:125_3: Cattāro ca āruppe vinivijjhitvā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:126_4: devatānaṃ uyyānavimānakapparukkhesu ceva sarīresu ca ābharaṇesu cāti sabbattha pabhā natthi.
atk-abh01a:126_5: Tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuyā ālokapharaṇasamattho mahābrahmāpi sūriyuggamane khajjopanako viya ahosi.
atk-abh01a:126_10: Saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ pana sammasato lokanāthassa lohitaṃ pasīdi,
atk-abh01a:126_13: Cittasamuṭṭhānā vaṇṇadhātu samantā asītihatthamatte padese niccalāva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a:127_3: Satthā pana evaṃ sattāhaṃ manasā cintitadhammaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā desento vassasatenapi vassasahassenapi
atk-abh01a:127_4: vassasatasahassenapi matthakaṃ pāpetvā desetuṃ na sakkotīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:127_5: Aparabhāgepi hi tathāgato tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ
atk-abh01a:127_6: majjhe nisinno mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā kusalā dhammā,
atk-abh01a:127_8: abyākatā dhammāti dhammaṃ desento satabhāgena sahassabhāgena satasahassabhāgena dhammantarā dhammantaraṃ saṅkamitvā saṅkamitvāva desesi.
atk-abh01a:127_9: Tayo māse nirantaraṃ pavattitadesanā vegena pavattā ākāsagaṅgā viya adhomukhaṭhapitaudakaghaṭā nikkhantaudakadhārā
atk-abh01a:127_10: viya ca hutvā anantā aparimāṇā ahosi.
atk-abh01a:128_0: Buddhānañhi bhattānumodanakālepi thokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anumodentānaṃ desanā dīghamajjhimanikāyappamāṇā hoti.
atk-abh01a:128_1: Pacchābhattaṃ pana sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desentānaṃ desanā saṃyuttaaṅguttarikadvemahānikāyappamāṇāva hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:128_2: Buddhānañhi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko dantāvaraṇaṃ suphusitaṃ mukhādānaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ jivhā mudukā saro madhuro vacanaṃ lahuparivattaṃ.
atk-abh01a:128_3: Tasmā taṃ muhuttaṃ desitadhammopi ettako hoti.
atk-abh01a:129_0: Ānandatthero hi bahussuto tipiṭakadharo pañcadasa gāthāsahassāni saṭṭhi padasahassāni latāpupphāni ākaḍḍhanto
atk-abh01a:129_1: viya ṭhitapadeneva ṭhatvā gaṇhāti vā vāceti vā deseti vā.
atk-abh01a:129_2: Ettako therassa eko uddesamaggo nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:129_3: Therassa hi anupadaṃ uddesaṃ dadamāno añño dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:129_6: Evaṃ adhimattasatimā adhimattagatimā adhimattadhitimā sāvako satthārā temāsaṃ iminā nīhārena desitadesanaṃ
atk-abh01a:129_7: vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ uggaṇhantopi matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:130_0: Evaṃ temāsaṃ nirantaraṃ desentassa pana tathāgatassa kabaḷīkārāhārappaṭibaddhaṃ upādinnakasarīraṃ kathaṃ yāpesīti?
atk-abh01a:130_2: Buddhānañhi so so kālo suvavatthito suparicchinno supaccakkho.
atk-abh01a:130_3: Tasmā bhagavā dhammaṃ desentova manussaloke kālaṃ oloketi.
atk-abh01a:130_4: So bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpetvā ‘imassa cīvaraggahaṇaṃ pattaggahaṇaṃ sarakutti ākappo ca evarūpo nāma hotu,
atk-abh01a:130_5: ettakaṃ nāma dhammaṃ desetū’ti adhiṭṭhāya pattacīvaramādāya anotattadahaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a:130_7: Taṃ khāditvā anotattadahe sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā manosilātale ṭhito surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-abh01a:130_8: cātumahārājadattiyaṃ selamayaṃ pattaṃ ādāya uttarakuruṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a:130_9: Tato piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā anotattadahatīre nisinno taṃ paribhuñjitvā divāvihārāya candanavanaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a:131_0: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi tattha gantvā sammāsambuddhassa vattaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdati.
atk-abh01a:131_4: Evaṃ sammāsambuddhe nayaṃ dente paṭisambhidāppattassa aggasāvakassa velante ṭhatvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā dassitasamuddasadisaṃ nayadānaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:131_5: Therassāpi nayasatena nayasahassena nayasatasahassena bhagavatā desitadhammo upaṭṭhātiyeva.
atk-abh01a:132_0: Satthā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā dhammaṃ desetuṃ kāya velāya gacchatīti?
atk-abh01a:132_1: Sāvatthivāsīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sampattānaṃ dhammadesanavelā nāma atthi,
atk-abh01a:132_3: Dhammaṃ desetvā gacchantaṃ vā āgacchantaṃ vā ke jānanti ke na jānantīti?
atk-abh01a:132_7: Sammāsambuddhassa vā nimmitabuddhassa vā rasmiādīsu nānattābhāvā.
atk-abh01a:132_8: Ubhinnampi hi tesaṃ rasmīsu vā saresu vā vacanesu vā nānattaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a:133_0: Sāriputtattheropi satthārā desitaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ āharitvā attano saddhivihārikānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ desesi.
atk-abh01a:133_2: te kira kassapadasabalassa kāle khuddakavagguliyoniyaṃ nibbattā pabbhāre olambantā dvinnaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-abh01a:133_3: abhidhammaṃ sajjhāyantānaṃ sare nimittaṃ gahetvā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhe ajānitvāpi sare nimittaggāhamattakeneva
atk-abh01a:133_5: Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke vasitvā tasmiṃ kāle manussaloke nibbattā yamakapāṭihāriye pasīditvā therassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:133_6: Thero satthārā desitaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ āharitvā tesaṃ desesi.
atk-abh01a:133_7: Sammāsambuddhassa abhidhammadesanāpariyosānañca tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sattappakaraṇauggahaṇañca ekappahāreneva ahosi.
atk-abh01a:134_2: Thero hi iminā nīhārena dhammantaraṃ amakkhetvāva sukhaṃ gahetuṃ dhāretuṃ pariyāpuṇituṃ vācetuñca pahotīti gaṇanacāraṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-abh01a:134_3: Evaṃ sante therova paṭhamataraṃ ābhidhammiko hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a:134_5: So hi naṃ mahābodhipallaṅke nisīditvā paṭivijjhi.
atk-abh01a:134_6: Buddho hutvā ca pana sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-abh01a:151_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-abh01a:155_0: Ubhinnamantare pañcacattālīsa vassāni pupphadāmaṃ ganthentena viya,
atk-abh01a:155_2: ca kathito amatappakāsano saddhammo majjhimabuddhavacanaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:156_0: Taṃ sabbampi saṅgayhamānaṃ piṭakato tīṇi piṭakāni honti,
atk-abh01a:156_4: Sabbampi hetaṃ piṭakato vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tippabhedameva hoti.
atk-abh01a:156_5: Tattha ubhayāni pātimokkhāni dve vibhaṅgā dvāvīsati khandhakā soḷasa parivārāti idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:156_12: Dhammasaṅgaṇīādīni satta pakaraṇāni abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāma. Tattha –
atk-abh01a:159_3: Tasmā vividhanayattā visesanayattā kāyavācānañca vinayanato ayaṃ vinayo vinayoti akkhāto.
atk-abh01a:165_8: Suṭṭhu ca ne tāyati rakkhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:165_10: Yathā hi tacchakānaṃ suttaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti evametampi viññūnaṃ.
atk-abh01a:165_11: Yathā ca suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni na vikiriyanti na viddhaṃsiyanti evametena saṅgahitā atthā.
atk-abh01a:169_0: Yaṃ ettha vuḍḍhimanto, salakkhaṇā pūjitā paricchinnā;
atk-abh01a:170_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto.
atk-abh01a:171_1: Tathā hesa “bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti,
atk-abh01a:171_6: aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme ca vinaye cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:172_0: Ettha ca “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā.
atk-abh01a:172_1: “Rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhaṇīyattā salakkhaṇāpi.
atk-abh01a:172_10: anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikāpi dhammā vuttā.
atk-abh01a:174_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti.
atk-abh01a:179_0: Idāni tena samodhānetvā tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyāti.
atk-abh01a:179_1: Tena evaṃ duvidhatthena piṭakasaddena saha samāsaṃ katvā vinayo ca so piṭakañca pariyattibhāvato,
atk-abh01a:179_2: tassa tassa atthassa bhājanato cāti vinayapiṭakaṃ.
atk-abh01a:179_3: Yathāvutteneva nayena suttantañca taṃ piṭakañcāti suttantapiṭakaṃ.
atk-abh01a:179_4: Abhidhammo ca so piṭakañcāti abhidhammapiṭakanti evamete tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyā.
atk-abh01a:180_0: Evaṃ ñatvā ca punapi tesveva piṭakesu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ –
atk-abh01a:184_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvaye.
atk-abh01a:185_1: etāni hi tīṇi piṭakāni yathākkamaṃ āṇāvohāraparamatthadesanā,
atk-abh01a:186_0: Ettha hi vinayapiṭakaṃ āṇārahena bhagavatā āṇābāhullato desitattā āṇādesanā;
atk-abh01a:186_1: suttantapiṭakaṃ vohārakusalena bhagavatā vohārabāhullato desitattā vohāradesanā;
atk-abh01a:186_2: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ paramatthakusalena bhagavatā paramatthabāhullato desitattā paramatthadesanāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:187_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ye te pacurāparādhā sattā te yathāparādhaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathāparādhasāsanaṃ;
atk-abh01a:187_1: dutiyaṃ anekajjhāsayānusayacariyādhimuttikā sattā yathānulomaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathānulomasāsanaṃ;
atk-abh01a:187_2: tatiyaṃ dhammapuñjamatte ‘ahaṃ mamā’ti saññino sattā yathādhammaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathādhammasāsananti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:188_0: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ajjhācārapaṭipakkhabhūto saṃvarāsaṃvaro ettha kathitoti saṃvarāsaṃvarakathā;
atk-abh01a:188_1: saṃvarāsaṃvaroti khuddako ceva mahanto ca saṃvarāsaṃvaro,
atk-abh01a:188_2: kammākammaṃ viya ca phalāphalaṃ viya ca;
atk-abh01a:188_3: dutiyaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhipaṭipakkhabhūtā diṭṭhiviniveṭhanā ettha kathitāti diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathā;
atk-abh01a:188_4: tatiyaṃ rāgādipaṭipakkhabhūto nāmarūpaparicchedo ettha kathitoti nāmarūpaparicchedakathāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:189_0: Tīsupi cetesu tisso sikkhā tīṇi pahānāni catubbidho ca gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:189_1: Tathā hi vinayapiṭake visesena adhisīlasikkhā vuttā,
atk-abh01a:192_3: Desanāti tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā.
atk-abh01a:192_6: Yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca tasmā gambhīrā.
atk-abh01a:192_7: Evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:193_16: Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
atk-abh01a:194_0: Idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesu yaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vā atthajātaṃ vā yā cāyaṃ yathā yathā ñāpetabbo attho
atk-abh01a:194_1: sotūnaṃ ñāṇassa abhimukho hoti tathā tathā tadatthajotikā desanā,
atk-abh01a:194_2: yo cettha aviparītāvabodhasaṅkhāto paṭivedho tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo –
atk-abh01a:194_7: Evampi ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:199_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti.
atk-abh01a:200_0: Ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a:201_0: Tattha yā duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā ayaṃ alagaddūpamā.
atk-abh01a:201_6: tamenaṃ bhoge vā naṅguṭṭhe vā gaṇheyya,
atk-abh01a:201_7: tassa so alagaddo paṭiparivattitvā hatthe vā bāhāya vā aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅge ḍaṃseyya,
atk-abh01a:201_8: so tato nidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:201_15: idhekacce moghapurisā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ,
atk-abh01a:201_16: te taṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññāya atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti,
atk-abh01a:201_17: tesaṃ te dhammā paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhataṃ na nijjhānaṃ khamanti,
atk-abh01a:201_18: te upārambhānisaṃsā ceva dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā ca.
atk-abh01a:201_19: Yassa catthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhonti.
atk-abh01a:201_20: Tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-abh01a:202_0: Yā pana suggahitā sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyeva ākaṅkhamānena pariyāpuṭā na upārambhādihetu,
atk-abh01a:202_3: “tesaṃ te dhammā suggahitā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.
atk-abh01a:203_0: Yaṃ pana pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho khīṇāsavo kevalaṃ
atk-abh01a:204_0: Vinaye pana suppaṭipanno bhikkhu sīlasampadaṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a:204_2: Sutte suppaṭipanno samādhisampadaṃ nissāya chaḷabhiññā pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a:204_4: Abhidhamme suppaṭipanno paññāsampadaṃ nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇāti tāsañca tattheva pabhedavacanato.
atk-abh01a:204_5: Evametesu suppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ vijjāttayachaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidāppabhedaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh01a:205_0: Vinaye pana duppaṭipanno anuññātasukhasamphassaattharaṇapāvuraṇādiphassasāmaññato paṭikkhittesu upādinnakaphassādīsu anavajjasaññī hoti.
atk-abh01a:205_3: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
atk-abh01a:205_7: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi”ntiādīsu adhippāyaṃ ajānanto duggahitaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh01a:205_9: “attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati attānañca khanati bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti.
atk-abh01a:205_11: Abhidhamme duppaṭipanno dhammacintaṃ atidhāvanto acinteyyānipi cinteti,
atk-abh01a:205_18: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
atk-abh01a:205_19: Evametesu duppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ dussīlabhāvamicchādiṭṭhitācittakkhepappabhedaṃ vipattiṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-abh01a:207_0: Pāpuṇāti yathā bhikkhu, tampi sabbaṃ vibhāvayeti.
atk-abh01a:208_1: Evaṃ nānappakārato piṭakāni ñatvā tesaṃ vasena sabbampetaṃ saṅgayhamānaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni honti.
atk-abh01a:209_1: Sabbameva hetaṃ dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcappabhedaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:212_4: aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi evaṃ cittaṃ yathayidaṃ,
atk-abh01a:212_9: Evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato lokato ca.
atk-abh01a:213_1: Majjhimappamāṇāni pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni mūlapariyāyasuttādīni diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni.

atk-abh01a:216_1: Devatāsaṃyuttādivasena ṭhitāni oghataraṇādīni satta suttasahassāni satta suttasatāni ca dvāsaṭṭhi ca suttāni.

atk-abh01a:226_1: Sabbameva hidaṃ ‘suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedalla’nti navappabhedaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:226_3: aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:226_8: yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-abh01a:226_10: Dhammapadaṃ theragāthā therīgāthā suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:226_13: Apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādhikāni pañca jātakasatāni jātakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:226_16: acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayapavattā sabbepi acchariyaabbhutadhammappaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā abbhutadhammanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:228_0: Kathaṃ dhammakkhandhato caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti? Sabbameva hidaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:230_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. ;
atk-abh01a:231_5: Abhidhamme ekamekaṃ tikadukabhājanaṃ ekamekañca cittavārabhājanaṃ eko dhammakkhandho.

atk-abh01a:232_0: Evametaṃ sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ pañcasatikasaṅgītikāle saṅgāyantena mahākassapappamukhena vasīgaṇena ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo,

atk-abh01a:232_12: tīsu piṭakesu sandissamānaṃ saṅgahappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvāva sattahi māsehi saṅgītaṃ.
atk-abh01a:233_0: Saṅgītipariyosāne cassa idaṃ mahākassapattherena dasabalassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṃ pavattanasamatthaṃ
atk-abh01a:233_1: katanti sañjātappamodā sādhukāraṃ viya dadamānā ayaṃ mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā anekappakāraṃ
atk-abh01a:234_0: Evaṃ saṅgīte panettha ayaṃ abhidhammo piṭakato abhidhammapiṭakaṃ,
atk-abh01a:235_0: Taṃ dhārayantesu bhikkhūsu pubbe eko bhikkhu sabbasāmayikaparisāya nisīditvā abhidhammato suttaṃ āharitvā dhammaṃ kathento “rūpakkhandho abyākato,
atk-abh01a:235_1: cattāro khandhā siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā;
atk-abh01a:235_3: dve āyatanā siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā;
atk-abh01a:235_5: dve dhātuyo siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā;
atk-abh01a:235_9: dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kusalaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ;
atk-abh01a:235_13: cattāri indriyāni siyā kusalā siyā abyākatā,
atk-abh01a:235_14: cha indriyāni siyā kusalā siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā”ti dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a:236_0: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne eko bhikkhu nisinno ‘dhammakathika tvaṃ sineruṃ parikkhipanto viya dīghasuttaṃ āharasi,
atk-abh01a:236_4: Kiṃ aññaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ āharituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti?

atk-abh01a:236_21: suttantaṃ vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu,
atk-abh01a:236_23: “Suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā abhidhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati,
atk-abh01a:236_24: abhidhamme okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati,
atk-abh01a:236_25: vinaye okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchatī”ti.
atk-abh01a:236_26: ‘Tvaṃ pana ettakampi na jānāsī’ti ettakenapi paravādī niggahito hoti.
atk-abh01a:237_1: Tatra hi dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero aññamaññaṃ pucchitapañhañca vissajjanañca ārocetuṃ satthu santikaṃ
atk-abh01a:237_11: Satthā ābhidhammikā nāma mama sāsane paribāhirāti avatvā suvaṇṇāliṅgasadisaṃ gīvaṃ unnāmetvā puṇṇacandasassirīkaṃ
atk-abh01a:237_12: mahāmukhaṃ pūretvā brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento “sādhu sādhu sāriputtā”ti mahāmoggallānattherassa sādhukāraṃ
atk-abh01a:237_13: datvā “yathā taṃ moggallāno ca sammā byākaramāno byākareyya,
atk-abh01a:237_16: avasesā dhammakathaṃ kathentāpi na dhammakathikā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:237_17: Te hi dhammakathaṃ kathentā kammantaraṃ vipākantaraṃ rūpārūpaparicchedaṃ dhammantaraṃ āloḷetvā kathenti.
atk-abh01a:237_19: Tasmā ābhidhammiko bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathetu vā mā vā,
atk-abh01a:237_22: Idaṃ sandhāya satthā sādhukāraṃ datvā ‘sukathitaṃ moggallānenā’ti āha.
atk-abh01a:238_0: Abhidhammaṃ paṭibāhento imasmiṃ jinacakke pahāraṃ deti,
atk-abh01a:238_5: aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu ekasmiṃ sandissati ukkhepanīyakammatajjanīyakammāraho hoti.
atk-abh01a:238_6: Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ katvā uyyojetabbo ‘gaccha vighāsādo hutvā jīvissasī’ti.
atk-abh01a:239_2: yathā anekesu suttasahassesu ‘ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharatī’tiādinā nayena nidānaṃ sajjitaṃ,
atk-abh01a:239_5: na cetāni na buddhabhāsitānī’ti paṭikkhipitvā uttaripi evaṃ vattabbo – ‘paṇḍita,
atk-abh01a:239_16: Yathā nāma cakkavattirañño hatthiratanaṃ vā assaratanaṃ vā thenetvā yānake yojetvā vicaraṇaṃ nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ;
atk-abh01a:239_17: cakkaratanaṃ vā pana thenetvā palālasakaṭe olambitvā vicaraṇaṃ nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ;
atk-abh01a:239_18: yojanappamāṇaṃ obhāsanasamatthaṃ maṇiratanaṃ vā pana kappāsapacchiyaṃ pakkhipitvā vaḷañjanaṃ nāma aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:239_20: evameva abhidhammo nāma na aññesaṃ visayo,
atk-abh01a:239_26: Na hi sakkā evaṃ vutte paravādinā sahadhammikaṃ udāharaṇaṃ udāharituṃ.
atk-abh01a:240_0: Maṇḍalārāmavāsī tissabhūtitthero pana mahābodhinidāno esa abhidhammo nāmāti dassetuṃ “yena svāhaṃ,
atk-abh01a:240_2: vihārena paṭhamābhisambuddho viharāmi tassa padesena vihāsi”nti imaṃ padesavihārasuttantaṃ āharitvā kathesi.
atk-abh01a:240_14: Tesu satthā mahābodhimaṇḍe pañcakkhandhe nippadesena paṭivijjhi,
atk-abh01a:240_17: Imaṃ temāsaṃ dhammāyatane vedanāvasena dhammadhātuyañca vedanāvaseneva vihāsi.
atk-abh01a:240_32: Evaṃ thero padesavihārasuttantavasena abhidhammassa nidānaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a:241_0: Gāmavāsī sumanadevatthero pana heṭṭhālohapāsāde dhammaṃ parivattento ‘ayaṃ paravādī bāhā paggayha araññe kandanto viya,
atk-abh01a:241_2: abhidhamme nidānassa atthibhāvampi na jānātī’ti vatvā nidānaṃ kathento evamāha –
atk-abh01a:241_3: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā devesu viharati tāvatiṃsesu pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a:241_4: Tatra kho bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ kathesi –
atk-abh01a:242_3: Tattha adhigamanidānaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:242_5: Evaṃ ubhayanidānasampannassa panassa abhidhammassa nidānakosallatthaṃ idaṃ tāva pañhākammaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a:243_13: Ke sikkhantīti sekkhā ca puthujjanakalyāṇā ca.
atk-abh01a:243_15: Ke dhārentīti yesaṃ vattati te dhārenti.
atk-abh01a:244_0: Ayañhi sāriputtatthero bhaddaji sobhito piyajālī piyapālo piyadassī kosiyaputto siggavo sandeho moggaliputto
atk-abh01a:244_1: sudatto dhammiyo dāsako soṇako revatoti evamādīhi yāva tatiyasaṅgītikālā ābhato.
atk-abh01a:244_2: Tato uddhaṃ tesaṃyeva sissānusissehīti evaṃ tāva jambudīpatale ācariyaparamparāya ābhato.
atk-abh01a:245_0: Tato mahindo iṭṭiyo, uttiyo sambalo tathā;
atk-abh01a:246_0: Paṇḍito bhaddanāmo ca, ete nāgā mahāpaññā.
atk-abh01a:248_1: Tato uddhaṃ tesaṃyeva sissānusissasaṅkhātāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanakālā ābhato.
atk-abh01a:250_0: Evaṃ ābhatassa panassa yaṃ taṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā adhigamanidānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:251_0: Ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake amaravatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-abh01a:251_1: Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto,
atk-abh01a:251_4: yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādena,
atk-abh01a:251_5: abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato.
atk-abh01a:251_6: So aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā brāhmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi.
atk-abh01a:251_8: Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādipūrite gabbhe vivaritvā ‘ettakaṃ te kumāra mātu santakaṃ,
atk-abh01a:251_10: ettakā ayyakapayyakānaṃ santakāti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā etaṃ paṭipajjāhī’ti āha.
atk-abh01a:251_12: ‘imaṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekakahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā,
atk-abh01a:251_13: mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti so rañño ārocetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-abh01a:252_0: Kappe ca satasahasse, caturo ca asaṅkhiye;
atk-abh01a:263_0: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato.

atk-abh01a:274_0: Yathāpi uṇhe vijjante, aparaṃ vijjati sītalaṃ;

atk-abh01a:285_0: Na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase.
atk-abh01a:287_0: Na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake.
atk-abh01a:289_0: Na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake.
atk-abh01a:290_0: Yathāpi kuṇapaṃ puriso, kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ jigucchiya;

atk-abh01a:320_1: paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti imissā pāḷiyā sumedhapaṇḍitena assamapaṇṇasālācaṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya vuttā.
atk-abh01a:320_3: mahāsattañhi “himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā ajja dhammikapabbataṃ pavisissāmī”ti nikkhantaṃ disvā sakko devānamindo vissakammadevaputtaṃ āmantesi – “gaccha, tāta,
atk-abh01a:320_4: ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito ‘pabbajissāmī’ti nikkhanto etassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ māpehī”ti.
atk-abh01a:320_5: So tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ramaṇīyaṃ assamaṃ suguttaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ,
atk-abh01a:320_7: Bhagavā pana tadā attano puññānubhāvena nipphannaṃ taṃ assamapadaṃ sandhāya “sāriputta tasmiṃ dhammikapabbate –
atk-abh01a:323_1: Tattha assamo sukato mayhanti sukato mayā.
atk-abh01a:323_2: Paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti paṇṇacchannā sālāpi me sumāpitā ahosi.
atk-abh01a:324_9: Mudusamatale pana phāsuvihāraṃ āgamma kammaṭṭhānaṃ sampajjati.
atk-abh01a:324_11: Caṅkamanassa anto vā majjhe vā koṭiyaṃ vā rukkhe sati pamādamāgamma caṅkamantassa nalāṭaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā paṭihaññatīti antorukkhatā dutiyo doso.
atk-abh01a:324_12: Tiṇalatādigahanacchanne caṅkame caṅkamanto andhakāravelāyaṃ uragādike pāṇe akkamitvā vā māreti,
atk-abh01a:324_13: tehi vā daṭṭho dukkhaṃ āpajjatīti gahanacchannatā tatiyo doso.
atk-abh01a:324_14: Atisambādhe caṅkame vitthārato ratanike vā aḍḍharatanike vā caṅkamantassa paricchede pakkhalitvā nakhāpi
atk-abh01a:324_17: ekaggataṃ na labhatīti ativisālatā pañcamo doso.
atk-abh01a:324_18: Puthulato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ dvīsu passesu ratanamattaanucaṅkamaṃ dīghato saṭṭhihatthaṃ mudutalaṃ samavippakiṇṇavālukaṃ caṅkamaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh01a:325_3: raṭṭhaṃ pīḷetvā dhanasāraṃ vā sīsakahāpaṇādīni vā gaṇhantesu rājakulesu raṭṭhapīḷanakilesābhāvo,
atk-abh01a:325_7: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yathā tasmiṃ assame vasantena sakkā honti imāni aṭṭha samaṇasukhāni vindituṃ,
atk-abh01a:325_8: evaṃ aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ taṃ assamaṃ māpesi” nti.
atk-abh01a:326_0: Abhiññābalamāharinti pacchā tasmiṃ assame vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā abhiññānañca samāpattīnañca
atk-abh01a:326_1: uppādanatthāya aniccato dukkhato vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā thāmappattaṃ vipassanābalaṃ āhariṃ.
atk-abh01a:326_2: Yathā tasmiṃ vasanto taṃ balaṃ āharituṃ sakkomi,
atk-abh01a:326_3: evaṃ taṃ assamaṃ tassa abhiññatthāya vipassanābalassa anucchavikaṃ katvā māpesinti attho.
atk-abh01a:327_2: tadā kira kuṭileṇacaṅkamādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhasañchannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ madhurasalilāsayaṃ
atk-abh01a:327_3: apagatavāḷamigabhiṃsanakasakuṇaṃ pavivekakkhamaṃ assamaṃ māpetvā alaṅkatacaṅkamassa ubhosu antesu ālambanaphalakaṃ
atk-abh01a:327_4: saṃvidhāya nisīdanatthāya caṅkamavemajjhe samatalaṃ muggavaṇṇasilaṃ māpetvā antopaṇṇasālāyaṃ jaṭāmaṇḍalavākacīratidaṇḍakuṇḍikādike
atk-abh01a:327_5: tāpasaparikkhāre maṇḍape pānīyaghaṭapānīyasaṅkhapānīyasarāvāni aggisālāyaṃ aṅgārakapalladāruādīnīti evaṃ
atk-abh01a:327_7: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ māpetvā paṇṇasālāya bhittiyaṃ “ye keci pabbajitukāmā ime parikkhāre gahetvā pabbajantū”ti
atk-abh01a:327_8: akkharāni chinditvā devalokameva gate vissakammadevaputte sumedhapaṇḍito himavantapāde girikandarānusārena
atk-abh01a:327_9: attano nivāsanānurūpaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento nadīnivattane vissakammanimmitaṃ sakkadattiyaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-abh01a:327_10: assamaṃ disvā caṅkamakoṭiṃ gantvā padavalañjaṃ apassanto “dhuvaṃ pabbajitā dhuragāme bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā
atk-abh01a:327_11: kilantarūpā āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnā bhavissantī”ti cintetvā thokaṃ āgametvā “ativiya cirāyanti,
atk-abh01a:327_12: jānissāmī”ti paṇṇasālakuṭidvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā ito cito ca olokento mahābhittiyaṃ akkharāni vācetvā “mayhaṃ kappiyaparikkhārā ete,
atk-abh01a:327_13: ime gahetvā pabbajissāmī”ti attanā nivatthapārutaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ pajahi.
