atk-abh01a:1312_9: evameva viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadesabhūtaṃ ekampi viññāṇaṃ ruḷhito viññāṇakkhandhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1313_0: Tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātūti tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ anucchavikā manoviññāṇadhātu.
atk-abh01a:1313_1: Imasmiñhi pade ekameva cittaṃ minanaṭṭhena mano,
atk-abh01a:1313_3: sabhāvaṭṭhena nissattaṭṭhena vā dhātūti tīhi nāmehi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1313_4: Iti imasmiṃ phassapañcamake phasso tāva yasmā phasso eva,
atk-abh01a:1313_7: tasmā imasmiṃ padadvaye ‘tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā’ti paññatti na āropitā.
atk-abh01a:1313_8: Vitakkapadādīsu pana labbhamānāpi idha pacchinnattā na uddhaṭā.
atk-abh01a:1314_0: Imesañca pana phassapañcamakānaṃ dhammānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vinibbhogaṃ katvā paññattiṃ uddharamānena bhagavatā dukkaraṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1314_1: Nānāudakānañhi nānātelānaṃ vā ekabhājane pakkhipitvā divasaṃ nimmathitānaṃ vaṇṇa gandharasānaṃ nānatāya
atk-abh01a:1314_2: disvā vā ghāyitvā vā sāyitvā vā nānākaraṇaṃ sakkā bhaveyya ñātuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1314_4: Sammāsambuddhena pana imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ
atk-abh01a:1314_5: pāṭiyekkaṃ vinibbhogaṃ katvā paññattiṃ uddharamānena atidukkaraṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1315_6: yaṃ imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ –
atk-abh01a:1315_13: kocideva puriso nāvāya samuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā hatthapuṭena udakaṃ gahetvā jivhāya sāyitvā jāneyya nu kho, mahārāja,
atk-abh01a:1315_23: bhagavatā kataṃ yaṃ imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a:1316_2: Tassa tittakaṃ takkesi kumbhaṃ takkesi sakaṭaṃ takkesi yojanaṃ takkesi addhayojanaṃ takkesīti evaṃ takkanavasena pavatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1316_10: Ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti patiṭṭhāpetīti cetaso abhiniropanā.
atk-abh01a:1316_11: Yāthāvatāya niyyānikatāya ca kusalabhāvappatto pasattho saṅkappoti sammāsaṅkappo.
atk-abh01a:1318_5: Yathā vā bhesajjānaṃ vā telānaṃ vā uṇhodakasītodakānaṃ vā ekatokaraṇaṃ modanāti vuccati,
atk-abh01a:1318_7: Upasaggavasena pana maṇḍetvā āmodanā pamodanāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1318_14: Yathā hi dhanino dhanaṃ paṭicca somanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1318_15: evaṃ pītimatopi pītiṃ paṭicca somanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1318_18: Pītimā pana puggalo kāyacittānaṃ uggatattā abbhuggatattā udaggoti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1318_21: Anabhiraddhassa hi mano dukkhapadaṭṭhānattā attano mano nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a:1318_22: abhiraddhassa pana sukhapadaṭṭhānattā attano mano nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1318_26: Sā pana yasmā na aññassa kassaci attano manatā,
atk-abh01a:1319_3: Apica sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇamhi sampiṇḍetvā tiṭṭhatīti saṇṭhiti.
atk-abh01a:1319_11: Akusalapakkhe pana tayo dhammā ārammaṇaṃ ogāhanti –
atk-abh01a:1319_15: Yathā hi rajuṭṭhānaṭṭhāne udakena siñcitvā sammaṭṭhe thokameva kālaṃ rajo sannisīdati,
atk-abh01a:1319_17: evameva akusalapakkhe cittekaggatā na balavatī hoti.
atk-abh01a:1319_18: Yathā pana tasmiṃ ṭhāne ghaṭehi udakaṃ āsiñcitvā kudālena khanitvā ākoṭanamaddanaghaṭṭanāni katvā upalitte ādāse viya chāyā paññāyati,
atk-abh01a:1320_2: Ayaṃ pana tathāvidho vikkhepo na hotīti avikkhepo.
atk-abh01a:1320_3: Uddhaccavicikicchāvaseneva ca cittaṃ visāhaṭaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a:1320_5: Ayaṃ pana evaṃ avisāhaṭassa mānasassa bhāvoti avisāhaṭamānasatā.
atk-abh01a:1321_4: Tattha aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cittekaggatā cittasamatho nāma.
atk-abh01a:1321_5: Tañhi āgamma cittacalanaṃ cittavipphanditaṃ sammati vūpasammati,
atk-abh01a:1321_8: Tañhi āgamma tāni tāni adhikaraṇāni sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-abh01a:1321_10: Yasmā pana sabbe saṅkhārā nibbānaṃ āgamma sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-abh01a:1322_2: Buddhādīni vā ratanāni saddahati pattiyāyatīti saddhā.
atk-abh01a:1322_6: Buddhādīnaṃ guṇesu etāya sattā ativiya pasīdanti,
atk-abh01a:1322_8: Idāni yasmā saddhindriyādīnaṃ samāsapadānaṃ vasena aññasmiṃ pariyāye āraddhe ādipadaṃ gahetvāva padabhājanaṃ karīyati –
atk-abh01a:1322_15: Evaṃ sabbapadaniddesesu ādipadassa puna vacane payojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1323_1: Vīriyindriyaniddese cetasikoti idaṃ vīriyassa niyamato cetasikabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1323_6: Itihidaṃ uddesaṃ gacchatī”ti evamādīsu suttesu caṅkamādīni karontassa uppannattā ‘kāyika’nti vuccamānampi kāyaviññāṇaṃ viya kāyikaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a:1323_11: saddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kiriyāyaṃ vīriye hiṃsāya vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
atk-abh01a:1326_1: “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
atk-abh01a:1326_2: “Mahāyaññā mahārambhā na te honti mahapphalā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikiriyā.
atk-abh01a:1326_4: “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārabhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā.
atk-abh01a:1326_17: Cittacetasikānaṃ dhāraṇavasena avicchedato vā pavattanavasena kusalasantānaṃ dhāretīti dhiti.
atk-abh01a:1328_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”ti evaṃ pavattikāle asithilaparakkamavasena asithilaparakkamatā;
atk-abh01a:1328_3: Yasmā panetaṃ vīriyaṃ kusalakammakaraṇaṭṭhāne chandaṃ na nikkhipati,
atk-abh01a:1328_9: Yathā pana tajjātike udakasambhinnaṭṭhāne dhuravāhagoṇaṃ gaṇhathāti vadanti,
atk-abh01a:1328_10: so jaṇṇunā bhūmiṃ uppīḷetvāpi dhuraṃ vahati,
atk-abh01a:1328_12: evameva vīriyaṃ kusalakammakaraṇaṭṭhāne dhuraṃ ukkhipati paggaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a:1329_4: Abhimukhaṃ gantvā viya saraṇato paṭisaraṇavasena paṭissati.
atk-abh01a:1329_7: Yasmā pana saraṇatāti tiṇṇaṃ saraṇānampi nāmaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1329_8: tasmā taṃ paṭisedhetuṃ puna satiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1329_18: Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe jotanalakkhaṇe ca indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1330_1: Paññindriyaniddese tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena paññā.
atk-abh01a:1330_2: Tena tena vā aniccādinā pakārena dhamme jānātītipi paññā.
atk-abh01a:1330_9: Sāyeva puna upasagganānattena upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1330_15: Yassa vā uppajjati taṃ aniccādīni cintāpetītipi cintā.
atk-abh01a:1330_18: Ayampi saṇhaṭṭhena vitthaṭaṭṭhena ca bhūrī viyāti bhūrī.
atk-abh01a:1330_21: Tāya pathavīsamāya vitthaṭāya vipulāya paññāya samannāgatoti bhūripaññoti.
atk-abh01a:1330_24: Asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā.
atk-abh01a:1330_26: Yassa uppajjati taṃ attahitapaṭipattiyaṃ sampayuttadhamme ca yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhe parinetīti pariṇāyikā.
atk-abh01a:1330_29: Uppathapaṭipanne sindhave vīthiāropanatthaṃ patodo viya uppathe dhāvanakaṃ kūṭacittaṃ vīthiāropanatthaṃ vijjhatīti patodo viya patodo.
atk-abh01a:1331_3: Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu ekālokā ekobhāsā ekapajjotā hoti,
atk-abh01a:1331_5: Imesu pana tīsu padesu ekapadenapi etasmiṃ atthe siddhe,
atk-abh01a:1331_9: Candāloko sūriyāloko agyāloko paññāloko. Ime kho,
atk-abh01a:1331_22: Attho hi anekehi ākārehi vibhajjamāno suvibhatto hoti.
atk-abh01a:1332_0: Ratikaraṇaṭṭhena pana ratidāyakaṭṭhena ratijanakaṭṭhena cittīkataṭṭhena dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena atulaṭṭhena
atk-abh01a:1332_3: sayaṃ vā ārammaṇe na muyhatīti amoho.
atk-abh01a:1332_8: yvāyaṃ amoho so na kevalaṃ mohato añño dhammo,
atk-abh01a:1333_1: Jīvitindriyaniddese yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyūti tesaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ yo āyāpanaṭṭhena āyu,
atk-abh01a:1333_2: tasmiñhi sati arūpadhammā ayanti gacchanti pavattanti,
atk-abh01a:1333_5: Yasmā panete dhammā āyusmiṃyeva sati tiṭṭhanti yapenti yāpenti iriyanti vattanti pālayanti,
atk-abh01a:1333_11: Evaṃ bujjhantānaṃ pana vasena purimapade rassattaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1334_1: Hiribalaniddese yaṃ tasmiṃ samayeti yena dhammena tasmiṃ samaye.
atk-abh01a:1334_2: Liṅgavipallāsaṃ vā katvā yo dhammo tasmiṃ samayetipi attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1334_8: Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṭilābhaṃ samaṅgībhāvaṃ hiriyati jigucchatīti attho.
atk-abh01a:1335_2: Ottappitabbayuttakena ottappassa hetubhūtena kāyaduccaritādinā vuttappakārāya ca samāpattiyā ottappassa hetubhūtāya ottappati,
atk-abh01a:1336_13: Alobho hi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ mūlaṃ paccayaṭṭhenāti kusalamūlaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1338_1: Kāyapassaddhiniddesādīsu yasmā kāyoti tayo khandhā adhippetā,
atk-abh01a:1338_10: Sabbapadehipi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ kilesadarathapaṭippassaddhi eva kathitā.
atk-abh01a:1339_8: Evaṃ paṭhamena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ lahutākāro kathito.
atk-abh01a:1343_3: Ujukassa khandhattayassa viññāṇakkhandhassa ca bhāvo ujukatā.
atk-abh01a:1344_0: Yo hi pāpaṃ katvāva ‘na karomī’ti bhāsati,
atk-abh01a:1344_4: Yo pāpaṃ karontova ‘ko pāpassa na bhāyeyyā’ti bhāsati,
atk-abh01a:1346_0: Tassa kilesavasena evaṃ vaṅkassa puggalassa bhāvo jimhatā vaṅkatā kuṭilatāti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1346_5: Evaṃ sabbehipi imehi padehi purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1346_6: pacchimanayena viññāṇakkhandhassāti arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ nikkilesatāya ujutākārova kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1347_1: tena dhammuddesavāre dassitānaṃ ‘yevāpanakānaṃ’yeva saṅkhepato niddeso kathito hotīti.
atk-abh01a:1349_0: Ettāvatā pucchā samayaniddeso dhammuddeso appanāti uddesavāre catūhi paricchedehi,
atk-abh01a:1349_1: pucchā samayaniddeso dhammuddeso appanāti niddesavāre catūhi paricchedehīti aṭṭhaparicchedapaṭimaṇḍito dhammavavatthānavāro niṭṭhitova hoti.
atk-abh01a:1351_1: Idāni tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā hontīti saṅgahavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a:1351_3: Tattha ‘tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā’ti evamādiko uddeso.
atk-abh01a:1351_4: Katame tasmiṃ samaye cattāro khandhā’tiādiko niddeso.
atk-abh01a:1351_5: Katamo tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhotiādiko paṭiniddesoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1352_0: Tattha uddesavāre cattāro khandhātiādayo tevīsati koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-abh01a:1352_2: yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1352_6: te sabbepi saṅgayhamānā rāsaṭṭhena cattārova khandhā honti.
atk-abh01a:1352_7: Heṭṭhā vuttena āyatanaṭṭhena dve āyatanāni honti.
atk-abh01a:1352_8: Sabhāvaṭṭhena suññataṭṭhena nissattaṭṭhena dveva dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh01a:1352_9: Paccayasaṅkhātena āhāraṭṭhena tayovettha dhammā āhārā honti.
atk-abh01a:1353_0: ‘Kiṃ panete aññamaññaṃ vā taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa vā paccayā na hontī’ti?
atk-abh01a:1353_3: aññathā cāti samānepi paccayatte atirekapaccayā honti,
atk-abh01a:1353_6: yesaṃ dhammānaṃ avasesā cittacetasikā paccayā honti,
atk-abh01a:1353_9: Manosañcetanāhāro tesañca paccayo hoti tayo ca bhave āharati.
atk-abh01a:1353_10: Viññāṇāhāro tesañca paccayo hoti paṭisandhināmarūpañca āharatī’ti.
atk-abh01a:1353_11: ‘Nanu ca so vipākova idaṃ pana kusalaviññāṇa’nti?
atk-abh01a:1353_14: Upatthambhakaṭṭhena vā ime tayo āhārāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1353_19: “arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-abh01a:1354_1: ajjhattikasantatiyā visesapaccayattā kabaḷīkārāhāro ca ime ca tayo dhammā āhārāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1354_2: Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro;
atk-abh01a:1356_0: Adhipatiyaṭṭhena pana aṭṭheva dhammā indriyāni honti,
atk-abh01a:1357_0: Niyyānaṭṭhena ca hetvaṭṭhena ca pañceva dhammā maggaṅgāni honti.
atk-abh01a:1357_4: lokiyacitte pana ekakkhaṇe tisso viratiyo na labbhanti,
atk-abh01a:1357_7: ariyassetaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacana”nti imasmiṃ sutte ‘yatheva lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko,
atk-abh01a:1357_8: pubbabhāgavipassanāmaggopi tatheva aṭṭhaṅgiko’ti yathāgatavacanena imassatthassa dīpitattā,
atk-abh01a:1357_12: “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a:1357_14: Lokiyacittasmiñhi tisso viratiyo ekakkhaṇe na labbhanti,
atk-abh01a:1358_0: Akampiyaṭṭhena pana satteva dhammā balāni honti.
atk-abh01a:1358_7: Rāsaṭṭhena ceva vedayitaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo vedanākkhandho.
atk-abh01a:1358_8: Rāsaṭṭhena ca sañjānanaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo saññākkhandho.
atk-abh01a:1358_9: Rāsaṭṭhena ca abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo saṅkhārakkhandho.
atk-abh01a:1358_10: Rāsaṭṭhena ca cittavicittaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo viññāṇakkhandho.
atk-abh01a:1358_11: Vijānanaṭṭhena ceva heṭṭhā vuttaāyatanaṭṭhena ca ekameva manāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1358_12: Vijānanaṭṭhena ca adhipatiyaṭṭhena ca ekameva manindriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1358_13: Vijānanaṭṭhena ca sabhāvasuññatanissattaṭṭhena ca ekova dhammo manoviññāṇadhātu nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a:1358_16: yathāvuttena atthena avasesā sabbepi dhammā ekaṃ dhammāyatanameva,
atk-abh01a:1359_0: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samayeti iminā pana appanāvārena idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttā yevāpanakāva saṅgahitā.
atk-abh01a:1363_1: Idāni tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontīti suññatavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a:1363_3: Tattha uddesavāre ‘dhammā hontī’ti iminā saddhiṃ catuvīsati koṭṭhāsā honti.
atk-abh01a:1363_4: Sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ca ‘cattāro dve tayo’ti gaṇanaparicchedo na vutto. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1363_7: Na hettha satto vā bhāvo vā attā vā upalabbhati.
atk-abh01a:1363_8: Dhammāva ete dhammamattā asārā apariṇāyakāti imissā suññatāya dīpanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1363_10: yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1363_11: tasmiṃ samaye cittaṅgavasena uppannā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammā eva honti.
atk-abh01a:1363_12: Na añño koci satto vā bhāvo vā poso vā puggalo vā hotīti.
atk-abh01a:1363_19: Upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena hi jhānameva hetvaṭṭhena maggova hoti.
atk-abh01a:1363_20: Na añño koci satto vā bhāvo vāti.
atk-abh01a:1365_0: Niṭṭhitā ca tīhi mahāvārehi maṇḍetvā niddiṭṭhassa
atk-abh01a:1368_1: Idāni dutiyacittādīni dassetuṃ puna “katame dhammā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1368_2: Tesu sabbesupi paṭhamacitte vuttanayeneva tayo tayo mahāvārā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1368_4: paṭhamacitte vuttasadisānaṃ sabbapadānaṃ atthopi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1368_6: Imasmiṃ tāva dutiyacittaniddese sasaṅkhārenāti idameva apubbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1368_9: Tena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saupāyena paccayagaṇenāti attho.
atk-abh01a:1368_10: Yena hi ārammaṇādinā paccayagaṇena paṭhamaṃ mahācittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1369_1: idhekacco bhikkhu vihārapaccante vasamāno cetiyaṅgaṇasammajjanavelāya vā therupaṭṭhānavelāya vā sampattāya,
atk-abh01a:1369_2: dhammasavanadivase vā sampatte ‘mayhaṃ gantvā paccāgacchato atidūraṃ bhavissati,
atk-abh01a:1369_4: ‘bhikkhussa nāma cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ vā therupaṭṭhānaṃ vā dhammasavanaṃ vā agantuṃ asāruppaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1369_7: parena vā vattādīnaṃ akaraṇe ca ādīnavaṃ karaṇe ca ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā ovadiyamānassa,
atk-abh01a:1369_9: idaṃ karohī’ti kāriyamānassa uppannaṃ kusalacittaṃ sasaṅkhārena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a:1372_2: Idampi hi ārammaṇe haṭṭhapahaṭṭhaṃ hoti paricchindakañāṇaṃ panettha na hoti.
atk-abh01a:1372_3: Tasmā idaṃ daharakumārakānaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā ‘ayaṃ thero mayha’nti vandanakāle,
atk-abh01a:1372_4: teneva nayena cetiyavandanadhammasavanakālādīsu ca uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1372_5: Pāḷiyaṃ panettha sattasu ṭhānesu paññā parihāyati.
atk-abh01a:1375_2: Idaṃ pana sasaṅkhārenāti vacanato yadā mātāpitaro daharakumārake sīse gahetvā cetiyādīni vandāpenti te
atk-abh01a:1378_4: Pāḷiyaṃ panettha jhānacatukke upekkhā hotīti indriyaṭṭhake upekkhindriyaṃ hotīti vatvā sabbesampi vedanādipadānaṃ
atk-abh01a:1378_5: niddese sātāsātasukhadukkhapaṭikkhepavasena desanaṃ katvā adukkhamasukhavedanā kathitā.
atk-abh01a:1378_7: Padapaṭipāṭiyā ca ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pīti parihīnā.
atk-abh01a:1378_8: Tasmā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiāruḷhā pañcapaṇṇāseva dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a:1378_9: Tesaṃ vasena sabbakoṭṭhāsesu sabbavāresu ca vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1381_4: Karuṇāmuditā parikammakālepi hi imesaṃ uppatti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātā eva.
atk-abh01a:1383_0: Tāni sabbānipi dasahi puññakiriyavatthūhi dīpetabbāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a:1383_10: diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthūti imāni dasa puññakiriyavatthūni nāma.
atk-abh01a:1383_12: Puññakiriyā ca sā tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthu cāti puññakiriyavatthu.
atk-abh01a:1384_3: taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge,
atk-abh01a:1384_5: pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇakāle cāti tīsu kālesu pavattā cetanā ‘dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:1385_8: ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā ‘sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:1386_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa…pe… manaṃ… rūpe…pe… dhamme…
atk-abh01a:1386_8: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa pavattā cetanā,
atk-abh01a:1386_9: aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā ārammaṇesu appanaṃ appattā sabbāpi cetanā ‘bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:1388_0: Vuḍḍhatarānaṃ vattappaṭipattikaraṇavasena gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā gāme bhikkhaṃ samādapetvā upasaṃharaṇavasena,
atk-abh01a:1388_1: ‘gaccha bhikkhūnaṃ pattaṃ āharā’ti sutvā vegena gantvā pattāharaṇādivasena ca kāyaveyyāvaṭikakāle ‘veyyāvaccasahagataṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1389_0: Dānaṃ datvā gandhādīhi pūjaṃ katvā ‘asukassa nāma patti hotū’ti vā,
atk-abh01a:1389_2: Kiṃ panevaṃ pattiṃ dadato puññakkhayo hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a:1389_3: Yathā pana ekaṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā tato dīpasahassaṃ jālentassa paṭhamadīpo khīṇoti na vattabbo;
atk-abh01a:1389_4: purimālokena pana saddhiṃ pacchimāloko ekato hutvā atimahā hoti.
atk-abh01a:1389_5: Evameva pattiṃ dadato parihāni nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a:1390_0: Parehi dinnāya pattiyā vā aññāya vā puññakiriyāya ‘sādhu sādhū’ti anumodanavasena ‘abbhanumodanaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1391_0: Eko ‘evaṃ maṃ dhammakathikoti maṃ jānissantī’ti icchāya ṭhatvā lābhagaruko hutvā deseti,
atk-abh01a:1391_2: Eko attano paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ apaccāsīsamāno vimuttāyatanasīsena paresaṃ deseti,
atk-abh01a:1392_0: Eko suṇanto ‘iti maṃ saddhoti jānissantī’ti suṇāti,
atk-abh01a:1392_2: Eko ‘evaṃ me mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī’ti hitapharaṇena muducittena dhammaṃ suṇāti,
atk-abh01a:1393_3: yaṃkiñci puññaṃ karontassa hi diṭṭhiyā ujukabhāveneva mahapphalaṃ hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a:1394_0: Etesu pana puññakiriyavatthūsu dānamayaṃ tāva ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintentassa uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1394_3: Evaṃ pubbacetanaṃ muñcanacetanaṃ aparacetananti tissopi cetanā ekato katvā ‘dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1394_7: Tā sabbāpi ekato katvā ‘sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti…pe…
atk-abh01a:1394_11: Tā sabbāpi ekato katvā ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1395_5: Ye pana ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇa’nti vadanti tesaṃ taṃ tīsupi saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh01a:1395_6: Evametāni saṅkhepato tīṇi hutvā vitthārato dasa honti.
atk-abh01a:1396_0: Tesu ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintento aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva cinteti;
atk-abh01a:1396_2: ‘dānaṃ me dinna’nti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a:1396_5: ‘sīlaṃ me pūrita’nti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a:1396_8: ‘bhāvanā me bhāvitā’ti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a:1397_9: ‘pattiṃ vā sesakusalaṃ vā anumodissāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti;
atk-abh01a:1397_18: ‘Diṭṭhiṃ ujukaṃ karissāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti,
atk-abh01a:1397_19: ujuṃ karonto pana catunnaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ aññatarena karoti,
atk-abh01a:1397_20: ‘diṭṭhi me ujukā katā’ti paccavekkhanto aṭṭhannaṃ aññatarena paccavekkhati.
atk-abh01a:1398_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāri anantāni nāma gahitāni.
atk-abh01a:1398_6: Ākāsassa hi puratthimāya disāya vā pacchimuttaradakkhiṇāsu vā ettakāni vā yojanasatāni ettakāni vā yojanasahassānīti paricchedo natthi.
atk-abh01a:1398_7: Sinerumattampi ayokūṭaṃ pathaviṃ dvidhā katvā heṭṭhā khittaṃ bhassetheva,
atk-abh01a:1399_0: Cakkavāḷānampi satehi vā sahassehi vā paricchedo natthi.
atk-abh01a:1399_2: daḷhathāmadhanuggahassa lahukena sarena tiriyaṃ tālacchāyaṃ atikkamanamattena kālena cakkavāḷasatasahassaṃ
atk-abh01a:1399_3: atikkamanasamatthena javena samannāgatā cattāro mahābrahmāno ‘cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ passissāmā’ti tena
atk-abh01a:1400_0: Ettakesu pana cakkavāḷesu udakaṭṭhakathalaṭṭhakasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-abh01a:1401_0: Evaṃ aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ kāmāvacarasomanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttaasaṅkhārikakusalacittāni ekassa bahūni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a:1401_2: Tāni sabbānipi kāmāvacaraṭṭhena somanassasahagataṭṭhena ñāṇasampayuttaṭṭhena asaṅkhārikaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh01a:1401_3: Ekameva somanassasahagataṃ tihetukaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1401_6: Evaṃ sabbānipi aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uppajjamānāni kāmāvacarakusalacittāni sammāsambuddho mahātulāya tulayamāno viya,
atk-abh01a:1401_8: sabbaññutaññāṇena paricchinditvā ‘aṭṭhevetānī’ti sarikkhaṭṭhena aṭṭheva koṭṭhāse katvā dassesi.
atk-abh01a:1402_0: Puna imasmiṃ ṭhāne chabbidhena puññāyūhanaṃ nāma gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1403_6: Tesu sayaṃkāraṃ karontopi imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva karoti.
atk-abh01a:1403_9: āṇāpetvā karontopi imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva karoti.
atk-abh01a:1404_0: Aparāpi imasmiṃ ṭhāne catasso dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyo gahitā –
atk-abh01a:1404_5: Tattha dhammena samena uppannā paccayā ‘dhammikā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:1404_6: Saddahitvā okappetvā dadato pana ‘cetanāmahattaṃ’ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1404_9: Imāni cattāri samodhānetvā dātuṃ sakkontassa kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a:1405_0: Saṅkhepato panetaṃ sabbampi kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ ‘citta’nti karitvā cittavicittaṭṭhena ekameva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1405_3: Somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittañhi upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ
atk-abh01a:1405_4: mahācittañca ñāṇasampayuttaṭṭhena asaṅkhārikaṭṭhena ca ekameva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1405_8: Evaṃ ñāṇavibhattidesanāvasena catubbidhe panetasmiṃ asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravibhattito cattāri asaṅkhārikāni
atk-abh01a:1405_10: Tāni yāthāvato ñatvā bhagavā sabbaññū gaṇīvaro muniseṭṭho ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkarotīti.
atk-abh01a:1410_1: Idāni rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1410_2: Tattha rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetīti rūpaṃ vuccati rūpabhavo.
atk-abh01a:1410_6: taṃ upapattiṃ maggati gavesati janeti nipphādetīti maggo.
atk-abh01a:1410_8: yena maggena rūpabhave upapatti hoti nibbatti jāti sañjāti,
atk-abh01a:1410_10: Kiṃ panetena niyamato rūpabhave upapatti hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a:1410_13: samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatī”ti evaṃ vuttena hi nibbedhabhāgiyena rūpabhavātikkamopi hoti.
atk-abh01a:1410_14: Rūpūpapattiyā pana ito añño maggo nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a:1410_16: Atthato cāyaṃ maggo nāma cetanāpi hoti,
atk-abh01a:1410_21: pajānāmi nirayagāmiñca magga”nti hi ettha cetanā maggo nāma.
atk-abh01a:1411_0: “Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dānaṃ, dhammā ete sappurisānuyātā;
atk-abh01a:1412_0: Etañhi maggaṃ diviyaṃ vadanti, etena hi gacchati devaloka”nti. ;
atk-abh01a:1413_2: ayaṃ paṭipadā”ti saṅkhārupapattisuttādīsu cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi maggo nāma.
atk-abh01a:1413_3: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ‘jhāna’nti vacanato cetanāsampayuttā adhippetā.
atk-abh01a:1414_2: Aññattha pana upasaggavasena sambhāvanā paribhāvanā vibhāvanāti evaṃ aññathāpi attho hoti.
atk-abh01a:1414_5: paramena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato”ti ayaṃ sambhāvanā nāma;
atk-abh01a:1414_9: paññāparibhāvitaṃ cittaṃ sammadeva āsavehi vimuccatī”ti ayaṃ paribhāvanā nāma;
atk-abh01a:1414_16: yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”ti,
atk-abh01a:1415_1: yathā kāmāvacarakusalaniddese dhammapubbaṅgamā desanā katā tathā akatvā,
atk-abh01a:1415_5: na kāmāvacaraṃ viya vinā paṭipadāya uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:1415_6: Paṭipadā ca nāmesā paṭipannake sati hotīti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ puggalapubbaṅgamaṃ desanaṃ karonto ‘rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī’ti āha.
atk-abh01a:1416_6: tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1416_8: ‘Vivicceva kāmehī’ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati –
atk-abh01a:1416_9: nūnimassa kāmā paṭipakkhabhūtā yesu sati idaṃ na pavattati,
atk-abh01a:1416_11: Tesaṃ pariccāgeneva cassa adhigamo hoti orimatīrapariccāgena pārimatīrasseva.
atk-abh01a:1417_3: Kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā’ti?
atk-abh01a:1417_6: Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a:1417_14: Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusalehi dhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ,
atk-abh01a:1417_15: tasmā ‘vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva akusalehi dhammehī’ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a:1417_16: Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi viviccāti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
atk-abh01a:1417_17: tathāpi kāyaviveko cittaviveko vikkhambhanavivekoti tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh01a:1418_0: Kāmehīti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā?
atk-abh01a:1418_2: ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo,
atk-abh01a:1418_8: ime vuccanti kāmā”ti evaṃ kilesakāmā vuttā,
atk-abh01a:1418_10: Evañhi sati vivicceva kāmehīti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati.
atk-abh01a:1419_0: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati.
atk-abh01a:1419_2: Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanato eva kāmasukhapariccāgo,
atk-abh01a:1419_3: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti.
atk-abh01a:1419_4: Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1419_10: Esa tāva nayo ‘kāmehī’ti ettha vuttakāmesu vatthukāmapakkhe.
atk-abh01a:1420_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana ‘chandoti ca rāgo’ti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva kāmoti adhippeto.
atk-abh01a:1420_1: So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno “tattha katamo kāmacchando kāmo”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto.
atk-abh01a:1420_5: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā?
atk-abh01a:1421_0: Evamettha ‘vivicceva kāmehī’ti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
atk-abh01a:1421_4: tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassa lobhassa,
atk-abh01a:1421_11: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1421_12: Ayaṃ tāva ‘vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī’ti ettha atthappakāsanā.
atk-abh01a:1422_0: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ savitakkaṃ savicārantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1422_1: Tattha heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇādivibhāgena appanāsampayogato rūpāvacarabhāvappattena vitakkena ceva vicārena ca saha vattati.
atk-abh01a:1422_2: Rukkho viya pupphena ca phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ savitakkaṃ savicāranti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1422_3: Vibhaṅge pana “iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā.
atk-abh01a:1423_10: Tesu pana vuttappakārāya pañcavidhāya pītiyā yā appanāsamādhissa mūlaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānā samādhisampayogaṃ gatā pharaṇāpīti –
atk-abh01a:1423_12: Ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa,
atk-abh01a:1423_13: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1423_14: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1423_19: Yatheva hi jhānaṃ evaṃ pītisukhampettha vivekajameva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1423_22: Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1424_5: Ciṇṇavasībhāvo hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:1424_6: Matthakato paṭṭhāya ādiṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:1424_8: Evaṃ pubbuppattiyaṭṭhena pana paṭhamaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1425_2: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo pathavikasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyantīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti saṅkhyaṃ gatā.
atk-abh01a:1425_5: Vipassanāya katakiccassa maggena ijjhanato maggo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1425_6: Phalaṃ pana nirodhasaccaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:1425_8: Tasmā ārammaṇūpanijjhānato paccanīkajjhāpanato vā jhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1426_3: Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1426_5: Viharatīti tadanurūpena iriyāpathavihārena itivuttappakārajjhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa iriyanaṃ vuttiṃ
atk-abh01a:1426_6: pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādeti.
atk-abh01a:1426_8: “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
atk-abh01a:1427_0: Pathavikasiṇanti ettha pathavimaṇḍalampi sakalaṭṭhena pathavikasiṇanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1427_3: Tattha imasmiṃ atthe jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1427_4: Pathavikasiṇasaṅkhātaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti ayañhettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-abh01a:1427_5: Imasmiṃ pana pathavikasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ
atk-abh01a:1427_6: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattukāmena kulaputtena kiṃ kattabbanti?
atk-abh01a:1427_7: Ādito tāva pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvaraājīvapārisuddhipaccayasannissitasaṅkhātāni cattāri sīlāni visodhetvā suparisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhitena,
atk-abh01a:1427_8: yvāssa āvāsādīsu dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi,
atk-abh01a:1427_9: taṃ upacchinditvā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pāḷiyā āgatesu aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu
atk-abh01a:1427_10: attano cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ upaparikkhantena sacassa idaṃ pathavikasiṇaṃ anukūlaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:1427_11: idameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā jhānabhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ
atk-abh01a:1427_17: Sabbakammaṭṭhānānañhi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena gahetvā visuddhimagge vitthāritaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1427_18: Kiṃ tena tattha tattha puna vuttenāti na naṃ puna vitthārayāma.
atk-abh01a:1427_19: Pāḷiyā pana heṭṭhā anāgataṃ atthaṃ aparihāpentā nirantaraṃ anupadavaṇṇanameva karissāma.
atk-abh01a:1428_0: Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye.
atk-abh01a:1428_2: avikkhepo hotīti ime kāmāvacarapaṭhamakusalacitte vuttappakārāya padapaṭipāṭiyā chapaṇṇāsa dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a:1428_4: ime bhūmantaravasena mahaggatā rūpāvacarāti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh01a:1431_1: Dutiyajjhānaniddese vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā,
atk-abh01a:1431_4: Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi,
atk-abh01a:1431_5: aññeyeva hi paṭhamajjhāne phassādayo aññe idha,
atk-abh01a:1431_6: oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
atk-abh01a:1431_7: dīpanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1432_3: Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena ca ceto sampasādayati,
atk-abh01a:1432_5: Imasmiñca atthavikappe ‘sampasādanaṃ cetaso’ti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1432_6: Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe ‘cetaso’ti etaṃ ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1433_2: vitakkavicārehi anajjhāruḷhattā aggo seṭṭho hutvā udetīti attho.
atk-abh01a:1433_4: Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko asahāyo hutvātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a:1433_7: Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi.
atk-abh01a:1433_9: Iti imaṃ ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1434_2: atha kasmā idameva sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvañcāti vuttanti? Vuccate –
atk-abh01a:1434_3: ‘aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:1434_4: tasmā satiyāpi saddhāya sampasādana’nti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1434_5: Na suppasannattā eva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo.
atk-abh01a:1434_7: Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
atk-abh01a:1434_10: Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo;
atk-abh01a:1434_13: Evaṃ vuttena panetena saddhiṃ ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti ca,
atk-abh01a:1435_0: Avitakkaṃ avicāranti bhāvanāya pahīnattā etasmiṃ etassa vā vitakko natthīti avitakkaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1435_3: “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā,
atk-abh01a:1436_1: nanu ca vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti imināpi ayamattho siddho?
atk-abh01a:1436_2: Atha kasmā puna ‘vuttaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāra’nti? Vuccate – evametaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1436_6: ‘oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ samadhigamo
atk-abh01a:1436_7: hotīti dīpanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti evaṃ vutta’nti.
atk-abh01a:1437_4: na paṭhamajjhānamiva ca aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1437_5: Tathā vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ,
atk-abh01a:1437_10: Vitakkavicārābhāvamattaparidīpakameva pana avitakkaṃ avicāranti idaṃ vacanaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1438_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho.
atk-abh01a:1438_2: atha kho ayameva samādhi ‘samādhī’ti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-abh01a:1438_4: Tasmā imassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ idameva samādhijanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1439_2: Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotītiādīsu jhānapañcake vitakkavicārapadāni maggapañcake ca sammāsaṅkappapadaṃ parihīnaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1442_1: Tatiyajjhānaniddese pītiyā ca virāgāti virāgo nāma vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā.
atk-abh01a:1442_4: So vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ vā.
atk-abh01a:1442_5: Tattha yadā vūpasamameva sampiṇḍeti tadā pītiyā virāgā ca,
atk-abh01a:1442_6: kiñca bhiyyo ‘vūpasamā’ cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1442_7: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo jigucchanattho hoti.
atk-abh01a:1442_8: Tasmā pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a:1442_9: Yadā pana vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamaṃ sampiṇḍeti tadā pītiyā ca virāgā kiñca bhiyyo ‘vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā’ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1442_10: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti,
atk-abh01a:1442_11: tasmā pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a:1443_1: imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1443_2: Vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati –
atk-abh01a:1443_4: Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge appahīnānampi sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā”ti
atk-abh01a:1443_7: evameva idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1444_4: Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī upekkhakoti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1445_1: chaḷaṅgupekkhā brahmavihārupekkhā bojjhaṅgupekkhā vīriyupekkhā saṅkhārupekkhā vedanupekkhā vipassanupekkhā
atk-abh01a:1446_2: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti,
atk-abh01a:1446_4: upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
atk-abh01a:1447_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a:1448_0: Yā “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a:1449_0: Yā pana “kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a:1450_3: dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti evamāgatā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanāgahaṇe majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a:1451_0: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaṅkhātā upekkhā ayaṃ ‘vedanupekkhā’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:1452_3: upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a:1453_0: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā ayaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1454_0: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā,
atk-abh01a:1455_0: Yā “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-abh01a:1456_0: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā
atk-abh01a:1456_1: ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1456_2: Tena tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo.
atk-abh01a:1456_3: Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvathera senāpatirājādivasena bhedo viya.
atk-abh01a:1456_4: Tasmā tāsu yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā na tattha bojjhaṅgupekkhādayo,
atk-abh01a:1456_5: yattha vā pana bojjhaṅgupekkhā na tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhādayo hontīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1457_2: Paññā eva hi esā kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā.
atk-abh01a:1457_3: Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake
atk-abh01a:1457_4: nipannaṃ disvā ‘sappo nu kho no’ti avalokentassa sovatthikattayaṃ disvā nibbematikassa ‘sappo,
atk-abh01a:1457_6: evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1457_8: Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍakena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā ‘kintāhaṃ imaṃ sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca
atk-abh01a:1457_9: iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya’nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti;
atk-abh01a:1457_14: Iti vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1457_15: Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu majjhattasaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti.
atk-abh01a:1457_16: Viriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca avasesāhi ca atthato bhinnāyevāti.
atk-abh01a:1458_1: Sā majjhattalakkhaṇā anābhogarasā abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānā pītivirāgapadaṭṭhānāti. Etthāha –
atk-abh01a:1458_4: tasmā tatrāpi ‘upekkhako ca viharatī’ti evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā.
atk-abh01a:1458_9: Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā,
atk-abh01a:1461_0: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato.
atk-abh01a:1461_2: Iti puggalena sati ca sampajaññañca vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1462_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi –
atk-abh01a:1462_1: muṭṭhassatissa hi asampajānassa upacāramattampi na sampajjati,
atk-abh01a:1462_9: satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1462_11: Yathā dhenupago vaccho dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati,
atk-abh01a:1462_12: evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ pītito apanītampi satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya,
atk-abh01a:1462_18: no aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1463_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṃvedanābhogo natthi,
atk-abh01a:1463_1: evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1463_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo,
atk-abh01a:1463_4: yassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya,
atk-abh01a:1463_5: tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento ‘sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī’ti āha.
atk-abh01a:1464_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ
atk-abh01a:1464_1: buddhādayo ariyā “ācikkhanti desenti paññāpenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāse”nti
atk-abh01a:1464_4: taṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1465_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti?
atk-abh01a:1465_2: Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako,
atk-abh01a:1465_4: ‘yathā ca pīti na uppajjati’ evaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya satimā,
atk-abh01a:1465_5: yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti tasmā pasaṃsāraho;
atk-abh01a:1465_6: iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsentā ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti evaṃ pasaṃsantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1466_2: Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotītiādīsu jhānapañcake pītipadampi parihīnaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1469_1: Catutthajjhānaniddese sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
atk-abh01a:1469_2: Pubbevāti tañca kho pubbeva na catutthajjhānakkhaṇe.
atk-abh01a:1469_3: Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā;
atk-abh01a:1469_9: Evametesaṃ pahānakkamena avuttānaṃ indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassānaṃ
atk-abh01a:1470_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti,
atk-abh01a:1470_1: atha kasmā “kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati? Idha,
atk-abh01a:1470_12: Etthuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti?
atk-abh01a:1470_18: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā,
atk-abh01a:1470_21: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:1470_23: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti.
atk-abh01a:1470_24: Sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1470_26: Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1470_29: appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti,
atk-abh01a:1470_32: Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa siyā uppatti,
atk-abh01a:1470_34: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhāti.
atk-abh01a:1470_36: appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca,
atk-abh01a:1470_39: Tasmā eva ca ‘etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī’ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
atk-abh01a:1471_1: ‘athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā’ti?
atk-abh01a:1471_3: Yā hi ayaṃ ‘adukkhamasukha’nti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
atk-abh01a:1471_7: Tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa gahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje sabbā gāvo samāharati,
atk-abh01a:1471_10: evameva bhagavā sukhagahaṇatthaṃ sabbāpi etā samāharīti.
atk-abh01a:1471_11: Evañhi samāhaṭā etā dassetvā yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1471_13: ayaṃ adukkhamasukhāvedanāti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
atk-abh01a:1472_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1472_6: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, ime kho, āvuso,
atk-abh01a:1472_8: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ tattha pahīnāti vuttā,
atk-abh01a:1472_9: evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1472_10: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1472_15: Sukhādighātena ca sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
atk-abh01a:1474_2: Yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi sā upekkhāya katā,
atk-abh01a:1474_6: “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā,
atk-abh01a:1474_8: Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha sati pārisuddhi hoti sā atthato tatramajjhattatāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1474_9: Na kevalañcettha tāya satiyeva parisuddhā apica kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammā.
atk-abh01a:1475_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati –
atk-abh01a:1475_1: yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā
atk-abh01a:1475_2: divā vijjamānāpi candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā –
atk-abh01a:1475_3: evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā
atk-abh01a:1475_5: Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti.
atk-abh01a:1475_7: Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā sabhāgāya ca upekkhā vedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ
atk-abh01a:1475_9: Tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā.
atk-abh01a:1476_2: Phasso hotītiādīsu phassapañcake tāva vedanāti upekkhāvedanā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1476_3: Jhānapañcakaindriyaaṭṭhakesu pana upekkhā hoti upekkhindriyaṃ hotīti vuttameva.
atk-abh01a:1479_1: Idāni katame dhammā kusalāti pañcakanayo āraddho.
atk-abh01a:1479_4: Sannisinnadevaparisāya kira ekaccānaṃ devānaṃ vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-abh01a:1479_6: Tesaṃ sappāyavasena satthā caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi.
atk-abh01a:1479_9: Tesaṃ sappāyavasena tivaṅgikaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi.
atk-abh01a:1479_12: Tesaṃ sappāyavasena duvaṅgikaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi.
atk-abh01a:1479_15: Tesaṃ sappāyavasena duvaṅgikaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi.
atk-abh01a:1480_0: Yassā pana dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā desanāvilāsappatto nāma hoti –
atk-abh01a:1480_2: tasmā ñāṇamahattatāya desanāvidhānesu kusalo desanāvilāsappatto satthā yaṃ yaṃ aṅgaṃ labbhati tassa tassa
atk-abh01a:1480_3: vasena yathā yathā icchati tathā tathā desanaṃ niyāmetīti so idha pañcaṅgikaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhājesi,
atk-abh01a:1481_4: avitakkaavicāro samādhī”ti suttante tayo samādhī desitā,
atk-abh01a:1481_5: tesu heṭṭhā savitakkasavicāro samādhi avitakkaavicāro samādhi ca bhājetvā dassito,
atk-abh01a:1481_7: Taṃ dassetumpi ayaṃ pañcakanayo āraddhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1482_1: koṭṭhāsavāre “caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti caturaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti ayameva viseso.
atk-abh01a:1482_3: Yāni ca catukkanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthāni tāneva idha tatiyacatutthapañcamāni.
atk-abh01a:1483_0: Eko kira amaccaputto rājānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ janapadato nagaraṃ āgato.
atk-abh01a:1483_1: So ekadivasameva rājānaṃ disvā pānabyasanena sabbaṃ vibhavajātaṃ nāsesi.
atk-abh01a:1483_2: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ surāmadamattaṃ niccoḷaṃ katvā jiṇṇakaṭasārakamattena paṭicchādetvā pānāgārato nīhariṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1483_3: Tamenaṃ saṅkārakūṭe nipajjitvā niddāyantaṃ eko aṅgavijjāpāṭhako disvā ‘ayaṃ puriso mahājanassa avassayo bhavissati,
atk-abh01a:1483_4: paṭijaggitabbo eso’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā mattikāya nhāpetvā thūlasāṭakayugaṃ nivāsāpetvā puna gandhodakena
atk-abh01a:1483_5: nhāpetvā sukhumena dukūlayugaḷena acchādetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā ‘evaṃ naṃ paricāreyyāthā’ti
atk-abh01a:1483_8: Pānāgāragamanapaṭibāhanatthañca naṃ cattāro tāva janā catūsu hatthapādesu uppīḷetvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1484_0: So sayanupagamanena vigatakilamatho thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito hatthapādanippīḷanaṃ asahamāno ‘ko me hatthapāde uppīḷeti?
atk-abh01a:1484_3: Tato puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito pādaparimajjanaṃ asahamāno ‘ko me pāde parimajjati?
atk-abh01a:1484_6: Puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito vātavuṭṭhi viya tālavaṇṭavātaṃ asahanto ‘ko esa?
atk-abh01a:1484_9: Puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito kaṇṇasūlaṃ viya gītavāditasaddaṃ asahamāno vīṇāvādakaṃ tajjesi.
atk-abh01a:1484_11: Athevaṃ anukkamena pahīnakilamathuppīḷanaparimajjanavātappahāragītavāditasaddupaddavo sukhaṃ sayitvā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-abh01a:1485_0: Tattha pānabyasanena pārijuññappatto so amaccaputto viya anekabyasanapārijuññappatto gharāvāsagato kulaputto daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh01a:1485_3: paṭijagganaṃ arahatī’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ viya tathāgatassa ‘ayaṃ mahājanassa avassayo bhavissati,
atk-abh01a:1486_0: Athassa amaccaputtassa mattikāmattena nhāpanaṃ viya kulaputtassāpi pabbajjāpaṭilābho.
atk-abh01a:1487_0: Dukūlacchāditassa panassa pāsādāropanaṃ viya imassāpi sīlavisuddhidukūlacchāditassa samādhibhāvanāpāsādārohanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1488_0: Bhuttabhojanassa pana tassa paricārakehi sayanāropanaṃ viya imassāpi vitakkādīhi upacārajjhānāropanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1488_1: Puna tassa pānāgāragamanapaṭibāhanatthaṃ hatthapāduppīḷanakapurisacatukkaṃ viya imassāpi kāmasaññābhimukhagamanapaṭibāhanatthaṃ
atk-abh01a:1488_3: Tassa pādaparimajjakapuriso viya imassāpi ārammaṇe cittānumajjanako vicāro.
atk-abh01a:1488_4: Tassa tālavaṇṭavātadāyako viya imassāpi cetaso sītalabhāvadāyikā pīti.
atk-abh01a:1489_0: Tassa sotānuggahakaro gandhabbapuriso viya imassāpi cittānuggāhakaṃ somanassaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1489_1: Tassa sayanupagamanena vigatakilamathassa thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi upacārajjhānasannissayena
atk-abh01a:1490_0: Athassa niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hatthapāduppīḷanāsahanena hatthapāduppīḷakānaṃ santajjanaṃ tesañca apagamanena
atk-abh01a:1490_1: puna thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa cittuppīḷakavitakkāsahanena vitakkadosadassanaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1491_0: Tato tassa punappunaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa yathāvuttena kamena pādaparimajjanādīnaṃ asahanena paṭipāṭiyā pādaparimajjakādīnaṃ santajjanaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1491_1: tesaṃ tesañca apagamanena punappunaṃ thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi punappunaṃ dutiyādīhi jhānehi
atk-abh01a:1491_2: vuṭṭhitassa yathāvuttadosānaṃ vicārādīnaṃ asahanena paṭipāṭiyā vicārādidosadassanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1491_3: Tesaṃ tesañca pahānā punappunaṃ avitakkaavicāranippītika pahīnasomanassajjhānupagamanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1492_0: Tassa pana sayanā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ gatassa issariyappatti viya imassāpi pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa vipassanā maggaṃ upagatassa arahattappatti.
atk-abh01a:1493_0: Tassa pattissariyassa bahūnaṃ janānaṃ avassayabhāvo viya imassāpi arahattappattassa bahūnaṃ avassayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1493_1: Ettāvatā hi esa anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-abh01a:1495_0: Ettāvatā catukkapañcakanayadvayabhedo suddhikanavako nāma pakāsito hoti.
atk-abh01a:1495_1: Atthato panesa pañcakanaye catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā jhānapañcako evāti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1497_1: Idāni yasmā etaṃ jhānaṃ nāma paṭipadākamena sijjhati,
atk-abh01a:1497_2: tasmā tassa paṭipadābhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1497_5: Iti dukkhapaṭipadanti vā dandhābhiññanti vā pathavīkasiṇanti vā tīṇipi jhānasseva nāmāni.
atk-abh01a:1498_0: Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati tāva pavattā jhānabhāvanā ‘paṭipadā’ti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1498_1: Upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā tāva pavattā paññā ‘abhiññā’ti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1498_2: Sā panesā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti.
atk-abh01a:1498_8: Tasmā yo ādito kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti,
atk-abh01a:1498_10: Yo pana vikkhambhitakileso appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a:1498_12: Yo khippaṃ aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti tassa khippābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1498_13: Yo kilese vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti,
atk-abh01a:1499_0: Tattha yāni sappāyāsappāyāni ca palibodhupacchedādīni pubbakiccāni ca appanākosallāni ca visuddhimagge cittabhāvanāniddese niddiṭṭhāni,
atk-abh01a:1499_2: tassa dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā ca abhiññā hoti.
atk-abh01a:1499_3: Sappāyasevino sukhā paṭipadā khippā ca abhiññā.
atk-abh01a:1499_4: Yo pana pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti,
atk-abh01a:1499_5: pubbabhāge vā sappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge asappāyasevī,
atk-abh01a:1499_7: Tathā palibodhupacchedādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuttassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti,
atk-abh01a:1499_9: Appanākosallāni pana asampādentassa dandhā abhiññā hoti,
atk-abh01a:1500_0: Apica taṇhāavijjāvasena samathavipassanākatādhikāravasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1500_5: Yo ca samathe akatādhikāro tassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti,
atk-abh01a:1501_1: Tibbakilesassa hi mudindriyassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā,
atk-abh01a:1501_3: Mandakilesassa ca mudindriyassa sukhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā,
atk-abh01a:1502_0: Iti imāsu paṭipadāabhiññāsu yo puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhāya abhiññāya jhānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a:1502_1: tassa taṃ jhānaṃ dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1503_0: Tattha ‘tadanudhammatā sati santiṭṭhati ṭhitibhāginī paññā’ti evaṃ vuttasatiyā vā taṃtaṃjhānanikantiyā vā vikkhambhane paṭipadā,
atk-abh01a:1503_1: taṃtaṃjhānupacārappattassa appanāya parivāse abhiññā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1503_3: Dukkhapaṭipadañhi dandhābhiññaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ patvā pavattaṃ dutiyampi tādisameva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1503_5: Yathā ca catukkanaye evaṃ pañcakanayepi paṭipadāvasena catudhā bhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1503_6: Iti paṭipadāvasenapi cattāro navakā vuttā honti.
atk-abh01a:1503_8: atthato pana pañcakanaye catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā vīsatimeva bhavantīti.
atk-abh01a:1506_1: Idāni yasmā etaṃ jhānaṃ nāma yathā paṭipadābhedena evaṃ ārammaṇabhedenāpi catubbidhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1506_2: Tasmāssa taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1506_3: Tattha parittaṃ parittārammaṇantiādīsu yaṃ appaguṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:1506_6: Yaṃ pana avaḍḍhite suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā ārammaṇe pavattaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1506_8: Yaṃ paguṇaṃ subhāvitaṃ uparijjhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:1506_10: Yaṃ vipule ārammaṇe pavattaṃ taṃ vuḍḍhippamāṇattā appamāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assāti appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1506_12: Iti ārammaṇavasenapi cattāro navakā vuttā honti.
atk-abh01a:1509_1: Idāni ārammaṇapaṭipadāmissakaṃ soḷasakkhattukanayaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1509_2: Tattha paṭhamanaye vuttajjhānaṃ dukkhapaṭipadattā dandhābhiññattā parittattā parittārammaṇattāti catūhi kāraṇehi hīnaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1509_3: soḷasamanaye vuttajjhānaṃ sukhapaṭipadattā khippābhiññattā appamāṇattā appamāṇārammaṇattāti catūhi kāraṇehi paṇītaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1509_4: Sesesu cuddasasu ekena dvīhi tīhi ca kāraṇehi hīnappaṇītatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1510_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi pathavīkasiṇe suddhikajjhānaṃ catukkanayavasena pañcakanayavasena ca dassitaṃ;
atk-abh01a:1510_5: Tattha yā devatā pathavīkasiṇe suddhikajjhānaṃ catukkanayavasena desiyamānaṃ bujjhituṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh01a:1510_11: tāsaṃ sappāyavasena suddhikapaṭipadāya suddhikārammaṇe catukkanayo desito.
atk-abh01a:1510_12: Yā pañcakanayavasena desiyamānaṃ bujjhituṃ sakkonti tāsaṃ sappāyavasena pañcakanayo.
atk-abh01a:1511_0: Desanāvilāsappatto cesa pabhinnapaṭisambhido dasabalacatuvesārajjavisadañāṇo dhammānaṃ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇassa
atk-abh01a:1511_1: suppaṭividdhattā dhammapaññattikusalatāya yo yo nayo labbhati tassa tassa vasena desanaṃ niyametuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:1511_2: tasmā imāya desanāvilāsappattiyāpi tena esā pathavīkasiṇe suddhikacatukkanayādivasena desanā katā.
atk-abh01a:1512_0: Yasmā pana ye keci jhānaṃ uppādenti nāma na te ārammaṇapaṭipadāhi vinā uppādetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh01a:1512_1: tasmā niyamato jhānuppattikāraṇattā ayaṃ soḷasakkhattukanayo kathito.
atk-abh01a:1513_3: ime ca soḷasa navakāti pañcavīsati navakā kathitā honti.
atk-abh01a:1513_4: Tattha ekekasmiṃ navake catukkapañcakavasena dve dve nayāti paññāsa nayā.
atk-abh01a:1513_6: pañcakanayesu pañcavīsasata”nti pāṭhato pañcavīsādhikāni dve jhānacittasatāni honti.
atk-abh01a:1513_7: Pañcakanaye pana catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā atthato pañcavīsādhikameva cittasataṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1513_8: Yāni cetāni pāṭhe pañcavīsādhikāni dve cittasatāni tesu ekekassa niddese dhammavavatthānādayo tayo tayo mahāvārā honti.
atk-abh01a:1513_9: Te pana tattha tattha nayamattameva dassetvā saṃkhittāti.
atk-abh01a:1515_1: Idāni yasmā āpokasiṇādīsupi etāni jhānāni uppajjanti,
atk-abh01a:1515_2: tasmā tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1515_3: Tesu sabbo pāḷinayo ca atthavibhāvanā ca cittagaṇanā ca vārasaṅkhepo ca pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1515_4: Bhāvanānayo pana kasiṇaparikammaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbo visuddhimagge (visuddhi 1.91 ādayo) pakāsitoyeva.
atk-abh01a:1515_6: Tesu viññāṇakasiṇaṃ ākāse pavattitamahaggataviññāṇampi tattha parikammaṃ katvā nibbattā viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattipi
atk-abh01a:1516_3: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ catukkapañcakajjhānampi vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1516_6: Iti missakattā imaṃ rūpāvacaradesanaṃ na āruḷhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1516_7: Paricchedākāse nibbattajjhānaṃ pana rūpūpapattiyā maggo hoti tasmā taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1516_11: Tañhi punappunaṃ ugghāṭiyamānampi ākāsameva hotīti na tattha kasiṇugghāṭanaṃ labbhati,
atk-abh01a:1516_16: Anupubbanirodho panettha yāva pañcamajjhānā labbhati vaṭṭapādakaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-abh01a:1516_17: Yathā cetaṃ evaṃ purimakasiṇesu uppannaṃ jhānampi.
atk-abh01a:1516_19: Sesamettha ākāsakasiṇe yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva.
atk-abh01a:1517_0: ‘Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī’tiādinayaṃ pana vikubbanaṃ icchantena purimesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-abh01a:1518_1: pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṃ sampādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-abh01a:1518_6: Uppanne nimitte taṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanādhigamo bhāro,
atk-abh01a:1518_13: satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisanti hoti.
atk-abh01a:1518_14: Therambatthale mahārohanaguttattherassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatesu tiṃsamattesu iddhimantasahassesu upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko rakkhitatthero viya.
atk-abh01a:1521_2: idāni yasmā samānepi ārammaṇe bhāvanāya asamānaṃ imesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aññampi abhibhāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pavattati,
atk-abh01a:1521_3: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1521_4: Tattha ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-abh01a:1521_5: Bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu kataparikammatāya parikammavasena ceva appanāvasena
atk-abh01a:1521_6: ca tāni bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu rūpāni passati.
atk-abh01a:1521_8: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā ‘kiṃ ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī’ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti,
atk-abh01a:1521_9: evameva ñāṇuttariko puggalo visadañāṇo ‘kimettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi,
atk-abh01a:1521_10: nāyaṃ mama bhāro’ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
atk-abh01a:1521_12: Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa pubbabhāgo kathito.
atk-abh01a:1522_1: Abhibhuyyāti ettha pana yathā mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā ‘aññāpi hotu ‘kimesā mayhaṃ karissatī’ti taṃ na mahantato passati,
atk-abh01a:1522_4: na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro atthī’ti tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
atk-abh01a:1523_0: Parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ parittārammaṇanti idha parittānīti āgatattā appamāṇārammaṇatā na gahitā,
atk-abh01a:1523_3: ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāri cattāri ārammaṇāni aggahetvā dve dveva gahitāni.
atk-abh01a:1523_5: Catūsu hi gahitesu desanā soḷasakkhattukā hoti,
atk-abh01a:1523_6: satthārā ca heṭṭhā soḷasakkhattukā desanā kilañjamhi tile pattharantena viya vitthārato kathitā.
atk-abh01a:1523_7: Tassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhakkhattukaṃ desanaṃ kātuṃ ajjhāsayo.
atk-abh01a:1524_3: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana ‘suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā,
atk-abh01a:1524_5: Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ,
atk-abh01a:1524_10: Sā ca tesaṃ sappāyatā vitthārato visuddhimagge cariyaniddese vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1525_1: yathā suttante “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1525_2: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttāti?
atk-abh01a:1525_4: Tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhārūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
atk-abh01a:1525_5: tasmā tāni niyamato vattabbānīti tatrapi idhapi vuttāni.
atk-abh01a:1525_6: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattameva.
atk-abh01a:1525_8: Suddhikanayapaṭipadābhedo panettha pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva ekekasmiṃ abhibhāyatane veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1525_15: ārammaṇapaṭipadāmissake aṭṭha navakāti pannarasa navakāti catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu samasaṭṭhi navakā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1526_10: Suvisuddhavaṇṇavasena hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni.
atk-abh01a:1526_13: Pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vātiādikaṃ panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca parikammañca appanāvidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttameva.
atk-abh01a:1526_14: Yathā ca pathavīkasiṇe evamettha ekekasmiṃ abhibhāyatane pañcavīsati pañcavīsati navakā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1529_1: Idāni yasmā idaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ āyatanānaṃ abhibhavanato abhibhāyatanavaseneva uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1529_3: tasmā tampi nayaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1530_5: Pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1530_6: Evaṃlakkhaṇañhi vimokkhabhāvappattaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ nayo āraddho.
atk-abh01a:1531_0: Tattha rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1531_2: Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti.
atk-abh01a:1531_3: Pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-abh01a:1531_4: Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-abh01a:1531_5: Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-abh01a:1531_6: Evaṃ parikammaṃ katvā uppannajjhānasamaṅginaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1531_7: Rūpāni passatīti bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati.
atk-abh01a:1532_2: Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā.
atk-abh01a:1533_0: Subhanti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni.
atk-abh01a:1533_2: yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhakasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati,
atk-abh01a:1533_7: Paṭisambhidāmagge pana “kathaṃ subhantveva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho?
atk-abh01a:1533_8: Idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ…pe… viharati,
atk-abh01a:1533_9: mettāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti; karuṇā… muditā…
atk-abh01a:1533_12: evaṃ subhantveva adhimutto hotī”ti vimokkhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1533_13: Idha pana upari pāḷiyaṃyeva brahmavihārānaṃ āgatattā taṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sunīlakasupītakasulohitakasuodātakaparisuddhanīlakaparisuddhapītakaparisuddhalohitakaparisuddhaodātakavaseneva
atk-abh01a:1533_15: Iti kasiṇanti vā abhibhāyatananti vā vimokkhoti vā rūpāvacarajjhānameva.
atk-abh01a:1533_18: ārammaṇe adhimuccanaṭṭhena paccanīkadhammehi ca vimuccanaṭṭhena vimokkho nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1533_22: Ekekasmiṃ pana vimokkhe pathavīkasiṇe viya pañcavīsati pañcavīsatīti katvā pañcasattati navakā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1536_1: Idāni mettādibrahmavihāravasena pavattamānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1536_4: Yena panesa vidhānena paṭipanno mettādisahagatāni jhānāni upasampajja viharati,
atk-abh01a:1536_5: taṃ mettādīnaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-abh01a:1536_6: Avasesāya pāḷiyā attho pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1537_1: idha purimāsu tīsu tikacatukkajjhānikavasena pañcavīsati sattakā,
atk-abh01a:1537_3: karuṇāmuditāsu ca chandādīhi catūhi saddhiṃ karuṇāmuditāti imepi yevāpanakā labbhanti.
atk-abh01a:1539_0: Brahmuttamena kathite, brahmavihāre ime iti viditvā;
atk-abh01a:1541_0: Etāsu hi mettākaruṇāmuditāupekkhāsu atthato tāva mejjatīti mettā,
atk-abh01a:1541_4: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā.
atk-abh01a:1541_5: Kiṇāti vā paradukkhaṃ hiṃsati vināsetīti karuṇā.
atk-abh01a:1541_6: Kirīyati vā dukkhitesu pharaṇavasena pasāriyatīti karuṇā.
atk-abh01a:1542_22: te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissanti,
atk-abh01a:1543_0: Catunnampi panetesaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vipassanāsukhañceva bhavasampatti ca sādhāraṇappayojanaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1545_0: Ekamekassa cettha āsannadūravasena dve dve paccatthikā.
atk-abh01a:1545_6: Pabbatādigahananissito viya purisassa sapatto sabhāvavisabhāgatāya byāpādo dūrapaccatthiko.
atk-abh01a:1545_8: Mettāyissati ca nāma kopañca karissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1546_0: Karuṇābrahmavihārassa “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a:1546_1: appaṭilābhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato
atk-abh01a:1546_3: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati gehassitaṃ domanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehassitaṃ domanassaṃ vipattidassanasabhāgatāya āsannapaccatthikaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1546_6: Karuṇañca nāma karissati pāṇiādīhi ca vihesissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1547_0: Muditābrahmavihārassa “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a:1547_1: paṭilābhaṃ vā paṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato
atk-abh01a:1547_3: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati gehassitaṃ somanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehassitaṃ somanassaṃ sampattidassanasabhāgatāya āsannapaccatthikaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1547_6: Pamudito ca nāma bhavissati pantasenāsanesu ca adhikusaladhammesu ca ukkaṇṭhissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1548_0: Upekkhābrahmavihārassa pana “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa
atk-abh01a:1548_2: Yā evarūpā upekkhā rūpaṃ sā nātivattati.
atk-abh01a:1548_3: Tasmā sā upekkhā gehassitāti vuccatī”tiādinā nayena āgatā gehassitā aññāṇupekkhā dosaguṇānaṃ avicāraṇavasena sabhāgattā āsannapaccatthikā.
atk-abh01a:1548_6: Upekkhissati ca nāma rajjissati ca paṭihaññissati cāti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1549_3: paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto anekā vā sattā ārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1549_4: upacāre vā appanāya vā pattāya ārammaṇavaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1550_1: yathā hi kusalo kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā kasati,
atk-abh01a:1550_2: evaṃ paṭhamameva ekaṃ āvāsaṃ paricchinditvā tattha sattesu ‘imasmiṃ āvāse sattā averā hontū’tiādinā nayena mettā bhāvetabbā.
atk-abh01a:1550_3: Tattha cittaṃ muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā dve āvāsā paricchinditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1550_4: Tato anukkamena tayo cattāro pañca cha satta aṭṭha nava dasa,
atk-abh01a:1550_7: ekā disāti evaṃ yāva ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1550_8: tato vā pana bhiyyo tattha tattha sattesu mettā bhāvetabbā.
atk-abh01a:1551_5: Yathā hi thambhe anussāpetvā tulāsaṅghāṭaṃ anāropetvā na sakkā ākāse kūṭagopānasiyo ṭhapetuṃ,
atk-abh01a:1551_6: evaṃ purimesu tatiyajjhānaṃ vinā na sakkā catutthaṃ bhāvetuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1552_1: ‘kasmā panetā mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā brahmavihārāti vuccanti? Kasmā ca,
atk-abh01a:1552_4: Vibhaṅge ca kasmā appamaññāti vuttā’ti? Vuccate –
atk-abh01a:1552_5: seṭṭhaṭṭhena tāva niddosabhāvena cettha brahmavihāratā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1552_6: Sattesu sammāpaṭipattibhāvena hi seṭṭhā ete vihārā.
atk-abh01a:1552_8: evaṃ etehi sampayuttā yogino brahmasamāva hutvā viharantīti seṭṭhaṭṭhena niddosabhāvena ca brahmavihārāti vuccanti.
atk-abh01a:1553_0: Kasmā ca catassotiādipañhassa pana idaṃ vissajjanaṃ –
atk-abh01a:1558_5: yasmā ca yathā mātā daharagilānayobbanappattasakiccapasutesu catūsu puttesu daharassa abhivuḍḍhikāmā hoti,
atk-abh01a:1559_0: Yasmā pana catassopetā bhāvetukāmena paṭhamaṃ hitākārappavattivasena sattesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1559_2: tato evaṃ patthitahitānaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhābhibhavaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā sambhāvetvā vā dukkhāpanayanākārappavattivasena,
atk-abh01a:1559_4: athevaṃ patthitahitānaṃ patthitadukkhāpagamānañca nesaṃ sampattiṃ disvā sampattippamodanavasena,
atk-abh01a:1559_6: tato paraṃ pana kattabbābhāvato ajjhupekkhakatāsaṅkhātena majjhattākārena paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1559_8: tasmā ito hitādiākāravasā panāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ mettā vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1559_9: Atha karuṇā muditā upekkhāti ayaṃ kamo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1560_0: Yasmā pana sabbāpetā appamāṇe gocare pavattanti,
atk-abh01a:1560_3: ‘ekasattassāpi ca ettake padese mettādayo bhāvetabbā’ti evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvā sakalapharaṇavaseneva pavattāti,
atk-abh01a:1565_0: Evaṃ appamāṇagocaratāya ekalakkhaṇāsu cāpi etāsu purimā tisso tikacatukkajjhānikāva honti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1565_6: Na hi sattesu majjhattākārappavattā brahmavihārupekkhā upekkhāvedanaṃ vinā vattatīti.
atk-abh01a:1568_1: Idāni rāgacaritasattānaṃ ekantahitaṃ nānārammaṇesu ekekajjhānavaseneva pavattamānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ
atk-abh01a:1568_2: dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1569_2: uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena dhumātattā uddhumātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1569_21: Ito ca etto ca vividhākārena soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāyitaṃ vikkhāyitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1569_28: ‘Aññena hatthaṃ aññena pādaṃ aññena sīsa’nti evaṃ tato tato khittassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1569_30: Kākapadākārena aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā vuttanayena vikkhittakassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1569_41: Imāni ca pana uddhumātakādīni nissāya uppannanimittānampi nimittesu paṭiladdhajjhānānampi etāneva nāmāni.
atk-abh01a:1570_0: Tattha uddhumātakanimitte appanāvasena uppannā saññā uddhumātakasaññā.
atk-abh01a:1575_0: Evaṃ pāḷinayeneva, tāva sabbāni tāni jānitvā;
atk-abh01a:1577_0: Etesu hi yattha katthaci adhigatajjhāno suvikkhambhitarāgattā vītarāgo viya nilloluppacāro hoti.
atk-abh01a:1577_2: so sarīrasabhāvappattivasena ca rāgacaritabhedavasena cāti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1578_0: Chavasarīrañhi paṭikūlabhāvaṃ āpajjamānaṃ uddhumātakasabhāvappattaṃ vā siyā,
atk-abh01a:1578_2: Iti yādisaṃ yādisaṃ sakkā hoti laddhuṃ tādise tādise uddhumātakapaṭikūlaṃ vinīlakapaṭikūlanti evaṃ nimittaṃ
atk-abh01a:1578_3: gaṇhitabbamevāti sarīrasabhāvappattivasena dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1579_0: Visesato cettha uddhumātakaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānavipattippakāsanato sarīrasaṇṭhānarāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1579_2: Vipubbakaṃ kāyavaṇapaṭibaddhassa duggandhabhāvassa pakāsanato mālāgandhādivasena samuṭṭhāpitasarīragandharāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1579_4: Vikkhāyitakaṃ maṃsūpacayasampattivināsappakāsanato thanādīsu sarīrappadesesu maṃsūpacayarāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1579_8: Puḷavakaṃ kāyassa anekakimikulasādhāraṇabhāvappakāsanato kāye mamattarāgino sappāyaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1579_10: Evaṃ rāgacaritavasenāpi dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1580_0: Yasmā pana dasavidhepi etasmiṃ asubhe seyyathāpi nāma aparisaṇṭhitajalāya sīghasotāya nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh01a:1580_2: evameva dubbalattā ārammaṇassa vitakkabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh01a:1580_6: Paṭikūlepi cetasmiṃ ārammaṇe ‘addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī’ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvitāya
atk-abh01a:1580_8: ‘bahuṃ dāni vetanaṃ labhissāmī’ti ānisaṃsadassāvino pupphachaḍḍakassa gūtharāsimhi viya,
atk-abh01a:1581_0: Dasavidhampi cetaṃ asubhaṃ lakkhaṇato ekameva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1581_1: Dasavidhassapi hi etassa asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikūlabhāvo eva lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1581_2: Tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇena na kevalaṃ matasarīreyeva dantaṭṭhikadassāvino pana cetiyapabbatavāsino mahātissattherassa viya,
atk-abh01a:1581_3: hatthikkhandhagataṃ rājānaṃ ullokentassa saṅgharakkhitattherupaṭṭhākasāmaṇerassa viya ca,
atk-abh01a:1581_5: Yatheva hi matasarīraṃ evaṃ jīvamānakampi asubhameva.
atk-abh01a:1581_6: Asubhalakkhaṇaṃ panettha āgantukena alaṅkārena paṭicchannattā na paññāyatīti.
atk-abh01a:1583_0: Kiṃ pana pathavīkasiṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā aṭṭhikasaññāpariyosānāvesā rūpāvacarappanā,
atk-abh01a:1583_2: ānāpānajjhānañhi kāyagatāsatibhāvanā ca idha na kathitā.
atk-abh01a:1583_3: Kiñcāpi na kathitā vāyokasiṇe pana gahite ānāpānajjhānaṃ gahitameva;
atk-abh01a:1583_4: vaṇṇakasiṇesu ca gahitesu kesādīsu catukkapañcakajjhānavasena uppannā kāyagatāsati,
atk-abh01a:1583_5: dasasu asubhesu gahitesu dvattiṃsākāre paṭikūlamanasikārajjhānavasena ceva navasivathikāvaṇṇajjhānavasena ca pavattā kāyagatāsati gahitāvāti.
atk-abh01a:1587_1: Idāni arūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1587_5: Maggaṃ bhāvetīti upāyaṃ hetuṃ kāraṇaṃ uppādeti vaḍḍheti.
atk-abh01a:1587_9: Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi rūpanti vuccati ‘rūpī rūpāni passatī’tiādīsu.
atk-abh01a:1587_11: tasmā idha rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1587_14: Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1588_4: sabbākārena anavasesānaṃ vā virāgā ca nirodhā ca virāgahetu ceva nirodhahetu ca ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
atk-abh01a:1588_5: Na hi sakkā sabbaso anatikkantarūpasaññena etaṃ upasampajja viharitunti.
atk-abh01a:1589_0: Tattha yasmā ārammaṇe avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hoti,
atk-abh01a:1589_1: samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hoti,
atk-abh01a:1589_3: Rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1589_8: tena vuccati sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge saññānaṃyeva samatikkamo vutto.
atk-abh01a:1589_9: Yasmā pana ārammaṇasamatikkamena pattabbā etā samāpattiyo,
atk-abh01a:1589_11: tasmā ayaṃ ārammaṇasamatikkamavasenāpi atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1590_0: Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena samuppannā saññā paṭighasaññā.
atk-abh01a:1590_5: Tāsaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ pañcannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pañcannanti sabbaso dasannampi paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā
atk-abh01a:1590_6: pahānā asamuppādā appavattiṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1591_1: na hi tasmiṃ samaye pañcadvāravasena cittaṃ pavattati –
atk-abh01a:1591_5: imasmiṃ jhāne ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsaṃ ettha vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1591_6: Atha vā kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacaraṃ samāpannassa na santi,
atk-abh01a:1591_7: atha kho na pahīnattā na santi.
atk-abh01a:1591_11: Tasmā tā ettha pahīnāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a:1591_14: Tāsañhi ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa “saddo kaṇṭako”ti vutto bhagavatā.
atk-abh01a:1591_15: Idha ca pahīnattāyeva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjatā santavimokkhatā ca vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1591_16: Āḷāro ca kāḷāmo āruppasamāpanno pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkantāni neva addasa,
atk-abh01a:1592_0: Nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārāti nānatte gocare pavattānaṃ saññānaṃ nānattānaṃ vā saññānaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1592_2: Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1592_3: imā vuccanti nānattasaññāyo”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge vibhajitvā vuttā idha adhippetā;
atk-abh01a:1592_4: asamāpannassa manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅgahitā saññā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti;
atk-abh01a:1592_9: ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti evaṃ catucattālīsampi saññā nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ asadisā,
atk-abh01a:1592_11: Tāsaṃ sabbaso nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā anāvajjanā asamannāhārā apaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-abh01a:1593_0: Yasmā cettha purimā rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā ca iminā jhānena nibbatte bhavepi na vijjanti,
atk-abh01a:1593_1: pageva tasmiṃ bhave imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇakāle,
atk-abh01a:1593_2: tasmā tāsaṃ ‘samatikkamā atthaṅgamā’ti dvedhāpi abhāvoyeva vutto.
atk-abh01a:1593_5: dasa akusalasaññāti imā sattavīsati saññā iminā jhānena nibbatte bhave vijjanti,
atk-abh01a:1593_7: Tatrāpi hi imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharanto tāsaṃ amanasikārāyeva upasampajja viharati.
atk-abh01a:1593_9: Saṅkhepato cettha ‘rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā’ti iminā sabbarūpāvacaradhammānaṃ pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1593_10: ‘Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā’ti iminā sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānañca pahānaṃ amanasikāro ca vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1594_2: catucattālīsāya nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārenā’ti tīhi padehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a:1594_3: Kiṃ kāraṇāti ce sotūnaṃ ussāhajananatthañceva palobhanatthañca.
atk-abh01a:1594_4: Sace hi keci apaṇḍitā vadeyyuṃ ‘satthā ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ nibbattethāti vadati,
atk-abh01a:1594_5: ko nu kho etāya nibbattitāya attho?
atk-abh01a:1594_6: Ko ānisaṃso’ti te evaṃ vattuṃ mā labhantūti imehi ākārehi samāpattiyā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh01a:1595_3: So kira guḷaphāṇitakhaṇḍasakkarādīni sakaṭenādāya paccantagāmaṃ gantvā ‘visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhatha visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā’ti ugghosesi.
atk-abh01a:1595_11: handa ne upāyena gaṇhāpemī’ti ‘atimadhuraṃ gaṇhatha atisāduṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-abh01a:1595_14: Taṃ sutvā gāmikā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā niggantvā bahumpi mūlaṃ datvā gahesuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1596_0: Tattha vāṇijassa ‘visakaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhathā’ti ugghosanaṃ viya bhagavato ‘ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ nibbattethā’ti vacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1596_3: Gāmikānaṃ cintanaṃ viya ‘bhagavā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ nibbattethāti āha,
atk-abh01a:1596_6: Athassa vāṇijassa ‘atimadhuraṃ gaṇhathā’tiādivacanaṃ viya bhagavato rūpasaññāsamatikkamanādikaṃ ānisaṃsappakāsanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1596_7: Idañhi sutvā te bahumpi mūlaṃ datvā,
atk-abh01a:1596_9: iminā ānisaṃsena palobhitacittā mahantampi ussāhaṃ katvā imaṃ samāpattiṃ nibbattessantīti ussāhajananatthaṃ palobhanatthañca kathesi.
atk-abh01a:1597_3: Taṃ ākāsānañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa,
atk-abh01a:1597_5: Iti ākāsānañcaṃ ca taṃ āyatanañcātipi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1597_7: Tasmiṃ ākāsānañcāyatane appanāppattāya saññāya sahagataṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1598_1: evamidha anantanti vā parittanti vā na gahitaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1598_2: Anante hi gahite parittaṃ na gayhati,
atk-abh01a:1598_6: Sammāsambuddhassa ca imasmiṃ ṭhāne desanaṃ soḷasakkhattukaṃ kātuṃ ajjhāsayo,
atk-abh01a:1598_7: tasmā anantanti vā parittanti vā avatvā ‘ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagata’nti āha.
atk-abh01a:1598_14: Vipariyāyena sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1598_15: Parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse pana pavattaṃ jhānaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ vipulakasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaṃ appamāṇārammaṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1598_16: Upekkhābrahmavihāre viya ca idhāpi catutthajjhānavasena pañcavīsati ekakā honti.
atk-abh01a:1600_2: ettha tāva pubbe vuttanayena ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanamassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1600_4: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-abh01a:1600_6: tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā ‘ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā’ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1601_1: ettha pana anantanti manasikātabbavasena nāssa antoti anantaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1601_3: Viññāṇaṃ ānañcaṃ viññāṇānañcanti avatvā viññāṇañcanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1601_5: Tadeva viññāṇañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena imāya saññāya āyatananti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1601_6: Tasmiṃ viññāṇañcāyatane pavattāya saññāya sahagatanti viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1603_1: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva viññāṇañca āyatanamassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1603_3: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇena ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-abh01a:1603_5: tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā ‘viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā’ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1604_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana nāssa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ;
atk-abh01a:1604_1: antamaso bhaṅgamattampi assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1604_4: Taṃ ākiñcaññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena imissā saññāya āyatananti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1604_5: Tasmiṃ ākiñcaññāyatane pavattāya saññāya sahagatanti ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1606_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti etthāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva ākiñcaññaṃ āyatanamassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti jhānampi ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1606_2: Evametaṃ jhānañca ārammaṇañcāti ubhayampi appavattikaraṇena ca amanasikaraṇe ca samatikkamitvāva yasmā
atk-abh01a:1606_4: tasmā ubhayampetaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā ‘ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkammā’ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1607_0: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana yāya saññāya bhāvato taṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti vuccati,
atk-abh01a:1607_2: taṃ tāva dassetuṃ vibhaṅge “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti uddharitvā “taññeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasikaroti saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ bhāveti,
atk-abh01a:1607_5: yatra hi nāma natthibhāvampi ārammaṇaṃ karitvā ṭhassatī’ti evaṃ santārammaṇatāya naṃ ‘santā’ti manasikaroti.
atk-abh01a:1607_9: So hi kiñcāpi naṃ santato manasikaroti,
atk-abh01a:1607_10: atha khvassa ‘ahametaṃ āvajjissāmi samāpajjissāmi adhiṭṭhahissāmi vuṭṭhahissāmi paccavekkhissāmī’ti esa ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1608_0: Yathā hi rājā mahaccarājānubhāvena hatthikkhandhagato nagaravīthiyaṃ vicaranto dantakārādayo sippike
atk-abh01a:1608_1: ekaṃ vatthaṃ daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā ekena sīsaṃ veṭhetvā dantacuṇṇādīhi samokiṇṇagatte anekāni dantavikatiādīni
atk-abh01a:1608_2: karonte disvā ‘aho vata re chekā ācariyā,
atk-abh01a:1608_6: ‘aho vatāhaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya evarūpo sippiko bhaveyya’nti.
atk-abh01a:1608_10: Evamevesa kiñcāpi taṃ samāpattiṃ santato manasikaroti,
atk-abh01a:1608_11: atha khvassa ‘ahametaṃ samāpattiṃ āvajjissāmi samāpajjissāmi adhiṭṭhahissāmi vuṭṭhahissāmi paccavekkhissāmī’ti
atk-abh01a:1608_12: neva esa ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro hoti.
atk-abh01a:1608_13: So taṃ santato manasi karonto taṃ paramasukhumaṃ appanāppattaṃ saññaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh01a:1609_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ evaṃ adhigatāya saññāya vasena nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti vuccati,
atk-abh01a:1609_1: taṃ atthato dassetuṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa vā,
atk-abh01a:1609_4: Tesu idha samāpannassa cittacetasikā dhammā adhippetā.
