atk-abh01a:1610_9: Nevasaññānāsaññā ca sā sesadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanañcāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1611_7: sāmaṇero kira telena pattaṃ makkhetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-abh01a:1611_14: Tattha yathā antovutthattā yāguyā saddhiṃ akappiyaṭṭhena telaṃ atthīti hoti,
atk-abh01a:1611_16: evaṃ sāpi saññā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya nevasaññā,
atk-abh01a:1612_1: Ārammaṇasañjānanañceva vipassanāya ca visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1612_4: Sesasamāpattīsu saññā viya vipassanāya visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananampi kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:1612_5: Aññesu hi khandhesu akatābhiniveso bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakkhandhe sammasitvā nibbidaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a:1613_0: Yathā ca pattamakkhanatelūpamāya evaṃ maggudakūpamāyapi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
atk-abh01a:1613_1: Maggapaṭipannassa kira therassa purato gacchanto sāmaṇero thokamudakaṃ disvā ‘udakaṃ, bhante,
atk-abh01a:1613_7: Tattha yathā upāhanatemanamattaṭṭhena udakaṃ atthīti hoti,
atk-abh01a:1613_9: evampi sā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya neva saññā,
atk-abh01a:1613_12: aññāhipi anurūpāhi upamāhi esa attho vibhāvetabbo.
atk-abh01a:1613_13: Iti imāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatane pavattāya saññāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūtāya vā saññāya sahagatanti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1614_3: Parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattitaviññāṇāpagamārammaṇaṃ samāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattitāya parittārammaṇatā,
atk-abh01a:1615_0: Asadisarūpo nātho, āruppaṃ yaṃ catubbidhaṃ āha;
atk-abh01a:1616_0: Taṃ iti ñatvā tasmiṃ, pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:1620_3: ākāse pavattitaviññāṇassa apagamātikkamato catutthāti sabbathā ‘ārammaṇātikkamato catassopi bhavantimā’ arūpasamāpattiyoti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1620_4: Aṅgātikkamaṃ pana etāsaṃ na icchanti paṇḍitā.
atk-abh01a:1620_5: Na hi rūpāvacarasamāpattīsu viya etāsu aṅgātikkamo atthi.
atk-abh01a:1620_6: Sabbāsupi hi etāsu upekkhā cittekaggatāti dve eva jhānaṅgāni honti.
atk-abh01a:1623_7: pañcakāmaguṇasamiddhivisesena pana heṭṭhimato heṭṭhimato uparimaṃ uparimaṃ paṇītataraṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1624_0: Yathā ca ekāya itthiyā kantitathūlasaṇhasaṇhatarasaṇhatamasuttānaṃ catupalatipaladvipalaekapalasāṭikā assu,
atk-abh01a:1624_2: tattha kiñcāpi tā sāṭikā catassopi āyāmato ca vitthārato ca samappamāṇā,
atk-abh01a:1624_4: sukhasamphassasukhumabhāvamahagghabhāvehi pana purimāya purimāya pacchimā pacchimā paṇītatarā honti,
atk-abh01a:1624_5: evameva kiñcāpi catūsupi etāsu upekkhā cittekaggatāti etāni dveyeva aṅgāni honti,
atk-abh01a:1624_6: atha kho bhāvanāvisesena tesaṃ aṅgānaṃ paṇītapaṇītatarabhāvena supaṇītatarā honti pacchimā pacchimā idhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1625_0: Asucimhi maṇḍape laggo, eko taṃ nissito paro;
atk-abh01a:1626_0: Añño bahi anissāya, taṃ taṃ nissāya cāparo.
atk-abh01a:1629_2: Atheko puriso āgantvā taṃ asuciṃ jigucchamāno taṃ maṇḍapaṃ hatthehi ālambitvā tattha laggo,
atk-abh01a:1629_4: Athāparo āgantvā taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissito.
atk-abh01a:1629_10: handāhaṃ bahiyeva tiṭṭhāmī’ti so tannissitaṃ anissāya bahiyeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a:1629_11: Athāparo āgantvā maṇḍapalaggassa tannissitassa ca akhemabhāvaṃ cintetvā bahiṭhitañca suṭṭhitoti mantvā taṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a:1630_0: Tattha asucimhi dese maṇḍapo viya kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1630_1: Asucijigucchāya maṇḍapalaggo puriso viya rūpanimittajigucchāya ākāsārammaṇaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1630_2: Maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissito viya ākāsārammaṇaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1630_3: Tesaṃ dvinnampi akhemabhāvaṃ cintetvā anissāya taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1630_6: Maṇḍapalaggassa tannissitassa ca akhemataṃ cintetvā bahiṭhitañca ‘suṭṭhito’ti mantvā taṃ nissāya ṭhito
atk-abh01a:1630_7: viya viññāṇābhāvasaṅkhāte bahipadese ṭhitaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-abh01a:1633_0: Idañhi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ ‘āsannaviññāṇañcāyatanapaccatthikā ayaṃ samāpattī’ti evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi
atk-abh01a:1633_1: taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ aññassa ārammaṇassa abhāvā ārammaṇaṃ karoteva.
atk-abh01a:1633_4: Yathā hi asaṃyataṃ pharusakāyavacīmanosamācāraṃ kañci sabbadisampatiṃ rājānaṃ ‘pharusasamācāro aya’nti
atk-abh01a:1633_5: evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi aññattha vuttiṃ alabhamāno jano vuttihetu nissāya vattati,
atk-abh01a:1633_6: evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ alabhamānamidaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoteva.
atk-abh01a:1640_1: Idāni yasmā sabbānipetāni tebhūmakakusalāni hīnādinā pabhedena vattanti,
atk-abh01a:1640_2: tasmā tesaṃ taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1640_9: Yassa hi āyūhanakkhaṇe chando vā hīno hoti,
atk-abh01a:1640_14: Yassa te dhammā majjhimā ceva paṇītā,
atk-abh01a:1640_16: Yaṃ pana kattukāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā āyūhitaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1641_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā nayā gaṇetabbā.
atk-abh01a:1641_7: Evaṃ vīriyādhipateyyādīsupīti cattāro pañcakā vīsati honti.
atk-abh01a:1641_11: chandādhipateyyaṃ hīnantiādayo dvādasāti evampi vīsati nayā honti.
atk-abh01a:1642_2: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne hīnattikato majjhimarāsiṃ gahetvā hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena tayo koṭṭhāsā kātabbā.
atk-abh01a:1642_3: Tatopi majjhimarāsiṃ ṭhapetvā hīnapaṇīte gahetvā nava nava koṭṭhāsā kātabbā.
atk-abh01a:1642_4: Hīnasmiṃyeva hi hīnaṃ atthi majjhimaṃ atthi paṇītaṃ atthi.
atk-abh01a:1642_5: Paṇītasmimpi hīnaṃ atthi majjhimaṃ atthi paṇītaṃ atthi.
atk-abh01a:1642_24: Ayaṃ dutiyo navakoti dve navakā aṭṭhārasa.
atk-abh01a:1643_0: Imesu ca pana tebhūmakesu kusalesu kāmāvacarakusalaṃ tihetukampi duhetukampi hoti ñāṇasampayuttavippayuttavasena.
atk-abh01a:1643_4: Kāmāvacarakusale cettha ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipatīti dvepi adhipatayo labbhanti.
atk-abh01a:1643_7: Tattha cittassa cittādhipateyyabhāvo sampayuttadhammānaṃ vasena vutto.
atk-abh01a:1643_8: Dvinnaṃ pana cittānaṃ ekato abhāvena sampayuttacittassa cittādhipati nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a:1643_11: mayhaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā aparaṃ kusalacittaṃ āyūhitaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1643_12: tassa taṃ purimacittaṃ cittādhipati nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a:1643_13: tato āgatattā idaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ nāmā’ti evaṃ āgamanavasenāpi adhipatiṃ nāma icchanti.
atk-abh01a:1643_14: Ayaṃ pana nayo neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dissati.
atk-abh01a:1643_16: Imesu ca ekūnavīsatiyā mahānayesu purime suddhikanaye vuttaparimāṇāneva cittāni ca navakā ca pāṭhavārā ca honti.
atk-abh01a:1643_17: Tasmā ñāṇasampayuttesu vuttaparimāṇato vīsatiguṇo cittanavakavārabhedo veditabbo,
atk-abh01a:1646_1: Evaṃ bhavattayasampattinibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ dassetvā idāni sabbabhavasamatikkamanāya lokuttarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1646_6: Jhānaṃ bhāvetīti ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ appanājhānaṃ bhāveti janeti vaḍḍheti.
atk-abh01a:1647_2: Taṃsamaṅgī hi puggalo dukkhaṃ parijānanto niyyāti,
atk-abh01a:1647_6: Yathā ca pana tebhūmakakusalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo ācināti vaḍḍhetīti ācayagāmī nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a:1647_8: Idaṃ pana yathā ekasmiṃ purise aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ pākāraṃ cinante aparo mahāmuggaraṃ gahetvā tena citacitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh01a:1647_10: evameva tebhūmakakusalena citā cutipaṭisandhiyo paccayavekallakaraṇena apacinantaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ gacchatīti apacayagāmi.
atk-abh01a:1648_3: Dvāsaṭṭhiyā vā diṭṭhīnaṃ antogadhattā diṭṭhīsu gatānītipi diṭṭhigatāni.
atk-abh01a:1648_8: Tāni hi yāva paṭhamamaggabhāvanā tāva pavattisabbhāvato diṭṭhisadisagamanānīti vuccanti.
atk-abh01a:1648_9: Iti diṭṭhiyo ca diṭṭhigatāni ca diṭṭhigatāni.
atk-abh01a:1648_13: Bhūmiyāti “anantarahitāya bhūmiyā”tiādīsu tāva ayaṃ mahāpathavī bhūmīti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1648_16: Tañhi sampayuttānaṃ nissayabhāvato te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi.
atk-abh01a:1648_17: Yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1648_21: Pattiyāti sotāpattiphalasaṅkhātassa paṭhamassa sāmaññaphalassa pattatthāya paṭilābhatthāyāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1649_0: Idāni kiñcāpi lokiyajjhānampi na vinā paṭipadāya ijjhati,
atk-abh01a:1649_1: evaṃ santepi idha suddhikanayaṃ pahāya lokuttarajjhānaṃ paṭipadāya saddhiṃyeva garuṃ katvā desetukāmatāya dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññantiādimāha.
atk-abh01a:1650_0: Tattha yo āditova kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti tassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti;
atk-abh01a:1650_1: yo pana vikkhambhita kileso vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti tassa dandhābhiññā hoti.
atk-abh01a:1650_2: Iti yo koci vāro dukkhapaṭipadadandhābhiñño nāma kato.
atk-abh01a:1651_1: Yattha sakiṃ vikkhambhitā kilesā samudācaritvā dutiyampi vikkhambhitā puna samudācaranti,
atk-abh01a:1651_2: tatiyaṃ vikkhambhite pana tathāvikkhambhiteva katvā maggena samugghātaṃ pāpeti,
atk-abh01a:1651_4: Imassa vārassa dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññāti nāmaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a:1651_6: Tasmā evamettha ādito paṭṭhāya vibhāvanā veditabbā –
atk-abh01a:1651_7: yo hi cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggahetvā upādārūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a:1651_9: ‘rūpārūpaṃ’ pana pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:1651_11: Pariggahitarūpārūpassa pana vipassanāparivāse maggapātubhāvadandhatāya dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1652_0: Yopi rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā ‘nāmarūpaṃ’ vavatthapento dukkhena kasirena kilamanto vavatthapeti,
atk-abh01a:1652_1: vavatthāpite ca nāmarūpe vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:1652_2: tassāpi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1653_0: Aparo nāmarūpampi vavatthapetvā ‘paccaye’ pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggaṇhāti,
atk-abh01a:1653_1: paccaye ca pariggahetvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a:1653_2: evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1654_0: Aparo paccayepi pariggahetvā ‘lakkhaṇāni’ paṭivijjhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh01a:1654_1: paṭividdhalakkhaṇo ca vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a:1654_2: evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1655_0: Aparo lakkhaṇānipi paṭivijjhitvā vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannaṃ ‘vipassanānikantiṃ’
atk-abh01a:1655_2: nikantiñca pariyādiyitvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti,
atk-abh01a:1655_3: evampi dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1655_6: Imināva upāyena parato tisso paṭipadā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1657_0: Tattha anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti ‘anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ catusaccadhammameva
atk-abh01a:1657_1: vā jānissāmī’ti paṭipannassa iminā pubbābhogena uppannaṃ indriyaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1657_2: Lakkhaṇādīni panassa heṭṭhā paññindriye vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a:1659_0: Apica heṭṭhā viratittaye vuttavasenapettha lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a:1659_1: Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ maggapañcakaṃ idha maggaṭṭhakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1659_4: Ime hi tayo dhammā idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatattāva yevāpanakesu na gahitā.
atk-abh01a:1659_6: ime dhammā nibbānārammaṇāti tāpettha na gahitā.
atk-abh01a:1660_1: Niddesavāre pana maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannanti ettha tāva maggassa aṅganti maggaṅgaṃ;
atk-abh01a:1660_3: Yathā pana araññe pariyāpannaṃ araññapariyāpannaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a:1661_1: Pītisambojjhaṅgoti ettha pīti eva sambojjhaṅgoti pītisambojjhaṅgo.
atk-abh01a:1661_2: Tattha bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo.
atk-abh01a:1661_4: yā ayaṃ dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
atk-abh01a:1661_12: Yopesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccati,
atk-abh01a:1662_5: sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti iminā paṭisambhidānayenāpi bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1663_1: Tesaṃ dhammānanti ye tasmiṃ samaye paṭivedhaṃ gacchanti catusaccadhammā,
atk-abh01a:1663_3: Anaññātānanti kiñcāpi paṭhamamaggena te dhammā ñātā nāma honti,
atk-abh01a:1663_4: yathā pana pakatiyā anāgatapubbaṃ vihāraṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhitopi puggalo pakatiyā anāgatabhāvaṃ
atk-abh01a:1663_6: yathā ca pakatiyā apiḷandhapubbaṃ mālaṃ piḷandhitvā,
atk-abh01a:1663_9: pakatiyā abhuttabhāvaṃ upādāya abhuttapubbaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuttomhīti vadati,
atk-abh01a:1663_10: evamidhāpi yasmā pakatiyā iminā puggalena ime dhammā na ñātapubbā tasmā anaññātānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1663_12: Tattha adiṭṭhānanti ito pubbe paññācakkhunā adiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1664_2: Tiṇṇaṃ dosānaṃ yena kenaci duṭṭhāni caritānīti duccaritāni.
atk-abh01a:1664_8: Tato tato paṭinivattāva hutvā tehi vinā ramatīti paṭivirati.
atk-abh01a:1664_14: Yāya pana cetanāya musāvādādīni bhāsamāno karoti nāma,
atk-abh01a:1664_16: Uppajjitvā taṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a:1664_18: Tathā taṃ karaṇaṃ kātuṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a:1664_20: Yāya ca cetanāya catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ bhāsamāno ajjhāpajjati nāma,
atk-abh01a:1664_21: ayaṃ uppajjitvā tathā ajjhāpajjituṃ na detīti anajjhāpatti.
atk-abh01a:1665_0: Velāanatikkamoti ettha “tāya velāyā”tiādīsu tāva kālo velāti āgato.
atk-abh01a:1665_4: Anatikkamanīyaṭṭhena hi cattāri vacīsucaritāni velāti adhippetāni.
atk-abh01a:1665_5: Iti yāya cetanāya cattāri vacīduccaritāni bhāsamāno velaṃ atikkamati nāma,
atk-abh01a:1665_6: ayaṃ uppajjitvā taṃ velaṃ atikkamituṃ na detīti velāanatikkamoti vuttā.
atk-abh01a:1666_4: rāgādiko catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ paccayo vaṭṭasmiṃ puggalaṃ sinoti bandhatīti setu.
atk-abh01a:1666_7: Ayaṃ pana sammāvācāsaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhati.
atk-abh01a:1666_11: Catubbidhāya hi vacīduccaritacetanāya padapacchedaṃ kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:1667_1: Kāyaduccaritehīti kāyato pavattehi kāyena vā nipphāditehi pāṇātipātādīhi duccaritehi.
atk-abh01a:1667_3: Ayampi sammākammantasaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhati.
atk-abh01a:1667_7: Tividhāya hi kāyaduccaritacetanāya padapacchedaṃ kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:1668_1: Sammāājīvaniddese akiriyātiādīsu yāya cetanāya micchājīvaṃ ājīvamāno kiriyaṃ karoti nāma,
atk-abh01a:1668_2: ayaṃ uppajjitvā taṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na detīti akiriyāti.
atk-abh01a:1668_8: Evaṃ sante sammāājīvo sakiccako na hoti,
atk-abh01a:1668_17: Kāyadvāre pana vītikkamo ājīvahetukopi atthi naājīvahetukopi.
atk-abh01a:1669_0: Tattha yaṃ rājarājamahāmattā khiḍḍāpasutā sūrabhāvaṃ dassentā migavadhaṃ vā panthaduhanaṃ vā paradāravītikkamaṃ vā karonti,
atk-abh01a:1669_3: Yaṃ pana naājīvahetukaṃ catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ bhāsanti,
atk-abh01a:1670_0: Yaṃ pana ājīvahetu nesādamacchabandhādayo pāṇaṃ hananti,
atk-abh01a:1671_1: ‘kāyavacīdvāresupi vītikkamo ājīvahetuko vā hotu no vā ājīvahetuko,
atk-abh01a:1671_4: ‘Ājīvo kuhi’nti vutte pana ‘tīṇi kuhanavatthūni nissāya cattāro paccaye uppādetvā tesaṃ paribhogo’ti āha.
atk-abh01a:1672_4: Kāyavacīdvāresu hi sattakammapathavasena uppannāya micchājīvasaṅkhātāya dussīlyacetanāya padapacchedaṃ
atk-abh01a:1672_5: kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjatīti.
atk-abh01a:1674_1: Ito paraṃ suddhikasuññatā suññatapaṭipadā suddhikaappaṇihitā appaṇihitapaṭipadāti ayaṃ desanābhedo hoti.
atk-abh01a:1674_3: So hi āgamanato saguṇato ārammaṇatoti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a:1674_4: Idha bhikkhu anattato abhinivisitvā anattato saṅkhāre passati.
atk-abh01a:1674_5: Yasmā pana anattato diṭṭhamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a:1674_7: tasmā ‘aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti tividhaṃ anupassanaṃ āropetvā sammasanto carati.
atk-abh01a:1674_8: Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā panassa tebhūmakepi saṅkhāre suññatova passati.
atk-abh01a:1674_10: Sā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa ‘suññata’nti nāmaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a:1674_12: Yasmā pana so rāgādīhi suñño tasmā ‘saguṇeneva’ suññatanāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a:1674_14: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannattā maggo ‘ārammaṇato’ suññatanāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a:1675_0: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a:1675_3: Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā nāmaṃ na labhati,
atk-abh01a:1675_10: Idha maggassa āgatattā vipassanāgamanameva dhuraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1676_3: Idampi nāmaṃ maggo tīheva kāraṇehi labhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a:1676_4: Idha bhikkhu āditova dukkhato abhinivisitvā dukkhatova saṅkhāre passati.
atk-abh01a:1676_5: Yasmā pana dukkhato diṭṭhamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a:1676_7: tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā’ti tividhaṃ anupassanaṃ āropetvā sammasanto carati.
atk-abh01a:1676_8: Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā panassa tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu paṇidhiṃ sosetvā pariyādiyitvā vissajjeti.
atk-abh01a:1676_10: Sā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa ‘appaṇihita’nti nāmaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a:1676_14: Nibbānampi tesaṃ paṇidhīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:1676_15: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannattā maggo appaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a:1677_0: Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi ārammaṇatopi nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-abh01a:1677_3: Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā nāmaṃ na labhati,
atk-abh01a:1677_10: Idha maggassa āgatattā vipassanāgamanameva dhuraṃ jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1678_0: Nanu ca suññato animitto appaṇihitoti tīṇi maggassa nāmāni? Yathāha – “tayome,
atk-abh01a:1678_6: Tesu idha dve magge gahetvā animitto kasmā na gahitoti?
atk-abh01a:1678_8: Animittavipassanā hi sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:1681_1: Vipassanā hi niccanimittaṃ dhuvanimittaṃ sukhanimittaṃ attanimittañca ugghāṭeti.
atk-abh01a:1681_3: Sā ca kiñcāpi taṃ nimittaṃ ugghāṭeti,
atk-abh01a:1681_4: sayaṃ pana nimittadhammesu caratīti sanimittāva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1681_5: Tasmā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:1682_2: Animittamaggassa ca paramatthato hetuvekallameva hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a:1682_4: Tena ca vimokkhena saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1682_6: amaggaṅgattā attano maggassa paramatthato nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:1682_7: Itaresu pana dvīsu anattānupassanāya tāva vasena suññatavimokkho,
atk-abh01a:1682_11: Tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa paramatthato nāmaṃ dātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-abh01a:1682_12: Maggārammaṇattikepi hi maggādhipatidhammavibhajane chandacittānaṃ adhipatikāle tesaṃ dhammānaṃ amaggaṅgattāva maggādhipatibhāvo na vutto.
atk-abh01a:1683_0: Evaṃ sabbathāpi animittavipassanā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotīti animittamaggo na gahito.
atk-abh01a:1683_1: Keci pana ‘animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṃ alabhantopi suttantapariyāyena saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhatī’ti āhaṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1683_3: animittamagge saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhante suññataappaṇihitamaggāpi saguṇatoyeva ārammaṇatoyeva ca idha nāmaṃ labheyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1683_6: Ayañhi maggo nāma dvīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati –
atk-abh01a:1683_9: Tattha suññataappaṇihitamaggā sarasatopi paccanīkatopi nāmaṃ labhanti.
atk-abh01a:1683_11: rāgapaṇidhiādīhi ca appaṇihitāti evaṃ ‘sarasato’ nāmaṃ labhanti.
atk-abh01a:1683_14: Animittamaggo pana rāgādinimittānaṃ niccanimittādīnañca abhāvena sarasatova nāmaṃ labhati,
atk-abh01a:1683_16: Na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho.
atk-abh01a:1684_5: Ādito hi yattha katthaci abhiniveso hotu,
atk-abh01a:1684_6: vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a:1684_7: Aniccādīsu hi yattha katthaci abhinivisitvā itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
atk-abh01a:1684_8: Ekalakkhaṇadassanamatteneva hi maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a:1684_9: tasmā aniccato abhiniviṭṭho bhikkhu na kevalaṃ aniccatova vuṭṭhāti,
atk-abh01a:1684_12: Iti ādito yattha katthaci abhiniveso hotu,
atk-abh01a:1684_13: vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti.
atk-abh01a:1684_14: Tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a:1685_3: Yo pana aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkheti,
atk-abh01a:1685_4: tassa pañcakkhandhā kaṇṭhe baddhakuṇapaṃ viya honti.
atk-abh01a:1685_6: Yathā hi eko bhikkhu pattaṃ kiṇitukāmo pattavāṇijena pattaṃ ābhataṃ disvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭho gaṇhissāmīti cintetvā vīmaṃsamāno tīṇi chiddāni passeyya,
atk-abh01a:1685_9: evameva tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkhetvā saṅkhāresu nirālayo hoti.
atk-abh01a:1686_0: Iti bhagavā lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhājento suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkanayaṃ pañcakanayanti dvepi naye āhari.
atk-abh01a:1686_5: Evaṃ lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetīti ettha suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkapañcakavasena dve nayā,
atk-abh01a:1686_6: tathā sesesūti sabbesupi pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu dasa nayā bhājitā.
atk-abh01a:1691_0: Lokuttaramaggo hi ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti,
atk-abh01a:1692_0: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti so panesa maggo aṭṭhaṅgikopi hoti sattaṅgikopi.
atk-abh01a:1692_1: Bojjhaṅgāpi satta vā honti cha vā.
atk-abh01a:1692_2: Jhānaṃ pana pañcaṅgikaṃ vā hoti caturaṅgikaṃ vā;
atk-abh01a:1692_4: Evaṃ sattaaṭṭhādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ pariṇāmo veditabboti attho.
atk-abh01a:1693_1: ‘paṭipadāpatī’ti paṭipadāya ca adhipatino ca calanācalanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1694_0: Tattha ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhātītiādīsu tāva idhekacco āditova ajjhattaṃ pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisati,
atk-abh01a:1694_2: yasmā pana na suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:1694_4: tasmā parassa khandhepi anupādinnasaṅkhārepi aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti passati.
atk-abh01a:1694_5: So kālena ajjhattaṃ sammasati kālena bahiddhāti.
atk-abh01a:1694_6: Tassevaṃ sammasato ajjhattaṃ sammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati.
atk-abh01a:1694_7: Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1694_8: Sace panassa bahiddhā sammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati,
atk-abh01a:1694_9: evaṃ ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1694_10: Eseva nayo bahiddhā abhinivisitvā bahiddhā ca ajjhattañca vuṭṭhānepi.
atk-abh01a:1695_0: Aparo āditova rūpe abhinivisati abhinivisitvā bhūtarūpañca upādārūpañca paricchinditvā aniccādito passati,
atk-abh01a:1695_1: yasmā pana na suddharūpadassanamatteneva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti arūpampi daṭṭhabbameva,
atk-abh01a:1695_2: tasmā taṃ rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ saññaṃ saṅkhāre viññāṇañca idaṃ arūpanti paricchinditvā aniccādito passati.
atk-abh01a:1695_3: So kālena rūpaṃ sammasati kālena arūpaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1695_4: Tassevaṃ sammasato rūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati.
atk-abh01a:1695_5: Evaṃ rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1695_6: Sace panassa arūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyati,
atk-abh01a:1695_7: evaṃ rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1695_8: Esa nayo arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhānepi.
atk-abh01a:1696_0: “Yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṃ abhinivisitvā evameva vuṭṭhānakāle pana ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāmāti.
atk-abh01a:1697_0: Yathā hi chātajjhattassa purisassa majjhe gūthapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā nānaggarasabhojanapuṇṇaṃ pātiṃ upaneyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a:1697_1: so byañjanaṃ hatthena viyūhanto taṃ gūthapiṇḍaṃ disvā ‘kimida’nti pucchitvā gūthapiṇḍoti vutte ‘dhi dhi,
atk-abh01a:1698_0: Bhojanapātidassanasmiñhi tassa attamanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno bālaputhujjanakāle pañcakkhandhe ‘ahaṃ mamā’ti gahitakālo.
atk-abh01a:1698_1: Gūthapiṇḍassa diṭṭhakālo viya tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ sallakkhitakālo.
atk-abh01a:1698_2: Bhattepi pātiyampi nirālayakālo viya tikkhavipassakassa mahāpaññassa bhikkhuno “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ
atk-abh01a:1698_3: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti pañcahi khandhehi ekappahārena vuṭṭhitakālo veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1699_0: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti ettha ayaṃ vuttappabhedo aṅgapariṇāmo yathā hoti tathā veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1699_2: Keci pana therā ‘bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgavisesaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametī’ti vadanti.
atk-abh01a:1699_5: Tesampi vādesu ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāsaṅkhātā pubbabhāgā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametīti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1700_1: vipassanāniyamena hi sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi samāpattilābhino jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā uppannamaggopi
atk-abh01a:1700_2: paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikova hoti.
atk-abh01a:1700_3: Sabbesu satta bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti.
atk-abh01a:1700_4: Tesañhi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ pattā somanassasahagatāva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1701_0: Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu yathākkameneva jhānaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikañca hoti.
atk-abh01a:1701_3: Ayaṃ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena ca hoti.
atk-abh01a:1701_4: Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hoti.
atk-abh01a:1702_0: Pañcamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā nibbattitamagge pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva.
atk-abh01a:1702_2: Imasmiñhi naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti,
atk-abh01a:1702_4: Arūpajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh01a:1702_5: Evaṃ pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya ye keci saṅkhāre sammasitvā nibbattitamaggassa āsannapadese vuṭṭhitā samāpatti attanā sadisabhāvaṃ karoti,
atk-abh01a:1703_0: Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito hoti taṃtaṃsamāpattisadisova hoti,
atk-abh01a:1703_2: Sace pana kāmāvacaradhamme sammasati paṭhamajjhānikova hoti.
atk-abh01a:1704_1: aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pāpuṇeyya’nti attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ye vā ye vā jhānadhamme
atk-abh01a:1705_2: tadahuposathe pannarase na hoti bahuno janassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā ‘ūno nu kho cando puṇṇo nu kho cando’ti,
atk-abh01a:1705_6: tā bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanāya attamanā ceva paripuṇṇasaṅkappā ca. Tāsaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1705_8: pañcannaṃ bhikkhunisatānaṃ yā pacchimikā bhikkhunī sā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti.
atk-abh01a:1706_0: Tāsu hi yassā bhikkhuniyā sotāpattiphalassa upanissayo,
atk-abh01a:1706_3: Evameva attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ye vā ye vā jhānadhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito taṃtaṃjhānasadisova so hoti.
atk-abh01a:1707_0: Tattha ‘pādakajjhānameva niyametī’ti evaṃvādiṃ tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheraṃ antevāsikā āhaṃsu – ‘bhante,
atk-abh01a:1707_1: yattha tāva pādakajjhānaṃ atthi tattha taṃ niyametu;
atk-abh01a:1707_5: Yo hi bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaphalāni nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā arūpabhave nibbatto,
atk-abh01a:1707_6: paṭhamajjhānikāya sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā upari tīṇi maggaphalāni nibbatteti,
atk-abh01a:1708_1: yaṃ yaṃ hi pañcakkhandhaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti taṃtaṃsadisova maggo hotī’ti vādiṃ moravāpivāsimahādattattherampi antevāsikā āhaṃsu ‘bhante,
atk-abh01a:1708_3: rūpaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhitabhikkhuno hi rūpasadisena abyākatena maggena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1708_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nayato pariggahetvā vuṭṭhitassa taṃsadiseneva nevasaññānāsaññābhāvappattena maggena bhavitabba’nti. ‘Na, āvuso,
atk-abh01a:1708_6: Lokuttaramaggo hi appanaṃ appatto nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a:1708_7: tasmā rūpaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhitassa aṭṭhaṅgiko somanassasahagatamaggo hoti,
atk-abh01a:1708_8: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhitassapi na sabbākārena tādiso hoti,
atk-abh01a:1709_0: ‘Puggalajjhāsayo niyametī’tivādino cūḷābhayattherassāpi vādaṃ āharitvā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattherassa kathayiṃsu. So āha –
atk-abh01a:1709_1: ‘yassa tāva pādakajjhānaṃ atthi tassa puggalajjhāsayo niyametu,
atk-abh01a:1709_2: yassa taṃ natthi tassa katarajjhāsayo niyamessati niddhanassa vuḍḍhigavesanakālo viya hotī’ti.
atk-abh01a:1710_0: Taṃ kathaṃ āharitvā tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherassa puna kathayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1710_4: Pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya hi paṭhamādīni sammasato uppannamaggo paṭhamattheravādena pañcamajjhāniko.
atk-abh01a:1710_5: Dutiyavādena paṭhamādijjhāniko āpajjatīti dvepi vādā virujjhanti.
atk-abh01a:1710_6: Tatiyavādena panettha ‘yaṃ icchati tajjhāniko hotī’ti te ca vādā na virujjhanti,
atk-abh01a:1710_8: Evaṃ tayopi therā paṇḍitā byattā buddhisampannāva.
atk-abh01a:1710_9: Tena tesaṃ vādaṃ tantiṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1710_10: Idha pana atthameva uddharitvā tayopete vāde vipassanāva niyametīti dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1711_0: Idāni ‘nimittaṃ paṭipadāpatī’ti ettha evaṃ aṅgapariṇāmavato maggassa uppādakāle gotrabhu kuto vuṭṭhāti?
atk-abh01a:1711_13: Tadā hi javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:1711_14: Tasmā neva ekaṃ hoti na pañcamaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1711_30: Tatra mahāpaññamandapaññānaṃ vasena akathetvā majjhimapaññassa vasena kathetabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1712_1: tasmiṃ kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā manodvārāvajjanaṃ hutvā vipassanāgocare khandhe ārammaṇaṃ katvā bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a:1712_2: Tadanantaraṃ teneva āvajjanena gahitakkhandhe gahetvā uppajjati paṭhamaṃ javanaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1712_3: Taṃ tesu khandhesu aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā pavattitvā oḷārikaṃ oḷārikaṃ saccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ
atk-abh01a:1712_4: vinodetvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni katvā nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a:1712_8: Tampi laddhāsevanattā tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā tasmiṃyevārammaṇe tenevākārena pavattitvā majjhimappamāṇaṃ
atk-abh01a:1712_9: saccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ vinodetvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni katvā nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a:1712_12: Tampi laddhāsevanattā tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā tasmiṃyevārammaṇe tenevākārena pavattitvā tadavasesaṃ
atk-abh01a:1712_13: aṇusahagataṃ saccapaṭicchādakatamaṃ vinodetvā niravasesaṃ katvā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni bhiyyo bhiyyo pākaṭāni
atk-abh01a:1712_15: Evaṃ tīhi anulomehi saccapaṭicchādakatame vinodite tadanantaraṃ uppajjati gotrabhuññāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1713_1: eko kira cakkhumā puriso nakkhattayogaṃ jānissāmīti rattibhāge nikkhamitvā candaṃ passituṃ uddhaṃ ullokesi.
atk-abh01a:1713_2: Tassa valāhakehi paṭicchannattā cando na paññāyittha.
atk-abh01a:1713_3: Atheko vāto uṭṭhahitvā thūlathūle valāhake viddhaṃsesi.
atk-abh01a:1713_6: Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṃ disvā nakkhattayogaṃ aññāsi.
atk-abh01a:1714_4: Ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakattayaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1714_5: Vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṃ viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuññāṇassa suvisuddhanibbānārammaṇakaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1715_0: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṃsetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh01a:1715_4: Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti na valāhake viddhaṃsetuṃ,
atk-abh01a:1715_5: evaṃ gotrabhuññāṇaṃ nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti na kilesatamaṃ vinodetuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1716_0: Yadi hi gotrabhu anulomena gahitārammaṇaṃ gaṇheyya puna anulomaṃ taṃ anubandheyyāti maggavuṭṭhānameva na bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a:1716_1: Gotrabhuññāṇaṃ pana anulomassa ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā taṃ apacchatopavattikaṃ katvā sayaṃ anāvajjanampi
atk-abh01a:1716_2: samānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā evaṃ nibbattāhīti maggassa saññaṃ datvā viya nirujjhati.
atk-abh01a:1716_3: Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva avīcisantativasena taṃ ñāṇaṃ anubandhamāno anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ
atk-abh01a:1716_4: lobhakkhandhaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhamānova padālayamānova nibbattati.
atk-abh01a:1717_1: eko kira issāso dhanusatamatthake phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṃ veṭhetvā saraṃ sannayhitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh01a:1717_2: Añño puriso cakkayantaṃ āvañchitvā yadā issāsassa phalakasataṃ abhimukhaṃ hoti tadā tattha daṇḍakena saññaṃ deti,
atk-abh01a:1717_3: issāso daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva saraṃ khipitvā phalakasataṃ nibbijjhati.
atk-abh01a:1717_6: Issāsassa daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva phalakasatanibbijjhanaṃ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuññāṇena dinnasaññaṃ
atk-abh01a:1717_7: amuñcitvāva nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā anibbiddhapubbaapadālitapubbānaṃ lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ nibbijjhanapadālanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1717_10: Iti so anusaye pajahanto nimittā vuṭṭhāti nāma,
atk-abh01a:1717_16: Tesu maggassa anupādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā dissatīti vatvā anupādinnakato vuṭṭhātīti vadiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1718_0: Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhigatasampayuttāni vicikicchāsahagatanti pañca cittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a:1718_4: Taṃsampayuttā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā tayo arūpakkhandhā.
atk-abh01a:1718_5: Tattha sace sotāpannassa sotāpattimaggo abhāvito abhavissa tāni pañca cittāni chasu ārammaṇesu pariyuṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1718_6: Sotāpattimaggo pana tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānenappattiṃ vārayamāno setusamugghātaṃ abhabbuppattikabhāvaṃ kurumāno anupādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1719_0: Sakadāgāmimaggena cattāri diṭṭhigatavippayuttāni dve domanassasahagatānīti oḷārikakāmarāgabyāpādavasena cha cittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a:1719_1: Anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagatakāmarāgabyāpādavasena tāni eva cha cittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a:1719_2: Arahattamaggena cattāri diṭṭhigatavippayuttāni uddhaccasahagatañcāti pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a:1719_3: Tattha sace tesaṃ ariyānaṃ te maggā abhāvitā assu,
atk-abh01a:1719_4: tāni cittāni chasu ārammaṇesu pariyuṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1719_5: Te pana tesaṃ maggā pariyuṭṭhānappattiṃ vārayamānā setusamugghātaṃ abhabbuppattikabhāvaṃ kurumānā anupādinnakato vuṭṭhahanti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1720_0: Upādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā dissatīti vatvā upādinnakato vuṭṭhātītipi vadiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1720_1: Sace hi sotāpannassa sotāpattimaggo abhāvito abhavissa,
atk-abh01a:1720_2: ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe upādinnakappavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1720_4: Tīṇi saṃyojanāni diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayoti ime pana pañca kilese sotāpattimaggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti.
atk-abh01a:1720_5: Idāni kuto sotāpannassa satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a:1720_6: Evaṃ sotāpattimaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1721_1: ṭhapetvā dve bhave pañcasu bhavesu upādinnakapavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1721_3: Oḷārikāni kāmarāgapaṭighasaṃyojanāni oḷāriko kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayoti ime pana cattāro kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti.
atk-abh01a:1721_4: Idāni kuto sakadāgāmissa dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a:1721_5: Evaṃ sakadāgāmimaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1722_1: ṭhapetvā ekaṃ bhavaṃ dutiyabhave upādinnakappavattaṃ pavatteyya. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1722_3: Aṇusahagatāni kāmarāgapaṭighasaṃyojanāni aṇusahagato kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayoti ime pana cattāro kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti.
atk-abh01a:1722_4: Idāni kuto anāgāmissa ekaṃ bhavaṃ ṭhapetvā dutiyabhave upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a:1722_5: Evaṃ anāgāmimaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1723_3: Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjā mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayoti ime pana aṭṭha kilese so maggo uppajjamānova samugghāteti.
atk-abh01a:1723_4: Idāni kuto khīṇāsavassa punabbhave upādinnakappavattaṃ pavattissati?
atk-abh01a:1723_5: Evaṃ arahattamaggo upādinnakappavattaṃ appavattaṃ kurumāno upādinnakato vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-abh01a:1724_3: arahattamaggo rūpārūpabhavato sabbabhavehipi vuṭṭhāti evāti vadanti.
atk-abh01a:1725_1: “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a:1725_2: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a:1726_0: ‘Sakadāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a:1726_1: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a:1727_0: ‘Anāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ekaṃ bhavaṃ ṭhapetvā kāmadhātuyā dvīsu bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a:1727_1: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a:1728_0: ‘Arahattamaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena rūpadhātuyā vā arūpadhātuyā vā ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a:1728_1: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti.
atk-abh01a:1728_2: Arahato anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa carimaviññāṇassa nirodhena paññā ca sati ca nāmañca
atk-abh01a:1728_3: rūpañca etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhantī”ti.
atk-abh01a:1729_1: ettha pana paṭipadā calati na calatīti? Calati.
atk-abh01a:1729_2: Tathāgatassa hi sāriputtattherassa ca cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā ahesuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1729_4: upari tayo maggā dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1729_6: Sammāsambuddho kira sattāhaṃ daharakumārakaṃ viya theraṃ parihari.
atk-abh01a:1729_14: Ekaccassa hi bhikkhuno cattāropi maggā dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā honti,
atk-abh01a:1730_0: Yathā ca paṭipadā evaṃ adhipatipi calati eva.
atk-abh01a:1730_1: Ekaccassa hi bhikkhuno cattāropi maggā chandādhipateyyā honti,
atk-abh01a:1733_1: Idāni yasmā lokuttarakusalaṃ bhāvento na kevalaṃ upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena jhānaṃyeva bhāveti,
atk-abh01a:1733_21: tasmā etesaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā padānaṃ dassanatthaṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1733_23: idampi bhāvetī’ti puggalajjhāsayena ceva desanāvilāsena ca vīsati nayā desitā honti.
atk-abh01a:1733_24: Dhammaṃ sotuṃ nisinnadevaparisāya hi ye upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena lokuttaraṃ ‘jhāna’nti kathite bujjhanti,
atk-abh01a:1734_0: Sammāsambuddho pana attano buddhasubodhitāya dasabalacatuvesārajjacatupaṭisambhidatāya chaasādhāraṇañāṇayogena
atk-abh01a:1734_6: Tattha yatheva lokuttaraṃ jhānanti vuttaṭṭhāne dasa nayā vibhattā,
atk-abh01a:1734_8: Iti vīsatiyā ṭhānesu dasa dasa katvā dve nayasatāni vibhattāni honti.
atk-abh01a:1735_1: Idāni adhipatibhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1735_2: Tattha chandaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:1735_4: Iti purimasmiṃ suddhike dvenayasatāni chandādhipateyyādīsupi dve dveti nayasahassena bhājetvā paṭhamamaggaṃ dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a:1738_1: Idāni dutiyamaggādīnaṃ dassanatthaṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1738_2: Tattha kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāyāti etesaṃ kilesānaṃ tanubhāvatthāya.
atk-abh01a:1738_13: maddantā pharantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā nuppajjanti.
atk-abh01a:1738_14: Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandā mandā uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a:1739_3: tathā hissa puttā ca dhītaro ca dissantī’ti.
atk-abh01a:1739_6: Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā natthi kilesānaṃ bahalatāti.
atk-abh01a:1739_7: Dvīhi eva kāraṇehissa kilesānaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo –
atk-abh01a:1741_1: Paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā tesaṃyeva tena maggena ñātānaṃ catusaccadhammānaṃ jānanakaṃ indriyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1744_1: Tatiye anavasesappahānāyāti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanubhūtānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ nissesapajahanatthāya.
atk-abh01a:1745_0: Catutthe rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjāya anavasesappahānāyāti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ nissesapajahanatthāya.
atk-abh01a:1745_5: Imesupi dvīsu maggesu navamaṃ aññindriyameva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1747_4: Yathā ca pana paṭhamamagge evaṃ dutiyādīsupi nayasahassamevāti cattāro magge catūhi nayasahassehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a:1748_0: Saccavibhaṅge pana saṭṭhi nayasahassāni lokuttarāni imesaṃ eva vasena nikkhittāni.
atk-abh01a:1748_5: maggaṅgavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati nayasahassāni lokuttarāni imesaṃ eva vasena nikkhittāni.
atk-abh01a:1749_0: Idha pana catūsu maggesu cattāriyeva nayasahassāni.
atk-abh01a:1749_3: Tattha paṭhamamagge sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahatīti sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a:1749_5: Evaṃ sante ‘paṭhamamaggeneva dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahīnattā uparimaggattayena pahātabbā diṭṭhi nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a:1750_3: tasmā sammādiṭṭhi sakiccakā kātabbā maggaṅgāni pūretabbānī’ti.
atk-abh01a:1750_10: so diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati sā taṃ mānaṃ pajahatīti sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a:1750_20: Evaṃ sakadāgāmimagge aṭṭhaṅgāni sakiccakāni katvā āgatāni.
atk-abh01a:1750_24: Tesaṃ pahānena anāgāmimagge aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ sakiccakatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1750_29: Tesaṃ pahānena arahattamagge aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ sakiccakatā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1751_0: Imesu catūsu maggesu paṭhamamaggena cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni.
atk-abh01a:1751_2: adiṭṭhakaṃ passatī’ti diṭṭhakameva passatīti ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā.
atk-abh01a:1751_17: Saccānipi adiṭṭhāneva passatī’ti evaṃvādī puggalo pucchitabbo –
atk-abh01a:1752_0: Tattha saccadassanassa apubbābhāve peḷopamaṃ nāma gahitaṃ –
atk-abh01a:1752_1: ekassa kira cattāro ratanapeḷā sāragabbhe ṭhapitā.
atk-abh01a:1752_2: So rattibhāge peḷāsu uppannakicco dvāraṃ vivaritvā,
atk-abh01a:1752_6: tāsu kiccaṃ katvā dvāraṃ pidahitvā gato.
atk-abh01a:1752_9: Catutthavāre dvāre vivaṭe andhakāre peḷā na paññāyantīti vīmaṃsantasseva sūriyo uggañchi,
atk-abh01a:1752_10: sūriyobhāsena vihate andhakāre peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-abh01a:1753_0: Tattha cattāro peḷā viya cattāri saccāni.
atk-abh01a:1753_1: Tāsu kicce uppanne dvāravivaraṇakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa vipassanābhinīharaṇakālo.
atk-abh01a:1753_4: Vihate andhakāre tassa purisassa peḷānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya maggañāṇassa saccānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo.
atk-abh01a:1753_5: Maggañāṇassa pākaṭāni pana maggasamaṅgissa puggalassa pākaṭāneva honti.
atk-abh01a:1753_6: Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa attanā pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo.
atk-abh01a:1754_2: Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa attanā pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo.
atk-abh01a:1755_2: Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya anāgāmimaggassa attanā pahātabbakilese pajahitvā niruddhakālo.
atk-abh01a:1756_3: Vihate andhakāre tassa peḷānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya arahattamaggañāṇassa catunnaṃ saccānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo.
atk-abh01a:1756_4: Ñāṇassa pākaṭāni pana puggalassa pākaṭāneva honti.
atk-abh01a:1756_5: Peḷāsu kiccaṃ katvā gatakālo viya arahattamaggassa sabbakilesakhepanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1756_6: Sūriyuggamanato paṭṭhāya ālokasseva pavattikālo viya arahattamaggassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya puna saccapaṭicchādakatamābhāvo.
atk-abh01a:1757_1: ‘Kilese pana aññe añño pajahatī’ti ettha khāropamaṃ nāma gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1757_2: Eko puriso kiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ rajakassa adāsi.
atk-abh01a:1757_3: Rajako ūsakhāraṃ chārikakhāraṃ gomayakhāranti tayo khāre datvā khārehi khāditabhāvaṃ ñatvā udake vikkhāletvā oḷārikoḷārikaṃ malaṃ pavāhesi.
atk-abh01a:1757_4: Tato na tāva parisuddhanti dutiyampi tatheva khāre datvā,
atk-abh01a:1757_7: Tato na tāva parisuddhanti tatiyampi te khāre datvā udake vikkhāletvā tato saṇhataraṃ malaṃ pavāhesi.
atk-abh01a:1757_8: Tato na tāva parisuddhanti catutthampi te khāre datvā,
atk-abh01a:1757_9: udake vikkhāletvā aṃsuabbhantaragatampi nissesaṃ malaṃ pavāhetvā sāmikassa adāsi.
atk-abh01a:1758_1: Tividhakhāradānakālo viya tīsu anupassanāsu kammassa pavattanakālo.
atk-abh01a:1758_2: Udake vikkhāletvā oḷārikoḷārikamalappavāhanaṃ viya sotāpattimaggena pañcakilesakhepanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1758_3: Dutiyampi tesaṃ khārānaṃ anuppadānaṃ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1758_5: Tato ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ vattha’nti puna khārattayadānaṃ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1758_7: ‘Na tāva parisuddhaṃ vattha’nti puna khārattayadānaṃ viya ‘na tāva parisuddhaṃ idaṃ citta’nti tāsuyeva tīsu anupassanāsu kammappavattanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1758_8: Tato vikkhālanena aṃsuabbhantaragate male pavāhetvā parisuddhassa rajatapaṭṭasadisassa gandhakaraṇḍake
atk-abh01a:1758_9: nikkhittassa vatthassa icchiticchitakkhaṇe paridahanaṃ viya arahattamaggena aṭṭhannaṃ kilesānaṃ khepitattā
atk-abh01a:1758_11: Idaṃ ‘aññe añño kilese pajahatī’ti ettha opammaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1759_3: Tamenaṃ rajako ūse vā khāre vā gomaye vā sammadditvā acche udake vikkhāleti.
atk-abh01a:1759_4: Kiñcāpi taṃ hoti vatthaṃ parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1759_5: atha khvassa hotiyeva ‘aṇusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato’.
atk-abh01a:1759_8: Yopissa hoti aṇusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato,
atk-abh01a:1759_11: kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti,
atk-abh01a:1759_12: atha khvassa hotiyeva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu aṇusahagato ‘asmī’ti māno,
atk-abh01a:1759_15: so aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati –
atk-abh01a:1759_19: iti vedanā iti saññā iti saṅkhārā iti viññāṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1759_22: Tassimesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu aṇusahagato ‘asmī’ti māno,
atk-abh01a:1760_0: Tattha sotāpattimaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a:1760_1: Sakadāgāmimaggena dve domanassasahagatacittāni tanukāni bhavanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a:1760_3: Arahattamaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīyanti saddhiṃ cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammehi.
atk-abh01a:1760_4: Imesaṃ dvādasannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya khīṇāsavassa cittaṅgavasena puna pacchatopavattanakakileso nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a:1761_1: eko kira mahārājā paccante ārakkhaṃ datvā mahānagare issariyaṃ anubhavanto vasati.
atk-abh01a:1761_3: Tasmiṃ samaye dvādasa corajeṭṭhakā anekehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ raṭṭhaṃ vilumpanti.
atk-abh01a:1761_6: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ kattabbaṃ karissāmī’ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-abh01a:1761_7: Te paṭhamasampahāreneva anekehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ pañca corajeṭṭhake ghātayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1761_8: Sesā satta janā attano attano parivāre gahetvā pabbataṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1763_1: Te tatiyasampahārena saddhiṃ sahāyapurisehi dve corajeṭṭhake ghātayitvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño pesayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1764_0: Puna rājā ‘avasese vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-abh01a:1764_1: Te catutthasampahārena saparivāre pañca corajeṭṭhake ghātayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:1764_2: Dvādasannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya koci coro nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a:1764_3: Khemā janapadā ure putte naccentā maññe viharanti.
atk-abh01a:1764_4: Rājā vijitasaṅgāmehi yodhehi parivuto varapāsādagato mahāsampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-abh01a:1765_3: Tesaṃ sahāyā anekasahassapurisā viya cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakapāpadhammā.
atk-abh01a:1765_4: Rañño paccanto kupitoti pahitakālo viya ārammaṇe kilesesu uppannesu ‘bhante,
atk-abh01a:1765_6: ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanadānaṃ viya ‘kilese niggaṇha bhikkhū’ti dhammarañño kammaṭṭhānācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1765_7: Saparivārānaṃ pañcannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālo viya sotāpattimaggena sampayuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ pahānaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1766_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya sammāsambuddhassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1766_1: ‘Sesake ca gaṇhantū’ti puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1766_2: Dutiyasampahārena saparivārānaṃ dvinnaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ dubbalīkaraṇaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggena sasampayuttānaṃ
atk-abh01a:1767_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya satthu paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1767_1: ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato anāgāmimaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1767_2: Tatiyasampahārena saparivārānaṃ dvinnaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātanaṃ viya anāgāmimaggena sasampayuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ domanassacittānaṃ pahānaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1768_0: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya tathāgatassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1768_1: ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti puna dhanadānaṃ viya bhagavato arahattamaggassa vipassanācikkhanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1768_2: Catutthasampahārena saparivārānaṃ pañcannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya janapadassa khemakālo
atk-abh01a:1768_3: viya arahattamaggena sasampayuttesu pañcasu akusalacittesu pahīnesu dvādasannaṃ akusalacittānaṃ pahīnakālato
atk-abh01a:1768_4: paṭṭhāya puna cittaṅgavasena uppajjanakassa akusaladhammassa abhāvo.
atk-abh01a:1768_5: Rañño vijitasaṅgāmassa amaccagaṇaparivutassa varapāsāde mahāsampattianubhavanaṃ viya khīṇāsavaparivutassa
atk-abh01a:1773_1: Idāni akusaladhammapadaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame dhammā akusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1773_2: Tattha dhammavavatthānādivārappabhedo ca heṭṭhā āgatānaṃ padānaṃ atthavinicchayo ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1773_7: tasmā ekantaṃ kāmāvacarampi samānaṃ etaṃ ‘kāmāvacara’nti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1773_8: Diṭṭhigatasampayuttanti ettha diṭṭhi eva diṭṭhigataṃ ‘gūthagataṃ muttagata’ntiādīni viya.
atk-abh01a:1774_2: ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādīni ayoniso manasikāroti evamādīhi kāraṇehi imassa diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātassa micchādassanassa uppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:1774_3: Ye hi ete diṭṭhivādapaṭisaṃyuttā asaddhammā tesaṃ bahumānapubbaṅgamena atikkantamajjhattena upaparikkhārahitena savanena,
atk-abh01a:1774_4: ye ca diṭṭhivipannā akalyāṇamittā taṃsampavaṅkatāsaṅkhātāya akalyāṇamittatāya,
atk-abh01a:1774_5: buddhādīnaṃ ariyānañceva sappurisānañca adassanakāmatāya catusatipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akovidattena
atk-abh01a:1774_7: ca saṃvarabhedasaṅkhātena avinayena teheva kāraṇehi paribhāvitena ayoniso manasikārena kotūhalamaṅgalādipasutatāya
atk-abh01a:1774_9: Asaṅkhārabhāvo panassa cittassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:1776_0: Cittassekaggatā hotīti pāṇātipātādīsupi avikkhittabhāvena cittassa ekaggatā hoti.
atk-abh01a:1776_1: Manussā hi cittaṃ samādahitvā avikkhittā hutvā avirajjhamānāni satthāni pāṇasarīresu nipātenti,
atk-abh01a:1777_1: virajjhitvā gahaṇato vā vitathā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a:1778_0: Ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalanti ettha balattho niddesavāre āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh01a:1782_0: Samatho hotītiādīsu aññesu kiccesu vikkhepasamanato samatho.
atk-abh01a:1783_1: cha yugaḷakānīti ime dhammā na gahitā. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1783_4: Kiṃ pana diṭṭhigatikā attano attano satthārānaṃ na saddahantīti?
atk-abh01a:1783_6: Sā pana saddhā nāma na hoti,
atk-abh01a:1783_10: Asatiyacitte pana sati natthīti na gahitā.
atk-abh01a:1783_11: Kiṃ diṭṭhigatikā attanā katakammaṃ na sarantīti? Saranti.
atk-abh01a:1783_12: Sā pana sati nāma na hoti.
atk-abh01a:1783_16: Sā pana akusalakkhandhānaṃ sativirahitattā satipaṭipakkhattā ca micchāmaggamicchattānaṃ pūraṇatthaṃ tattha pariyāyena desanā katā.
atk-abh01a:1783_19: Andhabālacitte pana paññā natthīti na gahitā.
atk-abh01a:1783_24: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ sadarathaṃ garukaṃ bhāriyaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ thaddhaṃ akammaññaṃ gilānaṃ vaṅkaṃ kuṭilaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1783_25: Tasmā passaddhādīni cha yugaḷakāni na gahitāni.
atk-abh01a:1784_0: Ettāvatā padapaṭipāṭiyā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiāruḷhāni dvattiṃsa padāni dassetvā idāni yevāpanakadhamme dassetuṃ ye vā pana tasmiṃ samayetiādimāha.
atk-abh01a:1784_1: Tattha sabbesupi akusalacittesu chando adhimokkho manasikāro māno issā macchariyaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ
atk-abh01a:1784_2: kukkuccanti ime daseva yevāpanakā honti dhammā,
atk-abh01a:1784_5: Imasmiṃ pana citte chando adhimokkho manasikāro uddhaccanti ime apaṇṇakaṅgasaṅkhātā cattārova yevāpanakā honti.
atk-abh01a:1786_1: yevāpanakavasena vuttāni cattārīti sabbānipi imasmiṃ dhammuddesavāre chattiṃsa dhammapadāni bhavanti.
atk-abh01a:1786_2: Cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni hāpetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni dvattiṃsameva.
atk-abh01a:1786_4: vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobho mohoti soḷasa dhammā honti.
atk-abh01a:1787_0: Tesu soḷasasu satta dhammā avibhattikā nava savibhattikā honti.
atk-abh01a:1787_2: Phasso saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyaṃ mohoti ime satta avibhattikā.
atk-abh01a:1787_3: Vedanā cittaṃ vitakko cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobhoti ime nava savibhattikā.
atk-abh01a:1788_0: Tesu cha dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā, eko tīsu,
atk-abh01a:1788_3: Cittaṃ vitakko micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobhoti ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
atk-abh01a:1788_4: Tesu hi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā cittaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1788_6: Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā vitakko hotīti vutto,
atk-abh01a:1788_9: Ahirikaṃ balāni patvā ahirikabalaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1788_12: Lobho mūlaṃ patvā lobho hotīti vutto.
atk-abh01a:1789_0: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā vedanā hotīti vuttā,
atk-abh01a:1789_3: Evaṃ ekova dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a:1790_0: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā vīriyindriyaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1790_4: Evaṃ ayaṃ eko dhammo catūsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a:1791_0: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā cittassekaggatā hotīti vutto,
atk-abh01a:1791_6: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
atk-abh01a:1792_0: Sabbepi panete dhammā phassapañcakavasena jhānaṅgavasena indriyavasena maggaṅgavasena balavasena mūlavasena
atk-abh01a:1792_1: kammapathavasena lokanāsakavasena piṭṭhidukavasenāti nava rāsayo honti.
atk-abh01a:1792_2: Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ paṭhamakusalacittaniddese vuttamevāti.
atk-abh01a:1795_3: Yaṃ pana kusalaniddese ‘ārammaṇaṃ ogāhetvā anupavisitvā tiṭṭhatīti avaṭṭhitī’ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1796_1: Uddhaccavicikicchāvasena pavattassa visāhārassa paṭipakkhato avisāhāroti evarūpopi attho idha na labbhati.
atk-abh01a:1797_1: Vīriyindriyaniddese yo heṭṭhā ‘nikkamo ceso kāmānaṃ panudanāyā’tiādi nayo vutto,
atk-abh01a:1798_10: Micchādassanañhi uppajjamānaṃ sammādassanaṃ vinivijjhati ceva vilometi ca.
atk-abh01a:1798_11: Kadāci sassatassa kadāci ucchedassa gahaṇato diṭṭhiyā virūpaṃ phanditanti diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1798_12: Diṭṭhigatiko hi ekasmiṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:1799_5: Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā niccādivasena parato āmasatīti parāmāso.
atk-abh01a:1799_9: Yathā hi disāmūḷhena ayaṃ asukagāmassa nāma pathoti gahitopi taṃ gāmaṃ na sampāpeti,
atk-abh01a:1799_10: evaṃ diṭṭhigatikena sugatipathoti gahitāpi diṭṭhi sugatiṃ na pāpetīti ayāthāvapathato,
atk-abh01a:1799_13: Tattheva paribbhamanato taranti ettha bālāti titthaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1799_15: Titthiyānaṃ vā sañjātidesaṭṭhena nivāsaṭhānaṭṭhena ca āyatanantipi titthāyatanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1800_2: Sahajātadhammesu pana akampanaṭṭheneva ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1801_12: Akusalañca taṃ mūlañca akusalānaṃ vā mūlanti akusalamūlaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1802_6: Aniccādīhi saddhiṃ yojetvā na bujjhatīti asambodho.
atk-abh01a:1802_9: Rūpādīsu ekadhammampi aniccādisāmaññato na saṅgaṇhātīti asaṃgāhanā.
atk-abh01a:1802_12: Dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ pati na apekkhatīti apaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-abh01a:1803_0: Kusalākusalakammesu viparītavuttiyā sabhāvaggahaṇābhāvena vā ekampi kammaṃ etassa paccakkhaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a:1803_1: sayaṃ vā kassaci kammassa paccakkhakaraṇaṃ nāma na hotīti appaccakkhakammaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1803_2: Yaṃ etasmiṃ anuppajjamāne cittasantānaṃ mejjhaṃ bhaveyya, suci, vodānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1803_17: Yathā hi mahāpalighasaṅkhātā laṅgī durugghāṭā hoti,
atk-abh01a:1805_3: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ kiñcāpi chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:1805_5: yadā kulaputto micchādiṭṭhikassa kulassa kumārikaṃ pattheti.
atk-abh01a:1805_6: Te ca ‘aññadiṭṭhikā tumhe’ti kumārikaṃ na denti.
atk-abh01a:1805_7: Athaññe ñātakā ‘yaṃ tumhe karotha tamevāyaṃ karissatī’ti dāpenti.
atk-abh01a:1805_10: Gacchante gacchante kāle etesaṃ kiriyā manāpāti laddhiṃ roceti,
atk-abh01a:1808_1: Tatiyaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā nayena aparāmasantassa
atk-abh01a:1808_3: Idha mānena saddhiṃ pañca apaṇṇakaṅgāni honti.
atk-abh01a:1810_1: Catutthaṃ vuttappakāresu eva ṭhānesu yadā sīse kheḷaṃ khipanti,
atk-abh01a:1810_3: tadā tassa pariharaṇatthaṃ saussāhena antarantarā olokentānaṃ rājanāṭakesu nikkhantesu ussāraṇāya vattamānāya
atk-abh01a:1810_4: tena tena chiddena olokentānañcāti evamādīsu ṭhānesu uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:1810_5: Idha pana thinamiddhehi saddhiṃ satta yevāpanakā honti.
atk-abh01a:1810_7: Taṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vasena dhammagaṇanā veditabbāti.
atk-abh01a:1812_1: Pañcamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:1814_1: Chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamānipi vedanaṃ parivattetvā pītipadañca hāpetvā dutiyatatiyacatutthesu vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a:1814_2: Imesu aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu sahajātādhipati ārammaṇādhipatīti dvepi adhipatayo labbhanti.
atk-abh01a:1816_1: Navamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu domanassitassa paṭighaṃ uppādayato uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:1817_2: Tathā dukkhadomanassapadāni lakkhaṇādito pana aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1818_6: dussanamattameva vā tanti doso so caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo pahaṭāsiviso viya,
atk-abh01a:1820_1: Issāmacchariyakukkuccesu pana aññatarena saddhiṃ pañca pañca hutvāpi uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a:1820_10: Taṃ laddhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1822_16: Apare pana assujananaṭṭhena assuropanato assuropoti vadanti.
atk-abh01a:1822_23: Sesamettha saṅgahasuññatavāresu ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh01a:1824_3: sayameva vā paresaṃ aparādhaṃ anussaritvā kujjhamānassa uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:1825_3: Tasmā ettha vinā issāmacchariyakukkuccehi cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni thinamiddhanti ime cha issādīnaṃ uppattikāle
atk-abh01a:1825_4: tesu aññatarena saddhiṃ satta yevāpanakā ekakkhaṇe uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a:1825_6: Imesu pana dvīsu domanassacittesu sahajātādhipatiyeva labbhati,
atk-abh01a:1825_8: Na hi kuddho kiñci garuṃ karotīti.
atk-abh01a:1827_1: Ekādasamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa kaṅkhāpavattikāle uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:1827_7: Sabhāvaṃ vā vicinanto etāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā.
atk-abh01a:1829_1: Niddesavārassa cittassekaggatāniddese yasmā idaṃ dubbalaṃ cittaṃ pavattiṭṭhitimattakamevettha hoti,
atk-abh01a:1829_2: tasmā ‘saṇṭhitī’tiādīni avatvā cittassa ‘ṭhitī’ti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1829_3: Teneva ca kāraṇena uddesavārepi ‘samādhindriya’ntiādi na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1830_12: aniccaṃ nu kho’tiādipavattiyā ekasmiṃ ākāre saṇṭhātuṃ asamatthatāya samantato setīti saṃsayo.
atk-abh01a:1830_13: Ekaṃsaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthatāya na ekaṃsaggāhoti anekaṃsaggāho.
atk-abh01a:1830_19: Vicikicchā hi uppajjitvā cittaṃ thaddhaṃ karoti.
atk-abh01a:1830_20: Yasmā panesā uppajjamānā ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manaṃ vilikhantī viya,
atk-abh01a:1832_2: Idañhi cittaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattaṃ hutvā uddhataṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:1834_5: Yathā hi vaṭṭacaturassesu dvīsu maṇīsu pabbhāraṭṭhāne pavaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhesu vaṭṭamaṇi ekanteneva pavaṭṭati,
atk-abh01a:1835_0: Imehi pana dvādasahipi akusalacittehi kamme āyūhite,
atk-abh01a:1835_3: Vicikicchāsahagate aladdhādhimokkhe dubbalepi paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhamāne uddhaccasahagataṃ laddhādhimokkhaṃ balavaṃ kasmā nākaḍḍhatīti?
atk-abh01a:1835_9: Tesu hi yena kenaci kamme āyūhite tāya cetanāya catūsu apāyesu paṭisandhi hoti.
atk-abh01a:1839_1: Idāni abyākatapadaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1839_11: asādhāraṇakammapaccayavaseneva uppattiṃ dīpetuṃ kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1841_4: Tesu cittaṃ phassapañcakavasena ceva indriyavasena ca dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ gacchati,
atk-abh01a:1843_1: Cittassekaggatāniddese cittassa ṭhitīti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1843_2: Idampi hi dubbalaṃ cittaṃ pavattiṭṭhitimattamevettha labbhati,
atk-abh01a:1844_4: Cakkhudvārādīsu hi catūsu upādārūpameva upādārūpaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-abh01a:1844_5: upādārūpeyeva upādārūpaṃ ghaṭṭente paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso balavā na hoti.
atk-abh01a:1844_6: Catunnaṃ adhikaraṇīnaṃ upari cattāro kappāsapicupiṇḍe ṭhapetvā picupiṇḍeheva pahatakālo viya phuṭṭhamattameva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1844_8: Kāyadvāre pana bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikakāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
atk-abh01a:1844_9: Yathā adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā kūṭena paharantassa kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ chinditvā kūṭaṃ adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhatīti,
atk-abh01a:1845_0: Imesaṃ pana pañcannaṃ cittānaṃ vatthudvārārammaṇāni nibaddhāneva honti,
atk-abh01a:1845_2: Kusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇañhi cakkhupasādaṃ vatthuṃ katvā iṭṭhe ca iṭṭhamajjhatte ca catusamuṭṭhānikarūpārammaṇe
atk-abh01a:1845_4: Sotaviññāṇādīni sotapasādādīni vatthuṃ katvā iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattesu saddādīsu savanaghāyanasāyanaphusanakiccāni
atk-abh01a:1846_11: Yasmā panetaṃ cittaṃ neva kusalaṃ nākusalaṃ,
atk-abh01a:1846_12: tasmā sammāsaṅkappoti vā micchāsaṅkappoti vā na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1846_13: Saṅgahavāre labbhamānampi jhānaṅgaṃ pañcaviññāṇasote patitvā gatanti.
atk-abh01a:1846_14: Maggaṅgaṃ pana na labbhatiyevāti na uddhaṭaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1846_16: Imassa cittassa vatthu nibaddhaṃ hadayavatthumeva hoti.
atk-abh01a:1846_21: Idañhi pañcadvāre pañcasu ārammaṇesu sampaṭicchanaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a:1846_22: Kusalavipākesu cakkhuviññāṇādīsu niruddhesu taṃsamanantarā tāneva ṭhānappattāni rūpārammaṇādīni sampaṭicchati.
atk-abh01a:1847_8: Ubhayatthāpi pañcaviññāṇasote patitvā gatattāyeva jhānaṅgāni na uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh01a:1848_3: tasmiṃ yevārammaṇe santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā pañcasu dvāresu ṭhatvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a:1848_4: Chasu dvāresu pana balavārammaṇe tadārammaṇā hutvā vipaccati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a:1848_7: udakaṃ chijjitvā thokaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāvaṃ anubandhitvā yathāsotameva gacchati,
atk-abh01a:1848_8: evameva chasu dvāresu balavārammaṇe palobhayamāne āpāthagate javanaṃ javati.
atk-abh01a:1848_10: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ bhavaṅgassa vāraṃ adatvā javanena gahitārammaṇaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ dve cittavāre pavattitvā bhavaṅgameva otarati.
atk-abh01a:1848_11: Gavakkhandhe nadiṃ tarantepi evameva upamā vitthāretabbā.
atk-abh01a:1848_12: Evamesā yaṃ javanena gahitārammaṇaṃ tasseva gahitattā tadārammaṇaṃ nāma hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a:1849_0: Dutiyā pana pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccati. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a:1849_1: Manussaloke tāva jaccandhajaccabadhirajaccaeḷajaccummattakaubhatobyañjanakanapuṃsakānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a:1849_2: Paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
atk-abh01a:1849_5: maraṇakāle cuti hutvāti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccatīti.
atk-abh01a:1852_1: Idāni aṭṭhamahāvipākacittāni dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1852_2: Tattha pāḷiyaṃ nayamattaṃ dassetvā sabbavārā saṃkhittā.
atk-abh01a:1852_4: Yo panettha viseso taṃ dassetuṃ alobho abyākatamūlantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1852_5: Yampi na vuttaṃ taṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a:1852_6: yo hi kāmāvacarakusalesu kammadvārakammapathapuññakiriyavatthubhedo vutto so idha natthi. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:1853_0: Asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānañcettha kusalato ceva paccayabhedato ca veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1853_5: Hīnādibhedepi imāni hīnamajjhimapaṇītehi chandādīhi anipphāditattā hīnamajjhimapaṇītāni nāma na honti.
atk-abh01a:1854_0: Idāni imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākacittānaṃ vipaccanaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.

atk-abh01a:1868_2: saṃvarāsaṃvare paṭṭhapetuṃ samatthabhāvaṃ upagatassa cakkhudvārasmiṃ ‘iṭṭhārammaṇe’ āpāthamāgate kiriyamanodhātuyā
atk-abh01a:1869_3: cakkhuviññāṇe vā sampaṭicchane vā santīraṇe vā ṭhatvā nivattissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
atk-abh01a:1869_4: Voṭṭhabbanavasena pana ṭhatvā ekaṃ vā dve vā cittāni pavattanti.
atk-abh01a:1869_5: Tato āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā puna bhavaṅgaṃ otarati idampi ārammaṇadubbalatāya eva hoti.

atk-abh01a:1870_6: atirekaṃ kakkaṭakamaggādīhi palāyitvā puna nadiṃyeva otarati,
atk-abh01a:1870_8: Ettha hi nadiyaṃ udakappavattanakālo viya bhavaṅgavīthippavattanakālo.
atk-abh01a:1870_12: Kakkaṭakamaggādīhi palāyitvā puna udakassa nadīotaraṇaṃ viya javanaṃ javitvā tadārammaṇe anuppanneyeva puna bhavaṅgotaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1871_0: Sace pana balavārammaṇaṃ āpāthagataṃ hoti kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite cakkhuviññāṇādīni uppajjanti.

atk-abh01a:1871_6: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ santīraṇaṃ tadārammaṇanti cattāri vipākacittāni gaṇanūpagāni honti.

atk-abh01a:1872_4: Iminā saddhiṃ purimāni cattāri pañca honti.

atk-abh01a:1875_6: Iti imāni pañca purimehi sattahi saddhiṃ dvādasa honti.
atk-abh01a:1875_10: Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samasaṭṭhi vipākacittāni uppajjanti.
atk-abh01a:1876_1: eko kira puriso phalitambarukkhamūle sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipanno niddāyati.
atk-abh01a:1876_2: Athekaṃ ambapakkaṃ vaṇṭato muccitvā tassa kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānaṃ viya ‘tha’nti bhūmiyaṃ pati.
atk-abh01a:1876_3: So tassa saddena pabujjhitvā ummīletvā olokesi.
atk-abh01a:1876_4: Tato hatthaṃ pasāretvā phalaṃ gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā paribhuñji.

atk-abh01a:1877_2: Ambapakkassa vaṇṭato muccitvā kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānassa patanakālo viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanakālo.

atk-abh01a:1879_7: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ ekappahāreneva pupphaphalapallavaggahaṇaṃ utuniyāmo nāma.
atk-abh01a:1879_11: evaṃ tassa tassa kammassa taṃtaṃsadisavipākadānameva kammaniyāmo nāma.
atk-abh01a:1880_3: Tato pajjalitaṃ tiṇakaraḷaṃ uṭṭhahitvā ākāsena gacchato kākassa gīvāya paṭimuñci.

atk-abh01a:1880_8: Tato ekissā kāraṇā mā sabbe nassantu,
atk-abh01a:1880_10: Nāviko ‘na sakkhissāmi etaṃ udake uppilavamānaṃ passitu’nti vālikāghaṭaṃ gīvāyaṃ bandhāpetvā khipāpesi.
atk-abh01a:1880_15: Sammāsambuddhassa jetavane nisīditvā dhammaṃ kathentassa imāni tīṇi vatthūni ekappahāreneva ārocesuṃ.
atk-abh01a:1880_17: tehi katakammameva ta’nti atītaṃ āharitvā dassento āha –
atk-abh01a:1881_0: Kāko purimattabhāve manusso hutvā ekaṃ duṭṭhagoṇaṃ dametuṃ asakkonto gīvāya palālaveṇiṃ bandhitvā aggiṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a:1881_2: Idāni taṃ kammaṃ etassa ākāsena gacchatopi na muccituṃ adāsi.
atk-abh01a:1881_4: Eko kukkuro tāya paricito hutvā araññaṃ gacchantiyā saddhiṃ gacchati,
atk-abh01a:1881_7: Sā tena aṭṭīyamānā kukkuraṃ nivāretuṃ asakkontī vālikāghaṭaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā udake khipi.
atk-abh01a:1881_8: Taṃ kammaṃ tassā samuddamajjhe muccituṃ nādāsi.
atk-abh01a:1881_9: Sopi bhikkhu purimattabhāve gopālako hutvā bilaṃ paviṭṭhāya godhāya sākhābhaṅgamuṭṭhiyā dvāraṃ thakesi.
atk-abh01a:1881_10: Tato sattame divase sayaṃ āgantvā vivari.
atk-abh01a:1881_13: Taṃ kammaṃ tassa pabbatantaraṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa muccituṃ nādāsīti.
atk-abh01a:1881_14: Imāni tīṇi vatthūni samodhānetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –

atk-abh01a:1892_5: ekādasannaṃ vipākacittānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo.

atk-abh01a:1892_8: vipākacittānaṃ kāyaviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo.
atk-abh01a:1892_9: Sālāsāmikassa sālāya sampaṭicchanakālo viya kāyaviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

atk-abh01a:1893_5: ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ dvinnaṃ upekkhāsahagatajavanānaṃ avasāne tādisāneva dve tadārammaṇāni uppajjanti.

atk-abh01a:1894_5: Catunnaṃ pana duhetukakusalacittānaṃ aññatarajavanassa pariyosāne ahetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena patiṭṭhāti.

atk-abh01a:1895_1: Tesu ekaṃ gahetvā purimāni tīṇi cattāri honti.
atk-abh01a:1895_2: Evaṃ pañcasu dvāresu cattāri cattāri katvā ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite vīsati vipākacittāni uppajjantīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a:1895_3: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre cattāri sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni cattārīti aṭṭha honti.

atk-abh01a:1896_4: candanavane divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā gatassa cīvaragandhaghāyanakāle ghānaviññāṇaṃ,

atk-abh01a:1897_0: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana catūsu somanassasahagatākusalacittesu javitesu kusalavipākaṃ somanassasahagatāhetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti.

atk-abh01a:1897_2: Yaṃ pana ‘javanena tadārammaṇaṃ niyametabba’nti vuttaṃ taṃ kusalaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1898_0: Idaṃ pana javanaṃ kusalatthāya vā akusalatthāya vā ko niyāmetīti?
atk-abh01a:1898_2: Āvajjanena hi yoniso āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena yoniso vavatthāpite javanaṃ akusalaṃ bhavissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1898_3: Āvajjanena ayoniso āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena ayoniso vavatthāpite javanaṃ kusalaṃ bhavissatītipi aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-abh01a:1898_4: Ubhayena pana yoniso āvaṭṭite vavatthāpite ca javanaṃ kusalaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:1899_0: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana kaṅkhato uddhatassa ca tadārammaṇaṃ kiṃ hotīti?

atk-abh01a:2042_2: Tattha sabbapacchimo atthi rūpaṃ upādā atthi rūpaṃ noupādāti evaṃ idha vuttaṃ mātikaṃ anāmasitvā ṭhapito.

atk-abh01a:2043_0: Idāni yo yaṃ catukko sanidassanaduko so yasmā yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ taṃ atthi sappaṭighaṃ,

atk-abh01a:2044_0: Yathā cāyaṃ catutthaduko yogaṃ na gacchati,
