atk-abh01a:2049_3: sadisohamasmīti vidhā”tiādīsu hi māno vidhā nāma.
atk-abh01a:2049_7: “Ekavidhena ñāṇavatthuṃ duvidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādīsu koṭṭhāso vidhā nāma.
atk-abh01a:2050_2: sabbe brāhmaṇā sabbe vessā sabbe suddā āgacchantu”,
atk-abh01a:2050_7: ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ ‘sajātisaṅgaho’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2050_8: ‘Ekajātikā āgacchantū’ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe jātiyā ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh01a:2050_16: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ ‘sañjātisaṅgaho’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2050_17: Ekaṭṭhāne jātā saṃvuddhā āgacchantūti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbe sañjātiṭṭhānena nivutthokāsena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh01a:2050_24: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ ‘kiriyāsaṅgaho’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2050_25: Sabbeva hete attano kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh01a:2053_2: atthi rūpaṃ noupādā’ti evaṃ bhedasabbhāvato pucchāpubbaṅgamaṃ padabhājanaṃ dassento katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādātiādimāha.
atk-abh01a:2054_1: Evaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ upādārūpaṃ saṅkhepato uddisitvā puna tadeva vitthārato niddisanto katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhāyatanantiādimāha.
atk-abh01a:2054_4: Etesu ‘buddhacakkhu samantacakkhu ñāṇacakkhu dibbacakkhu dhammacakkhū’ti pañcavidhaṃ paññācakkhu.
atk-abh01a:2054_10: “Cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti idaṃ ñāṇacakkhu nāma.
atk-abh01a:2054_13: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti idaṃ dibbacakkhu nāma.
atk-abh01a:2054_14: “Tasmiṃ yevāsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggattayasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammacakkhu nāma.
atk-abh01a:2055_1: Tattha yoyaṃ akkhikūpake patiṭṭhito heṭṭhā akkhikūpakaṭṭhikena,
atk-abh01a:2055_11: taṃsannissitavaṇṇagandharasaojāsaṇṭhānasambhavā cā’ti imāni dasa catusamuṭṭhānikattā cattālīsaṃ honti.
atk-abh01a:2055_12: Jīvitaṃ bhāvo kāyapasādo cakkhupasādoti cattāri ekantakammasamuṭṭhānānevāti imesaṃ catucattālīsāya rūpānaṃ vasena catucattālīsasambhāro.
atk-abh01a:2055_13: Yaṃ loko setaṃ cakkhuṃ puthulaṃ visaṭaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ ‘cakkhu’nti sañjānanto na cakkhuṃ sañjānāti,
atk-abh01a:2056_0: Yo panettha sito ettha paṭibaddho catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo,
atk-abh01a:2056_2: Tadetaṃ tassa sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe,
atk-abh01a:2059_1: Yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādoti idhāpi upayogattheyeva sāmivacanaṃ;
atk-abh01a:2059_5: Yaṃ pana indriyagocarasutte “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ upādāya pasādo pathavīdhātuyā tīhi mahābhūtehi saṅgahito
atk-abh01a:2059_6: āpodhātuyā ca tejodhātuyā ca vāyodhātuyā ca,” catuparivattasutte “dvinnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo
atk-abh01a:2059_7: pathavīdhātuyā ca āpodhātuyā ca dvīhi mahābhūtehi saṅgahito tejodhātuyā ca vāyodhātuyā cā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2059_10: Yo ca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo so tesu ekekassāpi dinnaṃ dvinnampi pasādoyevāti iminā pariyāyena tattha desanā āgatā.
atk-abh01a:2059_12: Tasmā idha ‘catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2060_0: ‘Ayaṃ me attā’ti bālajanena pariggahitattā attabhāvo vuccati sarīrampi khandhapañcakampi.
atk-abh01a:2060_1: Tasmiṃ pariyāpanno tannissitoti attabhāvapariyāpanno cakkhuviññāṇena passituṃ na sakkāti anidassano.
atk-abh01a:2061_1: yena karaṇabhūtena cakkhunā ayaṃ satto idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ rūpaṃ atīte passi vā,
atk-abh01a:2061_6: atītaṃ vā rūpaṃ atītena cakkhunā passi,
atk-abh01a:2061_9: sace taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgaccheyya cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passeyyāti idamettha parikappavacanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2062_0: Ettāvatā ‘passi vā’tiādīhi catūhi padehi cakkhuṃpetantiādīni cuddasa nāmāni yojetvā cakkhāyatanassa cattāro vavatthāpananayā vuttāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh01a:2062_1: Ettha hi yena cakkhunā anidassanena sappaṭighena rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ passi vā cakkhuṃpetaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a:2062_3: idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhāyatananti ayameko nayo.
atk-abh01a:2063_1: Idāni yasmā vijjuniccharaṇādikālesu anoloketukāmassāpi rūpaṃ cakkhupasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-abh01a:2063_2: tasmā taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ dutiyo niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a:2063_3: Tattha yamhi cakkhumhīti yamhi adhikaraṇabhūte cakkhumhi.
atk-abh01a:2063_9: Atītañhi rūpaṃ atīte cakkhusmiṃ paṭihaññi nāma.
atk-abh01a:2063_12: Sace taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgaccheyya,
atk-abh01a:2063_13: cakkhumhi paṭihaññeyya taṃ rūpanti ayamettha parikappo.
atk-abh01a:2063_14: Atthato pana pasādaṃ ghaṭṭayamānameva rūpaṃ paṭihaññati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2064_1: Idāni yasmā attano icchāya oloketukāmassa rūpe cakkhuṃ upasaṃharato cakkhu rūpasmiṃ paṭihaññati,
atk-abh01a:2064_2: tasmā taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ tatiyo niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh01a:2064_4: Ettha pana cakkhu ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchamānameva rūpamhi paṭihaññati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2065_6: Rūpaṃ ārabbhāti rūpārammaṇaṃ āgamma, sandhāya, paṭicca.
atk-abh01a:2065_7: Iminā cakkhupasādavatthukānaṃ phassādīnaṃ purejātapaccayena cakkhudvārajavanavīthipariyāpannānaṃ ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayapaccayehi
atk-abh01a:2065_9: Itaresu pañcasu vāresu rūpaṃ ārammaṇamassāti rūpārammaṇoti evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayamatteneva paccayabhāvo dassito.
atk-abh01a:2065_11: evaṃ imesupi dasasu vāresu cattāro cattāro vavatthāpananayā veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2065_12: Evaṃ katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhāyatananti pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ cakkhuṃ ‘idaṃ ta’nti nānappakārato dassetuṃ,
atk-abh01a:2065_16: Ekekasmiñcettha catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vavatthāpananayānaṃ āgatattā dvipaññāsāya nayehi paṭimaṇḍetvāva dassitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2066_4: Taṃ sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne padese vuttappakārāhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ,
atk-abh01a:2066_7: vaṇṇādīhi parivutaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a:2067_2: hutvā ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a:2068_2: hutvā jivhāviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānā tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a:2069_0: Yāvatā pana imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇakarūpaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-abh01a:2069_3: yathāvuttappakāraupakārupatthambhanānupālanaparivārameva hutvā kāyaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh01a:2069_5: Seso pāḷippabhedo ca attho ca cakkhuniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:2069_8: passīti ādīnaṃ ṭhāne suṇītiādipadāni ca āgatāni.
atk-abh01a:2069_10: nayanaṃpeta’nti imassa ca padadvayassa abhāvā dvādasa dvādasa nāmāni honti.
atk-abh01a:2070_1: yadi yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇakarūpaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-abh01a:2070_10: Vinibbhujitvā panassa nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-abh01a:2070_15: na ca paramatthato rūpe raso atthi.
atk-abh01a:2070_17: Evaṃ kāyāyatanampi paramatthato neva sabbattha atthi,
atk-abh01a:2076_8: Keci panettha ‘tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anuggayhabhāvato’ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
atk-abh01a:2076_13: ayaṃ imassa guṇo’ti na labbhā vattuṃ.
atk-abh01a:2076_15: ‘yathā tesu tesu sambhāresu tassa tassa bhūtassa adhikatāya pathavīādīnaṃ sandhāraṇādīni kiccāni icchatha,
atk-abh01a:2076_16: evaṃ tejādiadhikesu sambhāresu rūpādīnaṃ adhikabhāvadassanato icchitabbametaṃ rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā’ti.
atk-abh01a:2076_19: yadi āpādhikassa āsavassa gandhato pathavīadhike kappāse gandho adhikataro siyā,
atk-abh01a:2076_20: tejādhikassa ca uṇhodakassa vaṇṇatopi sītūdakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha.
atk-abh01a:2076_23: yathā avisesepi ekakalāpe bhūtānaṃ rūparasādayo aññamaññaṃ visadisā honti,
atk-abh01a:2077_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ yaṃ aññamaññassa asādhāraṇaṃ?
atk-abh01a:2077_7: Evaṃ kammevisasato visesavantesu ca etesu cakkhusotāni asampattavisayaggāhakāni attano nissayaṃ anallīnanissaye eva visaye viññāṇahetuttā.
atk-abh01a:2077_9: nissayavasena ceva sayañca attano nissayaṃ allīneyeva visaye viññāṇahetuttā.
atk-abh01a:2078_1: Candamaṇḍalasūriyamaṇḍalānañhi dvācattālīsayojanasahassamatthake ṭhitānaṃ vaṇṇo cakkhupasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a:2078_2: So dūre ṭhatvā paññāyamānopi sampattoyeva nāma.
atk-abh01a:2078_5: rajakānañca vatthaṃ dhovantānaṃ dūratova kāyavikāro paññāyati.
atk-abh01a:2078_6: Saddo pana dhātuparamparāya āgantvā sotaṃ ghaṭṭetvā saṇikaṃ vavatthānaṃ gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2079_0: Tattha kiñcāpi āpāthagatattā ārammaṇaṃ sampattanti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2079_1: candamaṇḍalādivaṇṇo pana cakkhuṃ asampatto dūre ṭhitova paññāyati.
atk-abh01a:2079_4: paramparaghaṭṭanāya ca āgantvā sotaṃ ghaṭṭento asukadisāya nāmāti na paññāyeyya.
atk-abh01a:2080_1: Yathā hi ahi nāma bahi sittasammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne nābhiramati,
atk-abh01a:2080_4: evameva cakkhupetaṃ visamajjhāsayaṃ maṭṭhesu suvaṇṇabhittiādīsu nābhiramati,
atk-abh01a:2080_7: Tādisesu hi ṭhānesu cakkhumhi appahonte mukhampi vivaritvā oloketukāmā honti.
atk-abh01a:2081_0: Susumāropi bahi nikkhanto gahetabbaṃ na passati,
atk-abh01a:2081_2: Yadā pana byāmasatamattaṃ udakaṃ ogāhitvā bilaṃ pavisitvā nipanno hoti,
atk-abh01a:2081_3: tadā tassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti sukhaṃ supati,
atk-abh01a:2081_4: evameva sotaṃ tampe bilajjhāsayaṃ ākāsasannissitaṃ kaṇṇacchiddakūpakeyeva ajjhāsayaṃ karoti.
atk-abh01a:2081_7: Antoleṇasmiñhi sajjhāye kariyamāne na leṇacchadanaṃ bhinditvā saddo bahi nikkhamati,
atk-abh01a:2081_8: dvāravātapānacchiddehi pana nikkhamitvā dhātuparamparāyeva ghaṭṭento gantvā sotapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a:2081_9: Atha tasmiṃ kāle ‘asuko nāma sajjhāyatī’ti leṇapiṭṭhe nisinnā jānanti.
atk-abh01a:2082_4: dūre bherīādīsu vajjamānesu dūre saddoti jānanaṃ na bhaveyyā’ti?
atk-abh01a:2082_6: Sotapasādasmiñhi ghaṭṭite dūre saddo āsanne saddo,
atk-abh01a:2082_7: paratīre orimatīreti tathā tathā jānanākāro hoti.
atk-abh01a:2082_10: Yato yato chiddaṃ tato tato savanaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:2083_0: Pakkhīpi rukkhe vā bhūmiyaṃ vā na ramati.
atk-abh01a:2083_1: Yadā pana ekaṃ vā dve vā leḍḍupāte atikkamma ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhando hoti,
atk-abh01a:2083_4: Tathā hi gāvo navavuṭṭhe deve bhūmiyaṃ ghāyitvā ghāyitvā ākāsābhimukhā hutvā vātaṃ ākaḍḍhanti.
atk-abh01a:2083_5: Aṅgulīhi gandhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvāpi ca upasiṅghanakāle vātaṃ anākaḍḍhanto neva tassa gandhaṃ jānāti.
atk-abh01a:2084_0: Kukkuropi bahi vicaranto khemaṭṭhānaṃ na passati leḍḍupahārādīhi upadduto hoti.
atk-abh01a:2084_1: Antogāmaṃ pavisitvā uddhanaṭṭhāne chārikaṃ byūhitvā nipannassa pana phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:2084_3: Tathā hi tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvāpi pātova pattacīvaramādāya gāmo pavisitabbo hoti.
atk-abh01a:2084_4: Sukkhakhādanīyassa ca na sakkā kheḷena atemitassa rasaṃ jānituṃ.
atk-abh01a:2085_0: Siṅgālopi bahi caranto ratiṃ na vindati,
atk-abh01a:2085_1: āmakasusāne manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā nipannasseva panassa phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:2085_3: Tathā hi aññaṃ upādiṇṇakaṃ alabhamānā sattā attanova hatthatale sīsaṃ katvā nipajjanti.
atk-abh01a:2085_4: Ajjhattikabāhirā cassa pathavī ārammaṇaggahaṇe paccayo hoti.
atk-abh01a:2085_7: na sakkā anisīdantena vā anippīḷentena vā thaddhamudubhāvo jānitunti.
atk-abh01a:2085_8: Ajjhattikabāhirāpathavī etassa kāyapasādassa phoṭṭhabbajānane paccayo hoti.
atk-abh01a:2085_10: Aññeyeva hi cakkhupasādassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānagocarajjhāsayanissayā aññe sotapasādādīnanti asammissāneva cakkhāyatanādīni.
atk-abh01a:2086_0: Apica nesaṃ asammissatāya ayaṃ upamāpi veditabbā –
atk-abh01a:2086_1: yathā hi pañcavaṇṇānaṃ dhajānaṃ ussāpitānaṃ kiñcāpi chāyā ekābaddhā viya hoti,
atk-abh01a:2086_2: tassa tassa pana aññamaññaṃ asammissāva yathā ca pañcavaṇṇena kappāsena vaṭṭiṃ katvā dīpe jālite kiñcāpi jālā ekābaddhā viya hoti,
atk-abh01a:2086_3: tassa tassa pana aṃsuno pāṭiyekkā pāṭiyekkā jālā asammissā eva,
atk-abh01a:2086_4: evameva kiñcāpi imāni pañcāyatanāni ekasmiṃ attabhāve samosaṭāni aññamaññaṃ pana asammissāneva.
atk-abh01a:2086_7: Imasmiñhi sarīre heṭṭhimakāyo majjhimakāyo uparimakāyoti tayo koṭṭhāsā.
atk-abh01a:2086_8: Tattha nābhito paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhimakāyo nāma.
atk-abh01a:2086_14: Nābhito uddhaṃ yāva galavāṭakā majjhimakāyo nāma.
atk-abh01a:2087_2: jīvitindriyaṃ cakkhupasādoti idaṃ ekantato avinibhuttānaṃ dasannaṃ nipphannarūpānaṃ vasena cakkhudasakaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2087_4: Tesu heṭṭhimakāye rūpaṃ majjhimakāyauparimakāyarūpehi saddhiṃ asammissaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2087_6: Yathā hi sāyanhasamaye pabbatacchāyā ca rukkhacchāyā ca kiñcāpi ekābaddhā viya honti aññamaññaṃ pana
atk-abh01a:2087_7: asammissāva evaṃ imesupi kāyesu catucattālīsa catupaññāsa caturāsīti rūpāni ca kiñcāpi ekābaddhāni viya honti,
atk-abh01a:2088_16: parato panassa jātarūpaggahaṇena gahitattā idha sāmaṃ hari nāma.
atk-abh01a:2088_17: Imāni satta vatthuṃ anāmasitvā sabhāveneva dassitāni.
atk-abh01a:2089_4: So ca nesaṃ vohāro upanidhāyasiddho ceva sannivesasiddho ca.
atk-abh01a:2089_7: Tattha rassaṃ upanidhāya tato uccataraṃ dīghaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2090_0: Tattha yasmā dīghādīni phusitvā sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-abh01a:2090_4: Taṃ taṃ nissāya pana tathā tathā ṭhitaṃ dīghaṃ rassanti tena tena vohārena rūpāyatanamevettha bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2090_11: Candamaṇḍalassa vaṇṇanibhātiādīhi tesaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvaṇṇā dassitā.
atk-abh01a:2091_0: Tattha candamaṇḍalādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ evaṃ viseso veditabbo –
atk-abh01a:2091_1: maṇimayaṃ rajatapaṭicchannaṃ ekūnapaññāsayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ candassa devaputtassa vimānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2091_2: Sovaṇṇamayaṃ phalikapaṭicchannaṃ samapaṇṇāsayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sūriyassa devaputtassa vimānaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2091_3: Sattaratanamayāni sattaṭṭhadasadvādasayojanāyāmavitthārāni tesaṃ tesaṃ devaputtānaṃ vimānāni tārakarūpāni nāma.
atk-abh01a:2092_3: Candassa heṭṭhimantato sūriyassa uparimanto yojanasataṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:2092_8: Kālena candimasūriyānaṃ purato honti kālena pacchā.
atk-abh01a:2093_10: ye ‘vohāraṃ gacchantī’ti vuttaṃ taṃ sabbampi idha gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2094_0: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti iminā pāḷiāgataṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ taṭṭikapilotikakaṇṇikavaṇṇādibhedaṃ rūpaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2095_0: Evametaṃ nīlādinā bhedena bhinnampi rūpaṃ sabbaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnameva.
atk-abh01a:2095_6: Yattha pana viseso atthi tattha vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a:2095_8: Kevalañhi tattha cakkhupubbaṅgamo niddeso idha rūpapubbaṅgamo.
atk-abh01a:2095_12: Yathā hi catūhi catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍetvā cakkhuṃ vavatthāpetuṃ terasa vārā vuttā,
atk-abh01a:2096_10: Udakassa sandamānassa vā paṭihatassa vā saddo udakasaddo.
atk-abh01a:2096_14: Evaṃ santepi vaṃsaphālanapilotikaphālanādīsu pavatto pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasaddo yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:2097_0: Evamayaṃ bherīsaddādinā bhedena bhinnopi saddo lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva.
atk-abh01a:2097_1: Sabbopi hesa sotapaṭihananalakkhaṇo saddo sotaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso,
atk-abh01a:2097_4: Idhāpi hi catūhi catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā.
atk-abh01a:2097_5: Tesaṃ attho sakkā vuttanayeneva jānitunti na vitthārito.
atk-abh01a:2098_1: Gandhāyatananiddese mūlagandhoti yaṃ kiñci mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbatto gandho.
atk-abh01a:2098_8: Evaṃ santepi kaṇṇakagandhapilotikagandhādayo pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā sabbepi gandhā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2099_0: Evamayaṃ mūlagandhādinā bhedena bhinnopi gandho lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva.
atk-abh01a:2099_5: Idhāpi hi tatheva dvipaññāsanayapaṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā.
atk-abh01a:2100_1: Rasāyatananiddese mūlarasoti yaṃkiñci mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbattaraso.
atk-abh01a:2100_5: Madhu pana kasāvayuttaṃ ciranikkhittaṃ kasāvaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:2100_7: Sappi pana ciranikkhittaṃ vaṇṇagandhe jahantampi rasaṃ na jahatīti tadeva ekantamadhuraṃ.
atk-abh01a:2100_15: Taṃtaṃvatthuto panettha rasova ambilādīhi nāmehi vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:2100_19: Evaṃ santepi leḍḍurasabhittirasapilotikarasādayo pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā sabbepi rasā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2101_0: Evamayaṃ mūlarasādinābhedena bhinnopi raso lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva.
atk-abh01a:2101_5: Idhāpi hi tatheva dvipaññāsanayapaṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā.
atk-abh01a:2102_2: Yena kāraṇena itthiyā itthiliṅgādīni hontīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh01a:2102_4: Itthiyā hi hatthapādagīvāurādīnaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ na purisassa viya hoti.
atk-abh01a:2102_19: tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā avisadā bhuñjanti.
atk-abh01a:2102_20: Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā mātugāmo viya gacchati tiṭṭhati nipajjati nisīdati khādati bhuñjatīti vadanti.
atk-abh01a:2103_3: Itthiliṅgādīni pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitāni.
atk-abh01a:2103_6: bījapaccayā rukkho vaḍḍhitvā sākhāviṭapasampanno hutvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh01a:2103_7: evameva itthibhāvasaṅkhāte itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādīni honti.
atk-abh01a:2103_9: bījaṃ paṭicca vaḍḍhitvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā ṭhitarukkho viya itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthiliṅgādīni pavatte samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a:2104_0: Idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ itthindriyanti idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2104_1: yathā cakkhundriyādīni purisassāpi honti, na evaṃ;
atk-abh01a:2105_3: Purisassa hi hatthapādagīvāurādīnaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ na itthiyā viya hoti.
atk-abh01a:2105_4: Purisānañhi uparimakāyo visado hoti heṭṭhimakāyo avisado,
atk-abh01a:2105_13: Itthimpi gamanādīni visadāni kurumānaṃ disvā ‘puriso viya gacchatī’tiādīni vadanti.
atk-abh01a:2108_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:2108_1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-abh01a:2110_0: Ubhatobyañjanakassa pana kiṃ ekaṃ indriyaṃ udāhu dveti? Ekaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2110_8: Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh01a:2111_0: Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-abh01a:2111_3: Tasmā veditabbametaṃ na tassa taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2112_1: Jīvitindriyaniddese yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ heṭṭhā arūpajīvitindriye vuttameva.
atk-abh01a:2112_2: Kevalañhi tattha yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānanti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2112_3: idha rūpajīvitindriyattā yo tesaṃ rūpīnaṃ dhammānanti ayameva viseso.
atk-abh01a:2113_1: Kāyaviññattiniddese kāyaviññattīti ettha tāva kāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ tiracchānehipi purisānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2113_2: purisehi vā tiracchānānampi kāyagahaṇānusārena gahitāya etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti ‘viññatti’.
atk-abh01a:2113_4: “Kāyena saṃvaro sādhū”tiādīsu āgato copanasaṅkhāto kāyova viññatti ‘kāyaviññatti’.
atk-abh01a:2114_0: Kusalacittassa vātiādīsu aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarehi abhiññācittena cāti navahi kusalacittehi kusalacittassa vā,
atk-abh01a:2114_2: aṭṭhahi mahākiriyehi dvīhi ahetukakiriyehi abhiññāppattena ekena rūpāvacarakiriyenāti ekādasahi kiriyacittehi abyākatacittassa vā.
atk-abh01a:2114_3: Ito aññāni hi cittāni viññattiṃ na janenti.
atk-abh01a:2114_4: Sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ pana ettakeheva cittehi viññatti hotīti etesaṃ kusalādīnaṃ vasena tīhi padehi ‘hetuto’ dassitā.
atk-abh01a:2115_0: Idāni chahi padehi ‘phalato’ dassetuṃ abhikkamantassa vātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2115_1: Abhikkamādayo hi viññattivasena pavattattā viññattiphalaṃ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2116_0: Idāni chahi padehi ‘sabhāvato’ dassetuṃ kāyassa thambhanāti ādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2116_9: Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ heṭṭhā dvārakathāyaṃ vuttameva.
atk-abh01a:2117_1: Vacīviññattītipadassa pana niddesapadānañca attho tattha na vutto,
atk-abh01a:2117_3: vācāya attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ tiracchānehipi purisānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2117_5: vacīgahaṇānusārena gahitāya etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti viññatti.
atk-abh01a:2117_7: “Sādhu vācāya saṃvaro”tiādīsu āgatā copanasaṅkhātā vacī eva viññatti ‘vacīviññatti’.
atk-abh01a:2117_8: Vacīghosena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā sayañca tathāviññeyyattā vācāya viññattītipi ‘vacīviññatti’.
atk-abh01a:2117_12: Vākyañca taṃ patho ca atthaṃ ñātukāmānaṃ ñāpetukāmānañcātipi ‘byappatho’.
atk-abh01a:2117_20: pabhedagatā vācā evā’ti ñāpanatthaṃ vācā vacībhedoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2117_22: Idāni tāya vācāya saddhiṃ yojetvā heṭṭhā vuttatthānaṃ viññattiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena tīhākārehi sabhāvato
atk-abh01a:2117_23: taṃ dassetuṃ yā tāya vācāya viññattītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2118_0: Idāni viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittesu asammohatthaṃ dvattiṃsa chabbīsa ekūnavīsati soḷasa pacchimānīti idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-abh01a:2118_8: Soḷasa imesu tīsu ekampi na karonti.
atk-abh01a:2119_0: Tattha dvattiṃsāti heṭṭhā vuttāneva kāmāvacarato aṭṭha kusalāni,
atk-abh01a:2119_19: Imāni soḷasa rūpiriyāpathaviññattīsu ekampi na karonti.
atk-abh01a:2119_20: Aññānipi bahūni arūpe uppannāni anokāsagatattā rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh01a:2120_3: kasituṃ vā chindituṃ vā bhindituṃ vā na sakkāti ākāso.
atk-abh01a:2120_12: Asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti etehi asamphuṭṭhaṃ nijjaṭākāsaṃva kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2120_17: yāya paricchinnesu rūpesu ‘idamito uddhaṃ adho tiriya’nti ca hoti.
atk-abh01a:2121_1: Ito pare rūpassalahutādīnaṃ niddesā cittassalahutādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2122_0: Etā pana tisso na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti.
atk-abh01a:2122_1: Evaṃ santepi yo arogino viya rūpānaṃ lahubhāvo,
atk-abh01a:2122_5: Yo suparimadditacammasseva rūpānaṃ mudubhāvo sabbakiriyāvisesesu sarasavattanabhāvo vasavattanabhāvamaddavappakāro
atk-abh01a:2122_8: Yo pana sudhantasuvaṇṇasseva rūpānaṃ kammaññabhāvo sarīrakiriyānukūlabhāvappakāro sarīrakiriyānaṃ ananukūlakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
atk-abh01a:2123_0: Etā pana tissopi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:2123_2: Tathā hi yogino ‘ajja amhehi bhojanasappāyaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2123_3: kāyo no lahu mudu kammañño’ti vadanti.
atk-abh01a:2123_6: kāyo no lahu mudu kammañño’ti vadantīti.
atk-abh01a:2124_3: So rūpassa upacayoti yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo punappunaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2124_6: Yo rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santatīti yā evaṃ upacitānaṃ rūpānaṃ vaḍḍhi,
atk-abh01a:2124_7: tato uttaritaraṃ pavattikāle sā rūpassa santati nāma hoti;
atk-abh01a:2124_9: Naditīre khatakūpasmiñhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo, nibbatti;
atk-abh01a:2125_5: Catusantatirūpānaṃ ācayo upacayo nibbatti vaḍḍhi kathitā.
atk-abh01a:2125_7: Ākāranānattena pana veneyyavasena ca upacayo santatīti uddesadesanaṃ katvā yasmā ettha atthato nānattaṃ natthi,
atk-abh01a:2125_8: tasmā niddese “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo so rūpassa upacayo,
atk-abh01a:2125_9: yo rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2126_0: Yasmā ca ubhayampetaṃ jātirūpasseva adhivacanaṃ tasmā ettha ācayalakkhaṇo rūpassa upacayo,
atk-abh01a:2127_12: Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tace valibhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā.
atk-abh01a:2127_14: Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-abh01a:2127_15: Yatheva hi udakassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-abh01a:2127_16: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-abh01a:2127_17: evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-abh01a:2128_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaññitāya pakatiyā dīpitā.
atk-abh01a:2128_2: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati,
atk-abh01a:2128_5: sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni āluḷitāni avisadāni,
atk-abh01a:2128_6: oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti,
atk-abh01a:2129_0: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-abh01a:2129_1: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍabhāvādidassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma.
atk-abh01a:2129_2: Arūpadhammesu pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma.
atk-abh01a:2129_3: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi duvidhā hoti.
atk-abh01a:2129_7: antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ duviññeyyattā jarā avīcijarā nāma;
atk-abh01a:2129_9: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2131_4: yasmā taṃ patvā rūpaṃ khīyati, veti,
atk-abh01a:2131_18: Tasmā pañcannampi khandhānaṃ aniccatāya idameva lakkhaṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2132_2: Ime tayo dhammā imesaṃ sattānaṃ ukkhittāsikapaccāmittasadisā.
atk-abh01a:2132_3: Yathā hi purisassa tayo paccāmittā otāraṃ gavesamānā vicareyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a:2132_6: Dutiyo ‘aṭavigatakāle pothetvā pathaviyaṃ pātanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro’ti.
atk-abh01a:2132_7: Tatiyo ‘pathavigatakālato paṭṭhāya asinā sīsacchedanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro’ti.
atk-abh01a:2133_5: Evaṃ vatthuvasena nāmaṃ uddharitvā puna vatthuvasenevetaṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ odano kummāsotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2133_6: Odanādīni hi phāṇitapariyantāni dvādasa idhādhippetassa āhārassa vatthūni.
atk-abh01a:2134_0: Idāni tāni mūlaphalādīni kattabbato dassetuṃ yamhi yamhi janapadetiādimāha.
atk-abh01a:2134_4: Idāni taṃ kiccavasena dassetuṃ kucchivitthambhananti āha.
atk-abh01a:2134_5: Tañhi mūlaphalādi odanakummāsādi vā ajjhohaṭaṃ kucchiṃ vitthambheti.
atk-abh01a:2134_7: Yāya ojāya sattā yāpentīti heṭṭhā sabbapadehi savatthukaṃ āhāraṃ dassetvā idāni nibbaṭṭitaojameva dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2135_3: Vatthuhi parissayaṃ harati pāletuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:2135_4: ojā pāleti parissayaṃ harituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:2135_5: Dvepi ekato hutvā pāletumpi sakkonti parissayampi harituṃ.
atk-abh01a:2136_0: Yathā hi chāyārakkhaso chāyaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ gahetvā devasaṅkhalikāya bandhitvā attano bhavane modanto chātakāle āgantvā sīse ḍaṃsati.
atk-abh01a:2136_2: Taṃ viravaṃ sutvā ‘dukkhappatto ettha atthī’ti tato tato manussā āgacchanti.
atk-abh01a:2136_3: So āgatāgate gahetvā khāditvā bhavane modati.
atk-abh01a:2136_8: otaritvā sīse ḍaṃsanaṃ viya kammajatejassa vatthuto muttassa udarapaṭalaggahaṇaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2136_10: tāya saññāya āgatāgate gahetvā khāditvā bhavane modanakālo viya kammajatejena udarapaṭalaṃ muñcitvā vatthusmiṃ gahite ekaggacittatā.
atk-abh01a:2137_0: Tattha oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā mandā hoti.
atk-abh01a:2137_2: Kudrūsakabhattādīni hi bhuñjitvā muhutteneva chāto hoti.
atk-abh01a:2137_3: Sappiādīni pivitvā ṭhitassa divasampi bhattaṃ na ruccati.
atk-abh01a:2137_5: Kumbhīlānañhi āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-abh01a:2137_9: Morānaṃ pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-abh01a:2137_10: Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti.
atk-abh01a:2137_11: Tāni ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamattāneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni honti.
atk-abh01a:2140_4: Āpo ca taṃ nissattasuññatasabhāvaṭṭhena dhātu cāti āpodhātu.
atk-abh01a:2140_5: Idāni yasmā tīṇi rūpāni phusitvā jānitabbāni tasmā tāni bhājetvā dassetuṃ katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ?
atk-abh01a:2141_9: Ettha ca ‘kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ garukaṃ lahuka’nti padehi pathavīdhātu eva bhājitā.
atk-abh01a:2141_10: “Yadāyaṃ kāyo āyusahagato ca hoti usmāsahagato ca viññāṇasahagato ca tadā lahutaro ca hoti mudutaro ca
atk-abh01a:2141_11: kammaññataro cā”ti suttepi lahumudubhūtaṃ pathavīdhātumeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2142_0: ‘Sukhasamphassaṃ dukkhasamphassa’nti padadvayena pana tīṇipi mahābhūtāni bhājitāni.
atk-abh01a:2142_3: Tattha sukhasamphassā pathavīdhātu mudutaluṇahatthe dahare pāde sambāhante assādetvā assādetvā ‘sambāha tāta,
atk-abh01a:2142_5: Sukhasamphassā tejodhātu sītasamaye aṅgārakapallaṃ āharitvā gattaṃ sedente assādetvā assādetvā ‘sedehi tāta,
atk-abh01a:2142_7: Sukhasamphassā vāyodhātu uṇhasamaye vattasampanne dahare bījanena bījante assādetvā assādetvā ‘bīja tāta,
atk-abh01a:2142_9: Thaddhahatthe pana dahare pāde sambāhante aṭṭhīnaṃ bhijjanakālo viya hoti.
atk-abh01a:2142_11: Uṇhasamaye aṅgārakapalle ābhate ‘apanehi na’nti vattabbaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:2143_0: Yaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ anidassanaṃ sappaṭighantiādinā nayena vuttā pana catūhi catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍitā terasa
atk-abh01a:2144_0: Kiṃ panetāni tīṇi mahābhūtāni ekappahāreneva āpāthaṃ āgacchanti udāhu noti?
atk-abh01a:2144_2: Evaṃ āgatāni kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭenti na ghaṭṭentīti?
atk-abh01a:2144_4: Ekappahāreneva tāni ārammaṇaṃ katvā kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati nuppajjatīti?
atk-abh01a:2144_6: Ābhujitavasena vā hi ussadavasena vā ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh01a:2145_1: pattasmiñhi odanena pūretvā ābhate ekaṃ sitthaṃ gahetvā thaddhaṃ vā mudukaṃ vāti vīmaṃsanto kiñcāpi tattha tejopi atthi vāyopi atthi,
atk-abh01a:2145_3: Uṇhodake hatthaṃ otāretvā vīmaṃsanto kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi vāyopi atthi,
atk-abh01a:2145_5: Uṇhasamaye vātapānaṃ vivaritvā vātena sarīraṃ paharāpento ṭhito mandamande vāte paharante kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi tejopi atthi,
atk-abh01a:2146_0: Yo pana upakkhalati vā sīsena vā rukkhaṃ paharati bhuñjanto vā sakkharaṃ ḍaṃsati,
atk-abh01a:2146_1: so kiñcāpi tattha tejopi atthi vāyopi atthi,
atk-abh01a:2146_3: Aggiṃ akkamantopi kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi vāyopi atthi,
atk-abh01a:2146_6: Kiñcāpi tattha pathavīpi atthi tejopi atthi,
atk-abh01a:2147_0: Yaṃkiñci dhātuṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontassa kāyaviññāṇampi ekappahārena nuppajjati.
atk-abh01a:2147_2: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ pana ṭhāne kāyapasādo ussanno hoti,
atk-abh01a:2147_4: Yattha yatthāpi paṭighaṭṭananighaṃso balavā hoti tattha tattha paṭhamaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh01a:2147_5: Kukkuṭapattena vaṇe dhoviyamāne aṃsuaṃsu kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti.
atk-abh01a:2147_6: Yattha yattha pana pasādo ussanno hoti,
atk-abh01a:2148_0: Kathaṃ pana cittassa ārammaṇato saṅkanti hotīti?
atk-abh01a:2148_3: Vihārapūjādīsu hi ‘tāni tāni cetiyāni ceva paṭimāyo ca vandissāmi,
atk-abh01a:2148_4: potthakammacittakammāni ca olokessāmī’ti ajjhāsayena gato ekaṃ vanditvā vā passitvā vā itarassa vandanatthāya
atk-abh01a:2148_5: vā dassanatthāya vā manaṃ katvā vanditumpi passitumpi gacchatiyeva,
atk-abh01a:2149_0: Kelāsakūṭapaṭibhāgaṃ pana mahācetiyaṃ olokento ṭhitopi aparabhāge sabbatūriyesu paggahitesu rūpārammaṇaṃ vissajjetvā saddārammaṇaṃ saṅkamati.
atk-abh01a:2149_1: Manuññagandhesu pupphesu vā gandhesu vā ābhatesu saddārammaṇaṃ vissajjetvā gandhārammaṇaṃ saṅkamati.
atk-abh01a:2150_6: Ayopiṇḍiādīni hi āpodhātu ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti.
atk-abh01a:2150_7: Tāya ābaddhattā tāni baddhāni nāma honti.
atk-abh01a:2150_9: Sabbāni hetāni āpodhātu eva ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti.
atk-abh01a:2151_0: Kiṃ pana pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti na hotīti hoti phusitvā hoti udāhu aphusitvā?
atk-abh01a:2151_1: Āpodhātu vā sesā ābandhamānā phusitvā ābandhati udāhu aphusitvāti?
atk-abh01a:2151_2: Pathavīdhātu tāva āpodhātuyā aphusitvāva patiṭṭhā hoti,
atk-abh01a:2151_4: Āpodhātu pana pathavīdhātumpi tejovāyodhātuyopi aphusitvāva ābandhati.
atk-abh01a:2151_5: Yadi phusitvā ābandheyya phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ nāma bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a:2152_2: Sā pana na uṇhā hutvā jhāyati.
atk-abh01a:2152_3: Yadi uṇhā hutvā jhāyeyya uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a:2152_5: Sāpi tapamānā na uṇhā hutvā tapati.
atk-abh01a:2152_6: Yadi uṇhā hutvā tapeyya uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a:2152_8: Sāpi tapamānā na uṇhā hutvā tapati.
atk-abh01a:2152_9: Yadi uṇhā hutvā tapeyya uṇhattalakkhaṇā nāma bhaveyya.
atk-abh01a:2152_11: tathā tejodhātuṃ āpodhātuṃ pana aphusitvāva vitthambheti.
atk-abh01a:2153_0: Ucchurasaṃ pacitvā phāṇitapiṇḍe kariyamāne āpodhātu thaddhā hoti na hotīti? Na hoti.
atk-abh01a:2154_4: na tveva buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa siyā aññathatta”nti.
atk-abh01a:2155_1: kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu parivattitvā paggharaṇalakkhaṇā āpodhātu nāma bhaveyya,
atk-abh01a:2156_1: Ito paresu upādiṇṇarūpādiniddesesu upādiṇṇapadādīnaṃ attho mātikākathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:2157_1: Yasmā pana rūpāyatanādīni upādiṇṇānipi atthi anupādiṇṇānipi,
atk-abh01a:2157_2: tasmā tāni yaṃ vā panāti saṅkhepato dassetvā puna kammassa katattā rūpāyatanantiādinā nayena vitthāritāni.
atk-abh01a:2158_0: Kasmā pana ‘kammassa katattā’ti ca ‘na kammassa katattā’ti ca ubhinnampi niddese ‘jaratā ca aniccatā ca’ na gahitā,
atk-abh01a:2158_2: Na kammassa katattāti ettha tāva kammato aññapaccayasamuṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2158_4: Imāni ca dve rūpāni neva kammato na aññasmā rūpajanakapaccayā uppajjanti,
atk-abh01a:2158_6: Sā ca nesaṃ anuppatti parato āvi bhavissati.
atk-abh01a:2158_7: Anupādiṇṇantiādīsu pana kevalaṃ anupādiṇṇādiggahaṇena kammādisamuṭṭhānatā paṭikkhittā,
atk-abh01a:2159_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaniddese kāyaviññatti vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekantacittasamuṭṭhānāni bhūtāni upādāya paññāyati,
atk-abh01a:2159_3: Paramatthato pana tassa nissayabhūtāni bhūtāneva cittasamuṭṭhānāni,
atk-abh01a:2159_5: Yathā aniccassa rūpassa jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh01a:2160_2: Yāva cittaṃ tāva paññāyanato idameva dvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2160_3: Na panetaṃ cittena saha bhūtāni viya,
atk-abh01a:2161_2: Yāva cittaṃ tāva paññāyanato eva hetaṃ dvayaṃ cittānuparivattīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2163_1: Dūreti ghaṭṭanavasena aggahetabbattā dubbiññeyyabhāvena samīpe ṭhitampi dūre.
atk-abh01a:2163_2: Itaraṃ pana ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbattā suviññeyyabhāvena dūre ṭhitampi santike.
atk-abh01a:2165_1: Catubbidhasaṅgahāvasāne diṭṭhādīnaṃ pacchimapadassa bhedābhāvena ādito paṭṭhāya pucchaṃ akatvāva rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sutantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2165_2: Tattha rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhunā oloketvā dakkhituṃ sakkāti ‘diṭṭhaṃ’ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2165_3: Saddāyatanaṃ sotena sutvā jānituṃ sakkāti ‘sutaṃ’ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2165_4: Gandhāyatanādittayaṃ ghānajivhākāyehi patvā gahetabbato munitvā jānitabbaṭṭhena mutaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2165_6: Sabbameva pana rūpaṃ manoviññāṇena jānitabbanti manasā viññātaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2167_9: Sarīraṭṭhakañhi upādiṇṇaṃ vā hotu anupādiṇṇaṃ vā,
atk-abh01a:2169_3: Thambhitattanti uppalanāḷatacādīnaṃ viya vātapuṇṇānaṃ thambhitabhāvo rūpassa.
atk-abh01a:2171_1: Chabbidhādisaṅgahānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ osānapadassa bhedābhāvato ādito paṭṭhāya apucchitvāva niddeso kato.
atk-abh01a:2171_4: Tividhāya manodhātuyā jānituṃ sakkāti manodhātuviññeyyaṃ sabbaṃ rūpanti ettha yasmā ekaṃ rūpampi manoviññāṇadhātuyā ajānitabbaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a:2171_6: Sammāsambuddhena hi abhidhammaṃ patvā nayaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne nayo akato nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a:2171_7: Idañca ekarūpassāpi manoviññāṇadhātuyā ajānitabbassa abhāvena nayaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma,
atk-abh01a:2172_3: Idhāpi phoṭṭhabbārammaṇassa sukhadukkhassa sabbhāvato ayaṃ nayo dinno.
atk-abh01a:2174_1: Navake pana indriyarūpassa nāma atthitāya nayo dinno.
atk-abh01a:2174_4: Tesaṃ niddesavārā heṭṭhā vuttanayena vitthārato veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2176_0: Imesu pana rūpesu asammohatthaṃ samodhānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ parinipphannañca saṅkhatanti idaṃ ‘pakiṇṇakaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2177_0: Tattha ‘samodhāna’nti sabbameva hidaṃ rūpaṃ samodhānato cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
atk-abh01a:2177_7: natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādīni vatvā middharūpaṃ nāma natthīti paṭisedhetabbā.
atk-abh01a:2177_12: Tepi tesaṃ visuṃ abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
atk-abh01a:2177_20: Na añño tattha rogo nāma atthīti samodhānato chabbīsatimeva rūpāni.
atk-abh01a:2179_1: jīvitindriyanti imāni aṭṭha ekantaṃ kammatova samuṭṭhahanti.
atk-abh01a:2179_2: Kāyaviññattivacīviññattidvayaṃ ekantena cittato samuṭṭhātīti dasa ‘ekasamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2179_3: Saddo ututo ca cittato ca samuṭṭhātīti eko ‘dvisamuṭṭhāno’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2179_6: Lahutādittayaṃ pana utucittāhārehi samuṭṭhātīti tīṇi ‘tisamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2179_7: Avasesāni nava rūpāni tehi kammena cāti catūhi samuṭṭhahantīti nava ‘catusamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2179_8: Jaratā aniccatā pana etesu ekatopi na samuṭṭhahantīti dve ‘na kenaci samuṭṭhahanti’ nāma. Kasmā?
atk-abh01a:2179_12: Uppannañhi rūpaṃ jīrati bhijjatīti avassaṃ panetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2179_13: Na hi uppannaṃ rūpaṃ arūpaṃ vā akkhayaṃ nāma dissati.
atk-abh01a:2179_14: Yāva pana na bhijjati tāvassa paripākoti siddhametaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2179_15: ‘Jātassa pākabhedattā’ti yadi ca tāni jāyeyyuṃ tesampi pākabhedā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-abh01a:2179_17: bhedo vā bhijjatīti jātassa pākabhedattā netaṃ dvayaṃ jāyati.
atk-abh01a:2180_1: yathā ‘kammassa katattā’ti ādiniddesesu ‘rūpassa upacayo rūpassa santatī’ti vacanena ‘jāti’ jāyatīti sampaṭicchitaṃ hoti,
atk-abh01a:2180_4: Ye pana dhammā kammādīhi nibbattanti tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvato jātiyā tappaccayabhāvavohāro anumato.
atk-abh01a:2181_1: ‘yatheva jāti yesaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca labhati,
atk-abh01a:2181_2: tathā pākabhedāpi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pākabhedā tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca labhantu.
atk-abh01a:2181_3: Evaṃ idampi dvayaṃ kammādisamuṭṭhānamevāti vattabbaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
atk-abh01a:2181_8: Tehi abhinibbattitadhammakkhaṇasmiñca jāti paññāyamānā tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca labhati,
atk-abh01a:2181_11: tasmiṃ khaṇe abhāvatoti nevetaṃ jāyatī’ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2181_14: aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti āgatattā idampi dvayaṃ jāyatīti ce – ‘na,
atk-abh01a:2181_16: Tattha hi paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇattā pariyāyena taṃ paṭiccasamuppanna’nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2182_2: nibbānaṃ viya vā nicca’nti ce – na,
atk-abh01a:2182_8: Etampi ca abhinivesaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ eva idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a:2182_12: Evamādīhi nayehi tāni dve rūpāni na kehici samuṭṭhahantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2184_0: Tattha cakkhupasādādi aṭṭhavidhaṃ rūpaṃ saddhiṃ hadayavatthunā ‘kammajaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2184_1: Kesamassu hatthidantā assavālā camaravālāti evamādi ‘kammapaccayaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2185_1: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnampi rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa ca upādinnassa ca.
atk-abh01a:2185_3: kammajassa anupālako hutvāti idaṃ āhārānupālitaṃ kammajarūpaṃ ‘āhārapaccayaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2185_4: Visabhāgāhāraṃ sevitvā ātape gacchantassa tilakakāḷakuṭṭhādīni uppajjanti,
atk-abh01a:2187_1: “Pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti idaṃ ‘cittapaccayaṃ’ nāma.
atk-abh01a:2193_1: Ettāvatā kusalattiko sabbesaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ padabhājananayena vitthārito hoti.
atk-abh01a:2193_2: Yasmā pana yvāyaṃ kusalattikassa vibhajananayo vutto,
atk-abh01a:2193_6: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
atk-abh01a:2193_7: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākhandhaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2193_8: ime dhammā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā’tiādinā anukkamena sabbatikadukesu sakkā paṇḍitehi vibhājananayaṃ sallakkhetuṃ –
atk-abh01a:2193_10: aññena nātisaṅkhepanātivitthāranayena sabbatikadukadhammavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ katame dhammā kusalāti nikkhepakaṇḍaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2193_13: Idaṃ pana nikkhepakaṇḍaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍaṃ upādāya saṅkhepo,
atk-abh01a:2193_14: aṭṭhakathākaṇḍaṃ upādāya vitthāroti saṅkhittavitthāradhātukaṃ hoti. Tayidaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2194_0: Mūlato khandhato cāpi, dvārato cāpi bhūmito;
atk-abh01a:2195_0: Atthato dhammato cāpi, nāmato cāpi liṅgato;
atk-abh01a:2197_0: Idañhi tīṇi kusalamūlānītiādinā nayena mūlato nikkhipitvā desitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2197_6: Tattha tattha atthadhammanāmaliṅgānaṃ vasena desitattā atthādīhi nikkhipitvā desitaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2198_3: Evaṃ atthavasena dassetvā idāni nāmavasena dassetuṃ alobho adoso amohoti āha.
atk-abh01a:2198_4: Ettāvatā yasmā mūlena muttaṃ kusalaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh01a:2198_5: tasmā catubhūmakakusalaṃ tīhi mūlehi pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a:2198_10: Iti catubhūmakakusalaṃ puna taṃsampayuttakacatukkhandhavasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a:2198_12: Imināpi nayena tadeva catubhūmikakusalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammadvārānaṃ vasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a:2198_13: Evaṃ tāva kusalaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu pariyādiyitvā dassitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2199_2: Dvādasannañhi akusalacittānaṃ ekampi mūlena muttaṃ nāma natthīti mūlena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a:2199_3: Taṃsampayuttacatukkhandhato ca uddhaṃ akusalaṃ nāma natthīti tāneva dvādasa akusalacittāni catukkhandhavasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi.
atk-abh01a:2199_4: Dhammarājā kāyakammādivasena pana nesaṃ pavattisabbhāvato kammadvāravasena pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā.
atk-abh01a:2199_5: Yaṃ panettha tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesātiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2199_6: tattha ekasmiṃ citte puggale vā ṭhitanti ‘ekaṭṭhaṃ’.
atk-abh01a:2199_7: Tattha ekasmiṃ citte ṭhitaṃ sahajekaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh01a:2199_9: Tena lobhādinā aññena vā tattha tattha niddiṭṭhena saha ekasmiṃ ṭhitanti tadekaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2199_17: tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti hīnattike ‘katame dhammā akusalā?
atk-abh01a:2199_24: tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā’ti kilesagocchake ‘katame dhammā saraṇā?
atk-abh01a:2200_17: imesu pana ettakesu ṭhānesu ‘pahānekaṭṭhaṃ’ āgatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2201_2: Imasmiṃ tike tīṇi lakkhaṇāni tisso paññattiyo kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ ajaṭākāsaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanassa ārammaṇaṃ nirodhasamāpatti ca na labbhatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2202_1: Vedanāttikaniddese sukhabhūmiyanti ettha yathā tambabhūmi kaṇhabhūmīti tambakaṇhabhūmiyova vuccanti,
atk-abh01a:2202_3: Yathā ucchubhūmi sālibhūmīti ucchusālīnaṃ uppajjanaṭṭhānāni vuccanti,
atk-abh01a:2202_4: evaṃ sukhassa uppajjanaṭṭhānaṃ cittampi sukhabhūmi nāma.
atk-abh01a:2202_6: Yasmā pana sā kāmāvacare vā hoti,
atk-abh01a:2202_8: tasmāssā taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ kāmāvacaretiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2202_9: Sukhavedanaṃ ṭhapetvāti yā sā sukhabhūmiyaṃ sukhavedanā,
atk-abh01a:2203_3: Ayañhi tiko kusalattike ca alabbhamānehi imehi ca tīhi koṭṭhāsehi muttako nāma.
atk-abh01a:2203_4: Ito paresu pana tikadukesu pāḷito ca atthato ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ sabbaṃ padānukkamena mātikākathāyañceva kusalādīnaṃ niddese ca vuttameva.
atk-abh01a:2203_5: Yaṃ pana yattha visesamattaṃ tadeva vakkhāma.
atk-abh01a:2204_1: Tattha vipākattike tāva kiñcāpi arūpadhammā viya rūpadhammāpi kammasamuṭṭhānā atthi,
atk-abh01a:2204_2: anārammaṇattā pana te kammasarikkhakā na hontīti sārammaṇā arūpadhammāva kammasarikkhakattā vipākāti vuttā,
atk-abh01a:2204_4: Sālibījasmiñhi vapite aṅkurapattādīsu nikkhantesupi sāliphalanti na vuccati.
atk-abh01a:2204_5: Yadā pana sālisīsaṃ pakkaṃ hoti pariṇataṃ,
atk-abh01a:2204_6: tadā bījasarikkhako sāli eva sāliphalanti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:2204_7: Aṅkurapattādīni pana bījajātāni bījato nibbattānīti vuccanti,
atk-abh01a:2204_8: evameva rūpampi kammajanti vā upādiṇṇanti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh01a:2205_1: Upādiṇṇattike kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa khandhā ‘amhākaṃ mātulatthero amhākaṃ cūḷapitutthero’ti vadantānaṃ paresaṃ upādānassa paccayā honti,
atk-abh01a:2205_2: maggaphalanibbānāni pana aggahitāni aparāmaṭṭhāni anupādiṇṇāneva. Tāni hi,
atk-abh01a:2205_3: yathā divasaṃ santatto ayoguḷo makkhikānaṃ abhinisīdanassa paccayo na hoti,
atk-abh01a:2205_4: evameva tejussadattā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena gahaṇassa paccayā na honti.
atk-abh01a:2207_0: 1000. Vitakkattike vitakkasahajātena vicārena saddhiṃ kusalattike alabbhamānāva na labbhanti.
atk-abh01a:2208_1: Pītisahagatattike pītiādayo attanā sahajātadhammānaṃ pītisahagatādibhāvaṃ datvā sayaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakā jātā.
atk-abh01a:2208_2: Imasmiñhi tike dve domanassasahagatacittuppādā dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ upekkhāvedanā rūpaṃ nibbānanti –
atk-abh01a:2208_4: Ayañhi tiko kusalattike ca alabbhamānehi imehi ca pañcahi koṭṭhāsehi muttako nāma.
atk-abh01a:2209_3: sayaṃ vā satī tasmiṃ kāye diṭṭhīti ‘sakkāyadiṭṭhi’.
atk-abh01a:2209_6: sīlavatehi sujjhituṃ sakkāti gahitasamādānaṃ pana sīlabbataparāmāso nāma.
atk-abh01a:2210_2: Svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a:2212_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-abh01a:2213_3: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:2214_0: Assutavā puthujjanoti ettha pana ‘āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti’.
atk-abh01a:2217_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a:2217_9: Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā.
atk-abh01a:2217_10: Puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā”ti.
atk-abh01a:2217_11: Puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjanā.
atk-abh01a:2217_16: Evametehi ‘assutavā puthujjano’ti dvīhi padehi ye te –
atk-abh01a:2220_0: Dve puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:2221_3: sadevakena lokena ca araṇīyato buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vuccanti.
atk-abh01a:2221_4: Buddhā eva vā idha ariyā. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a:2222_0: Sappurisāti ettha pana paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca sappurisāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2222_1: Te hi lokuttaraguṇayogena sobhanā purisāti sappurisā.
atk-abh01a:2222_3: Buddhāpi hi ariyā ca sappurisā ca paccekabuddhā buddhasāvakāpi. Yathāha –
atk-abh01a:2227_0: ‘Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotī’ti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto.
atk-abh01a:2227_5: So cakkhunā adassāvī ñāṇena adassāvīti duvidho.
atk-abh01a:2227_7: Maṃsacakkhunā hi dibbacakkhunā vā ariyā diṭṭhāpi adiṭṭhāva honti,
atk-abh01a:2228_1: cittalapabbatavāsino kira khīṇāsavattherassa upaṭṭhāko vuḍḍhapabbajito ekadivasaṃ therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya
atk-abh01a:2228_2: caritvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito āgacchanto theraṃ pucchi –
atk-abh01a:2228_5: ‘idhekacco mahallako ariyānaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā saha carantopi neva ariye jānāti,
atk-abh01a:2228_10: “kiṃ te vakkali iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali,
atk-abh01a:2229_0: Ariyadhammassa akovidoti satipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akusalo. Ariyadhamme avinītoti, ettha pana
atk-abh01a:2232_1: Ettha ca duvidhepi vinaye ekameko vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati.
atk-abh01a:2232_2: Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho.
atk-abh01a:2232_3: Pahānavinayopi tadaṅgapahānaṃ vikkhambhanapahānaṃ samucchedapahānaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānaṃ nissaraṇapahānanti pañcavidho.
atk-abh01a:2233_0: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro.
atk-abh01a:2238_3: Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
atk-abh01a:2239_2: tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2240_4: “Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano attano santāne diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
atk-abh01a:2240_5: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena pahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2240_11: Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2240_14: Taṃtaṃpahānavato vā tassa tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ pahānavinayoti vuccati.
atk-abh01a:2241_7: Esa nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinītoti etthāpi.
atk-abh01a:2241_10: yeva te sappurisā teva te ariyā.

atk-abh01a:2241_12: yo eva so sappurisānaṃ dhammo so eva so ariyānaṃ dhammo.
atk-abh01a:2241_13: Yeva te ariyavinayā teva te sappurisavinayā,
atk-abh01a:2241_14: yeva te sappurisavinayā teva te ariyavinayā.

atk-abh01a:2242_0: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassati –
atk-abh01a:2242_2: yo ahaṃ taṃ rūpa’nti rūpañca attānañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-abh01a:2242_3: “Seyyathāpi nāma telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci so vaṇṇo,
atk-abh01a:2242_4: yo vaṇṇo sā accīti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati,” evameva idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti evaṃ rūpaṃ attāti diṭṭhipassanāya passati.
atk-abh01a:2243_0: Tattha ‘rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti suddharūpameva attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2243_5: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu ‘arūpaṃ attā’ti kathitaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2243_8: vedanāya vā attānanti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu ‘rūpārūpamissako attā’ kathito.
atk-abh01a:2243_9: Tattha ‘rūpaṃ attato samanupassati vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-abh01a:2243_10: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī’ti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā.
atk-abh01a:2243_12: Evamettha pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo honti.
atk-abh01a:2244_1: Satthari kaṅkhatīti satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā ubhayattha vā kaṅkhati.
atk-abh01a:2244_2: Sarīre kaṅkhamāno ‘dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati.
atk-abh01a:2244_3: Guṇe kaṅkhamāno ‘atītānāgatapaccuppannajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati.
atk-abh01a:2244_5: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito lokatārako buddho nāma atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhati.
atk-abh01a:2244_6: Ayañhissa attabhāve guṇe vā kaṅkhanato ubhayattha kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2244_7: Vicikicchatīti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ asakkonto kicchati kilamati.
atk-abh01a:2244_9: Na sampasīdatīti cittaṃ anāvilaṃ katvā pasīdituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh01a:2245_0: Dhamme kaṅkhatītiādīsu pana ‘kilese pajahantā cattāro ariyamaggā,
atk-abh01a:2245_2: maggaphalānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ amataṃ mahānibbānaṃ nāma atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi ‘ayaṃ
atk-abh01a:2245_3: dhammo niyyāniko nu kho aniyyāniko’ti kaṅkhantopi dhamme kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2245_4: ‘Cattāro maggaṭṭhakā cattāro phalaṭṭhakāti idaṃ saṅgharatanaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi,
atk-abh01a:2245_5: ‘ayaṃ saṅgho suppaṭipanno nu kho duppaṭipanno’ti kaṅkhantopi,
atk-abh01a:2245_6: ‘etasmiṃ saṅgharatane dinnassa vipākaphalaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi saṅghe kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2245_7: ‘Tisso pana sikkhā atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi,
atk-abh01a:2245_8: ‘tisso sikkhā sikkhitapaccayena ānisaṃso atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhantopi sikkhāya kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2246_3: na nu kho’ti kaṅkhanto pubbante kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2246_5: na nu kho’ti kaṅkhanto aparante kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2246_7: ‘Dvādasapadikaṃ paccayavaṭṭaṃ atthi nu kho natthī’ti kaṅkhanto idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhati nāma.
atk-abh01a:2246_13: Jātiādīsu taṃ taṃ paṭicca āgamma samuppannāti ‘paṭiccasamuppannā’.
atk-abh01a:2246_15: idappaccayatāya ca paṭiccasamuppannesu ca dhammesu kaṅkhatīti.
atk-abh01a:2247_7: Imissā ca pāḷiyā diṭṭhikileso vicikicchākilesoti dveyeva āgatā.
atk-abh01a:2247_8: Lobho doso moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime pana aṭṭha anāgatā.
atk-abh01a:2247_10: Ettha hi diṭṭhivicikicchāsu pahīyamānāsu apāyagamanīyo lobho doso moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ
atk-abh01a:2247_13: Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhisahagatāni vicikicchāsahagatañcāti pañca cittāni pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a:2247_14: Tattha dvīsu asaṅkhārikadiṭṭhicittesu pahīyantesu tehi sahajāto lobho moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a:2247_15: Sesadiṭṭhikileso ca vicikicchākileso ca pahānekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a:2247_16: Diṭṭhigatasampayuttasasaṅkhārikacittesupi pahīyantesu tehi sahajāto lobho moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ
atk-abh01a:2247_18: Sesadiṭṭhikileso ca vicikicchākileso ca pahānekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti.
atk-abh01a:2247_19: Evaṃ pahānekaṭṭhasmiṃyeva sahajekaṭṭhaṃ labbhatīti idaṃ sahajekaṭṭhaṃ āharitvā dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh01a:2248_0: Taṃsampayuttoti tehi tadekaṭṭhehi aṭṭhahi kilesehi sampayutto.
atk-abh01a:2248_1: Vinibbhogaṃ vā katvā tena lobhena tena dosenāti evaṃ ekekena sampayuttatā dīpetabbā.
atk-abh01a:2248_3: moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhe kilesagaṇo lobhasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a:2248_5: moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ kilesagaṇo dosasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a:2248_7: lobho doso māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ kilesagaṇo mohasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a:2248_9: tena sahuppanno lobho moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ayaṃ kilesagaṇo mānasampayutto nāma.
atk-abh01a:2248_10: Iminā upāyena tena thinena tena uddhaccena tena ahirikena tena anottappena sampayutto taṃsampayuttoti yojanā kātabbā.
atk-abh01a:2249_0: Ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbāti ettha dassanaṃ nāma sotāpattimaggo;
atk-abh01a:2249_9: Yattha katthaci rājānaṃ disvāpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā ‘ajjāpi rājānaṃ na passāmī’ti vadanto cettha jānapadapuriso nidassanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2250_4: Tehi pana aññe dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2250_5: ‘Tadekaṭṭhā’ti tehi pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi tīhi kilesehi sampayogatopi pahānatopi ekaṭṭhā pañca kilesā.
atk-abh01a:2250_6: Neva dassanena na bhāvanāyāti idaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ viya tehi maggehi appahātabbataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2250_7: Yaṃ pana “sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a:2250_8: nāmañca rūpañca etthete nirujjhantī”tiādinā nayena kusalādīnampi pahānaṃ anuññātaṃ,
atk-abh01a:2250_9: taṃ tesaṃ maggānaṃ abhāvitattā ye uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-abh01a:2250_10: te upanissayapaccayānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā pahīnāti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2251_1: Dassanenapahātabbahetukattike ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukāti niṭṭhapetvā,
atk-abh01a:2251_3: tadekaṭṭhabhāvena hetū ceva sahetuke ca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2251_4: Tattha ‘kiñcāpi dassanena pahātabbesu hetūsu lobhasahagato moho lobhena sahetuko hoti,
atk-abh01a:2251_6: lobhadosā ca mohenāti pahātabbahetukapadepete saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
atk-abh01a:2251_7: vicikicchāsahagato pana moho aññassa sampayuttahetuno abhāvena hetuyeva,
atk-abh01a:2251_8: na sahetukoti tassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ ime dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetū’ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2252_1: Dutiyapade uddhaccasahagatassa mohassa pahānaṃ dassetuṃ ime dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetūti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2252_2: So hi attanā sampayuttadhamme sahetuke katvā piṭṭhivaṭṭako jāto,
atk-abh01a:2252_3: vicikicchāsahagato viya aññassa sampayuttahetuno abhāvā pahātabbahetukapadaṃ na bhajati.
atk-abh01a:2252_4: Tatiyapade avasesā akusalāti puna akusalaggahaṇaṃ vicikicchuddhaccasahagatānaṃ mohānaṃ saṅgahatthaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a:2252_5: Te hi sampayuttahetuno abhāvā pahātabbahetukā nāma na honti.
atk-abh01a:2253_2: Sayañhi parittā vā hontu mahaggatā vā,
atk-abh01a:2253_6: Te pana parittāpi honti mahaggatāpi appamāṇāpi.
atk-abh01a:2254_3: Tesu hi ekasmimpi kamme kate taṃ paṭibāhitvā aññaṃ kammaṃ attano vipākassa okāsaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:2254_4: Sineruppamāṇepi hi suvaṇṇathūpe katvā cakkavāḷamattaṃ vā ratanamayapākāraṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā taṃ pūretvā
atk-abh01a:2254_5: nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa yāvajīvaṃ cattāro paccaye dadatopi taṃ kammaṃ etesaṃ kammānaṃ
atk-abh01a:2254_7: Yā ca micchādiṭṭhi niyatāti ahetukavādaakiriyavādanatthikavādesu aññatarā.
atk-abh01a:2254_8: Tañhi gahetvā ṭhitaṃ puggalaṃ buddhasatampi buddhasahassampi bodhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh01a:2255_1: Maggārammaṇattike ariyamaggaṃ ārabbhāti lokuttaramaggaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
atk-abh01a:2256_1: Maggahetukaniddese paṭhamanayena paccayaṭṭhena hetunā maggasampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ sahetukabhāvo dassito.
atk-abh01a:2256_2: Dutiyanayena maggabhūtena sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena hetunā sesamaggaṅgānaṃ sahetukabhāvo dassito.
atk-abh01a:2256_3: Tatiyanayena magge uppannahetūhi sammādiṭṭhiyā sahetukabhāvo dassitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:2257_3: Ariyasāvakānañhi attano maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle ārammaṇādhipati labbhati.
atk-abh01a:2257_4: Cetopariyañāṇena pana ariyasāvako parassa maggaṃ paccavekkhamāno garuṃ karontopi attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ viya garuṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a:2257_5: ‘Yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karontaṃ tathāgataṃ disvā tassa maggaṃ garuṃ karoti na karotī’ti? Karoti,
atk-abh01a:2257_7: Arahā na kiñci dhammaṃ garuṃ karoti ṭhapetvā maggaṃ phalaṃ nibbānanti.
atk-abh01a:2257_10: Chandañhi jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggaṃ bhāventassa chando adhipati nāma hoti, na maggo.
atk-abh01a:2257_14: Vīmaṃsaṃ pana jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggaṃ bhāventassa vīmaṃsādhipati ceva hoti maggo cāti.
atk-abh01a:2258_7: Upasaggena pana padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhinibbattāti vuttā.

atk-abh01a:2260_0: Yadi pana āyūhitaṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ sabbaṃ vipākaṃ dadeyya,

atk-abh01a:2265_4: Appamāṇā pana kālena bahiddhā kālena ajjhattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti.
atk-abh01a:2267_3: Mettāya ayitassa mettāsamaṅgino cittassa bhāvo mettāyitattaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2267_10: Sabbehipi imehi padehi upacārappanāppattā mettāva vuttā.
atk-abh01a:2268_3: Ettha ca dukkhe ñāṇaṃ savanasammasanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇāsu vattati.
atk-abh01a:2268_13: evaṃ paccayesu ca paccayuppannadhammesu ca ñāṇaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2269_7: Yattha katthaci bhave sattā etāya nandanti,
atk-abh01a:2269_9: Nandī ca sā rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo cāti nandīrāgo.
atk-abh01a:2269_10: Tattha ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe sakiṃ uppannā taṇhā ‘nandī’.
atk-abh01a:2269_12: Cittassa sārāgoti yo heṭṭhā balavarañjanaṭṭhena sārāgoti vutto,
atk-abh01a:2270_13: “Ejā imaṃ purisaṃ parikaḍḍhati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2270_16: “Taṇhā janeti purisaṃ cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2270_17: Vaṭṭasmiṃ satte dukkhena saṃyojayamānā janetīti sañjananī.
atk-abh01a:2270_19: Ayañhi vaṭṭasmiṃ satte cutipaṭisandhivasena sibbati ghaṭeti,
atk-abh01a:2270_22: Anekappakāraṃ visayajālaṃ taṇhāvipphanditanivesasaṅkhātaṃ vā jālamassā atthīti jālinī.
atk-abh01a:2271_4: Allāni ceva siniddhāni cāti ayañhettha attho.
atk-abh01a:2271_14: Visatā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe vitthatāti visattikā.
atk-abh01a:2271_21: Tassa tassa paṭilābhatthāya satte āyūhāpetīti āyūhinī.
atk-abh01a:2271_23: Ayañhi sattānaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ ukkaṇṭhituṃ na deti,
atk-abh01a:2274_5: Taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vanati bhajati allīyatīti vanaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2274_8: Anatthadukkhānaṃ vā samuṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena gahanaṭṭhena ca vanaṃ viyāti ‘vanaṃ’;

atk-abh01a:2277_14: Niccasannissitaṭṭhena hi sattānaṃ taṇhāsamo bandhu nāma natthi.
atk-abh01a:2278_1: Ajjhottharaṇato ceva tittiṃ anupagantvāva paribhuñjanato cāti attho.
atk-abh01a:2278_4: Idāni tassā pavattiṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ rūpāsātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2278_5: Tattha āsisanavasena āsāti āsāya atthaṃ gahetvā rūpe āsā rūpāsāti evaṃ navapi padāni veditabbāni.
atk-abh01a:2278_6: Ettha ca purimāni pañca pañcakāmaguṇavasena vuttāni.
atk-abh01a:2278_10: Na hi tesaṃ dhanaputtajīvitehi aññaṃ piyataraṃ atthi.
atk-abh01a:2278_11: ‘Etaṃ mayhaṃ etaṃ mayha’nti vā ‘asukena me idaṃ dinnaṃ idaṃ dinna’nti vā evaṃ satte jappāpetīti jappā.
atk-abh01a:2278_13: Tato paraṃ aññenākārena vibhajituṃ āraddhattā puna jappāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2279_8: “Rāgo visama”ntiādivacanato vā yuttaṭṭhāne vā ayuttaṭṭhāne vā uppanno chandarāgo adhammaṭṭhena ‘adhammarāgo’,
atk-abh01a:2281_3: Cittaṃ upagantvā kilissati saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ karotīti upakkileso.
atk-abh01a:2281_7: “Corā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsu dhuttā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsū”tiādīsu hi maggaṃ gaṇhiṃsūti attho.
atk-abh01a:2281_10: “Latā ubbhijja tiṭṭhatī”ti āgataṭṭhānepi ayaṃ taṇhā latāti vuttā.
atk-abh01a:2281_20: tesaṃ upari māro vasaṃ vattetīti iminā pariyāyena mārassa visayoti māravisayo.
atk-abh01a:2281_24: evaṃ taṇhābaddhā sattāpīti daḷhabandhanaṭṭhena gaddulaṃ viyāti gaddulaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2282_1: Dosaniddese anatthaṃ me acarīti avuḍḍhiṃ me akāsi.
atk-abh01a:2282_3: Aṭṭhāne vā pana āghātoti akāraṇe kopo –
atk-abh01a:2282_12: upakkhalitvā khāṇukassa kuppati idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-abh01a:2282_14: Tattha heṭṭhā navasu ṭhānesu satte ārabbha uppannattā kammapathabhedo hoti.
atk-abh01a:2282_15: Aṭṭhānāghāto pana saṅkhāresu uppanno kammapathabhedaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh01a:2283_0: Idāni akusalaniddese vuttanayaṃ dassetuṃ doso dussanātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh01a:2284_1: Tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sahetukāti tehi hetudhammehi ye aññe hetudhammā vā nahetudhammā vā te sahetukā.
atk-abh01a:2284_3: Ettha ca hetu hetuyeva ca hoti,
atk-abh01a:2284_4: tiṇṇaṃ vā dvinnaṃ vā ekato uppattiyaṃ sahetuko ca.
atk-abh01a:2285_1: Saṅkhatadukaniddese purimaduke vuttaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuṃ sandhāya yo eva so dhammoti ekavacananiddeso kato.
atk-abh01a:2285_2: Purimaduke pana bahuvacanavasena pucchāya uddhaṭattā ime dhammā appaccayāti pucchānusandhinayena bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh01a:2286_3: Ettha ca kenaci viññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇādīsu kenaci ekena cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena vā vijānitabbā.
atk-abh01a:2286_4: Kenaci na viññeyyāti teneva cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena vā na vijānitabbā.
atk-abh01a:2286_5: ‘Evaṃ sante dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattato duko hotī’ti heṭṭhā vuttattā ‘ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā’ti ayaṃ duko na hoti.
atk-abh01a:2286_6: Rūpaṃ pana cakkhuviññeyyaṃ saddo na cakkhuviññeyyoti imamatthaṃ gahetvā ‘ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā,
atk-abh01a:2286_7: ye vā pana te dhammā sotaviññeyyā na te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā’ti ayameko dukoti veditabbo.
atk-abh01a:2286_8: Evaṃ ekekaindriyamūlake cattāro cattāro katvā vīsati dukā vibhattāti veditabbā.
atk-abh01a:2287_0: Kiṃ pana ‘manoviññāṇena kenaci viññeyyā kenaci na viññeyyā’ natthi?
atk-abh01a:2287_3: vavatthānābhāvato pana na vuttā. Na hi,
atk-abh01a:2287_4: yathā cakkhuviññāṇena aviññeyyā evāti vavatthānaṃ atthi,
atk-abh01a:2287_5: evaṃ manoviññāṇenāpīti vavatthānābhāvato ettha dukā na vuttā.
atk-abh01a:2287_6: Manoviññāṇena pana kenaci viññeyyā ceva aviññeyyā cāti ayamattho atthi.
atk-abh01a:2287_8: Manoviññāṇanti hi saṅkhyaṃ gatehi kāmāvacaradhammehi kāmāvacaradhammā eva tāva kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:2287_9: Tehiyeva rūpāvacarādidhammāpi kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:2287_10: Rūpāvacarehipi kāmāvacarā kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:2287_11: Teheva rūpāvacarādayopi kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:2287_12: Arūpāvacarehi pana kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā apariyāpannā ca neva viññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:2287_13: Arūpāvacarā pana kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:2287_14: Tepi ca kecideva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:2287_16: Apariyāpannā pana nibbānena aviññeyyattā kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā.
atk-abh01a:2287_17: Tepi ca maggaphalānaṃ aviññeyyattā kecideva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyāti.
atk-abh01a:2288_2: Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahajāto rāgo bhavavasena patthanā bhavāsavo nāma.

atk-abh01a:2291_1: Sassato lokoti vātiādīhi dasahākārehi diṭṭhippabhedova vutto.
atk-abh01a:2291_2: Tattha sassato lokoti ettha khandhapañcakaṃ lokoti gahetvā ‘ayaṃ loko nicco dhuvo sabbakāliko’ti gaṇhantassa ‘sassata’nti gahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.

atk-abh01a:2291_5: lokoti ca kasiṇaparicchedantena ca ‘antavā’ti gaṇhantassa ‘antavā loko’ti gahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.
atk-abh01a:2291_7: Vipulakasiṇalābhino pana tasmiṃ kasiṇe samāpannassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattitarūpārūpadhamme lokoti ca

atk-abh01a:2292_0: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti bhedanadhammassa sarīrasseva ‘jīva’nti gahitattā sarīre ucchijjamāne ‘jīvampi ucchijjatī’ti ucchedagahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi.

atk-abh01a:2294_0: Ime pana āsave kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh01a:2295_1: Saṃyojanesu mānaniddese seyyohamasmīti mānoti uttamaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ seyyo’ti evaṃ uppannamāno.
atk-abh01a:2295_2: Sadisohamasmīti mānoti samasamaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ sadiso’ti evaṃ uppannamāno.
